[\[81a.2\]]chos mthun pas mi rtag par byas pa las [#]brjod pa/_de la chos mthun pa yod du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang /_mig gi gzung bya la sogs pa'i bye brag gis bum pa kho na mi rtag par 'gyur gyi [#]sgra ni ma yin la/_sgra kho na rtag par 'gyur te/_bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_mnyan bya nyid la
[\[81a.3\]]sogs pas so [#]zhes so/_/bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog nas rnam par rtog par byed pas na rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa'am/_dper brjod pa las gzhan la yang byas pa nyid yin du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang [#]bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa bzhin rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnam par rtog pa
[\[81a.4\]]brjod pas na/_rnam par [#]rtog pa mtshungs pa'o zhes zer ro/_/'di la ni/_'khrul pa can gyi bye brag gis/_/rtag par 'gyur ba [#]de ltar snang /_/spyi min gyis kyang /_'di la yang 'khrul pa can dang thun mong ma yin pa [#]de bzhin du rtag pa'am sun 'byin par yang thal bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi phyogs la
[\[81a.5\]]ma grub pa bzhin gzhan la ma grub pa bstan pa'i phyir sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sun 'byin pa la ni thun mong ngam thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/bsgrub [#]pa la ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o/_/rnam pa gzhan yang ste ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/gal te
[\[81a.6\]]bsreg par bya ba dang bsdongs pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid brjod na ni mngon sum 'ba' zhig pa mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pas ma nges pa yin no/_/bsdongs pa'i nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs 'di yang de bzhin du ma yin no/_/brtsal ma thag tu byung ba 'ba' zhig
[\[81a.7\]]pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/gcig nyid du/_thal bar 'gyur phyir bye brag med/_/chos mthun pa ston pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de dang gcig tu thal bar 'gyur bas [#]na'o/_/zla bo mnyan bya ma yin pa'i phyir med bzhin du gang du [#]gang
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]gis na bsgrub bya'i zhes go bar bya/_bye brag med ces bya ba ni bye brag med par thal ba'o/_/gang zhig gang dang bye brag yin zhe na/_bye brag med par byas pa'i phyir [#]thams cad dang ste/_dper na chos mthun pa'i dpe bum pa bstan pa'i phyir gzhan rnams dang yang khyad par med par byed pas bum pa la
[\[81b.2\]]yod pa'i chos thams cad sgra la [#]thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na thams cad phan tshun chos mthun pa'i phyir gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la yang bye brag med par thal bar 'gyur bas na bum pa bzhin sgra'i bye brag nyid rab tu ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam rtog mtshungs pa las khyad par chen po
[\[81b.3\]]yod pa ma yin no/_/de'i phyir de bzhin du ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/phyogs snga ma la ni chos mthun pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa dang /_gang bye brag med pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa med de/_gang bye brag med par ma mthong ba tsam las ldog par byed do/_/de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/bsgrub
[\[81b.4\]]bya [#]rtogs khyad med phyir yang /_/ma grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod/_/bye brag med par mtshungs pa snga ma las tha dad du bya ba'i don du yang gi sgra smos so/_/de la rnam par rtog [#]pa mtshungs pa dang bye brag med pa las bye brag med par mtshungs pa ni gzhan du brjod par bya ste/_bsgrub bya dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag
[\[81b.5\]]la bye brag med [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/dper na sngar bzhin [#]byas pa la gtan nas byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag la bye brag yod pa ma yin no zhes so/_/de la brjod pa/_de lta bu yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste/_snga na med pa skyes pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du sgro btags
[\[81b.6\]]nas bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs su bye brag med par mgo bsgre ba'i phyir ro/_/grub na ni sngar nas yod pa zhig na [#]med pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bye brag med par mtshungs pa brjod par bya ste/_brtsal [#]ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni mi rtag pa bsgrub [#]pa bzhin chos gzhan yang sgrub par byed do zhes
[\[81b.7\]]bya ba ni bye brag med pa'o/_/de lta bu yang bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis ni [#]'gal ba ltar snang ba'o/_/bsreg par bya ba la sogs pa ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu nges pa nyid 'gal bar rtsod par [#]gal te mthong na gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o[#]/_/_
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]yang brjod pa/_bsgrub bya ba ni gnod chos kyang /_/mtshungs pa nyid kyi [#]bye brag med/_/gtan tshigs skyon la 'gal ltar snang [#]/_/skyon yod min te phyogs phyi ma/_/de dag ni chos nyid chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa phyogs phyi ma'o/_/gal te phyogs phyi ma las [#]phyogs
[\[82a.2\]]gcig tu nges par chos mthun pa la sogs pas phyogs gcig tu nges pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs snga ma la ni ji skad du brjod pa'i ma nges pa dang ldan pas de sun bton pa dang /_sgrub pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges pa bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par brtsad pa'i phyir de dag ni sun 'byin
[\[82a.3\]]gzhan nyid yin no/_/gal te gnod par mi byed par [#]mthong ste/_dper na 'gal ba kha cig ni brtsal [#]ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid las [#]mi 'khrul ba de bzhin mnyan bya ma yin pa yang ngo /_/de bzhin du sgra mnyan bya ma yin no zhes de yang brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar 'dir mnyan bya nyid la gnod pa ni
[\[82a.4\]]mthong gi_/sgra rtag pa nyid ni ma mthong ngo /_/gang las mi rtag pa nyid 'thob pa'i rjes su dpag par [#]'jug par byed/_dam bca' ba'i skyon nyid kyis snga ma la [#]mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid mi 'grub [#]bo/_/gang la phyogs gcig tu nges pa mthong na ni gnod pa med de/_ji ltar rdul gnyis pa ni rdul gcig sngon
[\[82a.5\]]du song ba yin te/_rags pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa bzhin zhes byas nas rdul phra rab rnams kyis rags pa [#]nyid kyang bsgrub [#]pa bzhin no/_/bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi [#]sngon du rdul rags pa song ba yin pa'i phyir de la lan gang zhig yod/_/bsgrub bya la gnod bsgrub [#]pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[82a.6\]]gnod pa [#]byed pa 'gal nyid min/_/bsgrub bya la ni 'dir chos sam chos can yang rung ste/_de la gnod pa grub na de 'gal ba nyid yin no/_/bsgrub bya las gzhan gtan tshigs kyis/_/bstan na dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o/_/gang [#]bsgrub par bya ba las gzhan yang gtan tshigs kyis nye bar bstan pa
[\[82a.7\]]de ni [#]dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o/_/dper na snga ma [#]bzhin du mi rtag par bsgrub [#]pa la gtan tshigs 'di glog la sogs pa la yod pa [#]ma yin zhing 'di las mngon sum la sogs pas mi rtag pa grub po/_/gal te de med kyang de'i rgyur 'gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no/_/gzhan de las gzhan du sbyor bar
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]byed do/_/'di mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te/_khyab pa med pa'i phyir nags kyi shing nub mo nyal ba las sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin no zhes so/_/'di la yang /_bsgrub bya du ma bkod pa las/_/gtan tshigs de dang rjes mthun nyid/_/gal te gtan tshigs gzhan gyis rtag par grub
[\[82b.2\]]de lta na ni mi rtag pa'i 'khrul pa yin pas gtan tshigs gzhan gyis sgrub po/_/gtan tshigs ni ma yin no[#]/_/de ni mi rtag pa med par mthong bar [#]med do/_/byed pa po'i rgyu las gzhan gyi 'bras bu sgrub po/_/de'i gtan tshigs nyid du ma gyur pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no/_/de'i phyir ma nges pa
[\[82b.3\]]ltar snang ba'o/_/gtan tshigs kyis ni ma khyab kyang /_/bsgrub bya'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir/_/ma grub ltar snang sgrar gnas kyis/_/thams cad rab tu sgrub pa [#]yin/_/gang ma khyab pa'i sgrub byed ma yin no zhes brjod pa la/_de mi rtag pa las gzhan la gtan tshigs mi srid cing /_sgra la
[\[82b.4\]]med pa yang ma yin pa la med par btags pa'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste/_bsgrub bya kho na la med pa yin pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa yin no/_/gtan tshigs de sgra la med pa yang ma yin la sgra la yod pas thams cad kyis bsgrub bya sgrub pa yang ma yin te[#]/_ji ltar sbrul la sogs pa la yod
[\[82b.5\]]pa'i mtshan mo nyal bas na nags na gnas pa sems pa dang bcas par bsgrub pa bzhin no/_/the tshom brjod 'dod tha dad las/_/gtan tshigs the tshom rtsod par byed/_/gang [#]du dam bcas pa'i don btags pas gtan tshigs 'khrul pa'i phyir the tshom du brjod do/_/gtan tshigs kyi don rtag [# ]
[\[82b.6\]]pa las kyang the tshom mtshungs pa'i ltag spyod [#]yin no/_/dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la brtsal [#]ma thag tu byung ba bsal ba dang /_skyes pa mthong ba las the tshom du 'gyur te/_ci 'di gsal bar bya ba [#]yin nam/_bskyed par bya ba yin zhes so/_/'di rigs pa ma yin te/_gang gtan tshigs de dag
[\[82b.7\]]las mi rtag pa'o zhes pa de'i [#]lta na/_bsgrub bya sgro btags [#]ma nges pa/_/ltar snang /_'di brtsal ma thag tu byung ba dmigs nas 'jig pa nyid du sgrub pa la gang zhig de ltar sgro 'dogs na [#]mi rtag pa bskyed par bya ste/_de la yang ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no/_/'di ltar brtsal ma thag
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]tu byung ba dmigs pa bsal ba ni rtswa [#]dang chu la sogs pa la yod pas de ma nges pa la snang ba ste/_'jig pa bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsal ba rnams la yang 'jig pa nyid yod pa ste/_de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o/_/rtags ma grub ltar snang /_sgro btags nas shes par
[\[83a.2\]]bya'o/_/gal te gtan tshigs su sgro btags par bya ba'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir skyes pa [#]sun bton na ni de las ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste/_gtan tshigs su brjod pa'i brtsal [#]ma thag tu byung bar dmigs pa de brtsal [#]ma thag tu skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/don gyis 'dod min mi mthun phyogs/_/_
[\[83a.3\]]bsgrub [#]brjod don go mtshungs/_dper na gal te rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa yin na/_don gyi shugs kyi rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa'o zhes 'gyur bas de lta bu ni don gyis go bar mtshungs pa'o/_/'di ni/_'khrul pa gzhan gyi bsgrub bya la/_/de yis sgrub pa de
[\[83a.4\]]ltar snang /_/rtsol ba las byung ba nyid las mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid las rtag pa'i don du [#]sgro 'dogs par byed pa de la ni ma nges pa sngar sgro 'dogs par byed do/_/des na ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste rtag pa la yang gtan tshigs zhugs pa ni ma yin pas na gang las bsgrub
[\[83a.5\]]par bya ba las ma nges par 'gyur/_yang na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag [#]pa nyid do zhes sgrub pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la sogs pa de dag med kyang glog la sogs pa ni [#]mi rtag pa grub pas so zhes rtsod [#]par byed do/_/de yang ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste/_de rtag pa yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir
[\[83a.6\]]ro/_/thal 'gyur mtshungs par 'dod pa yang /_/gang yang gnyis ka gtan tshigs lam/_/dper na sngar bzhin sgrub pa la re zhig 'dir bum pa kho na mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin zhes so/_/de ni dpe ltar snang ba bzhin/_/de bum pa mi rtag pa grub pa mthong ba bzhin du yang rtsod
[\[83a.7\]]pa ni bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro med pa'i dpe ltar snang bar rigs pa'i phyir de lta bu [#]de ltar snang ba ste/_gong du 'bras bu mtshungs par gtan tshigs kyi rjes 'gro brjod zin to/_/de dag ni/_ltag gcod [#]kun la phyogs tsam mo/_/ji ltar ltag gcod de dag rnams la ma tshang ba la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]kyis mi rigs par lan brjod pa de bzhin du lhag pa [#]mtshungs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang ngo /_/de dag nyid la sbyor ba'i bye brag cung zad tsam gyis dbye bas [#]mtha' yas par 'gyur ro/_/de la kho bo cag gis ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang /_ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de
[\[83b.2\]]dag brjod pa de ni rjod par byed pa la brjod par bya ba brtags [#]nas yin te/_de ltar ma yin na ma tshang ba nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba dang ma grub pa nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta [#]na yang gzhung mangs par 'gyur te/_'di ltar gang kha cig tu ltag gcod [# ]
[\[83b.3\]]de ma rtogs kyis bstan nas de de dang 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /_gang ma ning gi rtags kyis bstan nas lan yang de dang mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni thams cad kyi mjug bsdu bar ltag gcod rnams la thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs par rig par bya'o/_/_
[\[83b.4\]]de ltar re zhig kho bo cag gis ltag gcod rnams la ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang /_ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag brjod do/_/ltag gcod [#]rnams la rtsod sgrub tu/_/phyin ci log dang brdzun nyid dang /_/'gal ba nyid de skyon gsum ste/_/gsum po tha dad du mtshon min/_/rtsod
[\[83b.5\]]pa sgrub pa [#]ni phyin ci log dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid rnams kyis lan skyon brjod pa yin no zhes brjod do/_/de la phyin ci log ni chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_bye brag med pa dang phrad pa dang /_ma phrad pa rnams la ni gtan tshigs dmigs
[\[83b.6\]]shing /_'bras bu mtshungs pa la sogs pa ni the tshom du brjod do/_/de la bzhi po rnams kyis phyin ci log nyid ni 'di ltar phyogs gcig tu nges pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su dpog par brjod la/_ma nges pa ni [#]chos mthun pa la sogs pas 'gal zla 'jog par byed do/_/phyogs gcig tu
[\[83b.7\]]nges pa ni ji ltar ma nges pa dang phyin ci log [#]bzhin du 'gal yang lhan cig mi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bden na yang don phyogs gcig tu nges par sbyor ba'i lta na ma nges pa yin pas brdzun yin yang rnam par rtog pa mtshungs par brjod nus so/_/de yang rigs pa ma yin te/_bsreg
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]par bya ba nyid la sogs pa med par ma mthong ba mthong ba [#]ma yin te/_rlung yab kyi rlung la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do zhes 'byung bas so/_/gzhan gyis ni bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_mig gis gzung bya ma yin pa nyid la sogs pas sgra rtag pa nyid do zhes
[\[84a.2\]]brjod pa yin no/_/bsreg par bya ba nyid la sogs pas bum pa [#]mi rtag pa nyid du [#]ma yin no/_/de la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/_bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa rtag pa kho nar mthong ba ni med kyi[#]/_'on kyang rtag pa la'o zhes so/_/de ltar ni gzhan gyi phyogs la ma nges pa nyid brjod pa yin no/_/_
[\[84a.3\]]'di snga ma nyid la khyab par byed pa yin la khyab byed ma yin [#]pa gtan tshigs ma yin no/_/gzhan gyi sgra la rtsol ba las byung pa'i phyir mnyan bya ma yin par rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin gyi/_'on kyang mnyan bya ma [#]yin pa'i phyir sgra nyid rtag par 'gyur ba'o zhes yin no/_/lan phyogs snga ma dang 'brel ba
[\[84a.4\]]ma yin no/_/bden te[#]/_gal te chos mthun pas brjod na ni bden te/_chos mi mthun pas ni bsgrub bya med pas gtan tshigs med par ston pa yin gyi/_bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bsgrub bya med pa'o [#]zhes ni ma yin no zhe na/_de lta [#]yin du chug na dpe gnyis ka rjes 'gro phyin ci log gis
[\[84a.5\]]yin no/_/de ltar rtsod pa grub pa na ni med de/_ji skad [#]du mnyan bya med [#]nyid rtag pa nyid [#]mthong ba ni med la/_mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid kyi yang ma nges pa yin pas rtag pa ma yin no/_/gang chos mthun pa dang /_chos mi mthun pa dag gis 'di'i rtag pa nyid rjes su dpog par byed do zhes 'byung ngo /_/de 'dir
[\[84a.6\]]chos mi mthun pa la yod pa nyid dpe yin na/_de lta na ni mnyan par bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid du mthong ba nyid do[#]/_/'di 'dra ba chos mi mthun pa'i dpe sbyor bas yin na ni glog rtag pa yin te/_rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i phyir zhes pa skyon med pa [#]nyid du 'gyur to/_/rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i nam mkha' rtag pa
[\[84a.7\]]dang /_rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa la [#]phyogs gcig tu nges pa yang mthong ba nyid do/_/gnyis pa ni pha rol pos bye brag med par mtshungs pa la gtan tshigs med pa nyid du rtsod par byed do/_/de la phyin ci log nyid med pa'i phyir [#]skyon gzhan brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du phrad ma phrad dang gtan tshigs
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ma [#]yin pa mtshungs pa dag gis/_gtan tshigs thams cad bsal ba'i phyir la/_yang 'di dam bcas pa'i don bskyed pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs kyi skyon du brjod pa yang ma yin gyi/_'on kyang shes par [#]byed pa nyid do/_/de la yang phrad ma phrad kyi skyon dang 'brel to/_/de'i phyir de ltar yang gtan
[\[84b.2\]]tshigs phyin ci log ma yin zhing [#]dmigs pa mtshungs pa yang gtan tshigs phyin ci log ma yin la pha rol pos de ltar brtsad pa yang ma yin no/_/gzhan la ni mi rtag pa la gtan tshigs yod pa yin no/_/'on [#]kyang de dag gis [#]bsgrub bya grub pa med pas kyang gtan tshigs med pa yin gyi/_gang zhig
[\[84b.3\]]med kyang de de'i gtan tshigs 'byung ba ni ma yin no/_/de lta na ni de'i lan du 'gyur ro/_/de lta ma yin na ni phyogs snga ma gzhan brjod par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa yang khyab byed ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs phyin ci log gi skyon ma yin no/_/the tshom mtshungs par [#]yang gtan tshigs phyin ci
[\[84b.4\]]log gi yin gyi[#]/_'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs kyi don sgro btags pa yin no/_/dam bca' ba phyin ci log gis kyang mngon par brjod pa phyin ci log tu btags pa'i phyir thams cad du phyin ci log nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/ma brjod pa mtshungs pa yang gtan tshigs phyin ci
[\[84b.5\]]log tu brjod pa ma yin te/_pha rol pos 'jig pa'i gtan tshigs su byas pa ni ma yin gyi/_sngar [#]nas brjod pa [#]yod pa'i zhes brjod do/_/brjod pa'i tshe na yang sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid thob pa ma yin te/_zhig pa'i phyir ro/_/'bras bu mtshungs pa yang gtan tshigs phyin ci log gi sgo nas brjod
[\[84b.6\]]pa ma yin te/_'on kyang ci gzhan gyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi khyad par gyis yin no/_/de'i phyir ltag gcod de dag gtan tshigs phyin ci log nyid du ma mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa ma yin pa ni thal bar 'gyur pa dang /_don gyis go bar mtshungs pa la sogs pa'o/_/de la re
[\[84b.7\]]zhig thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/_gang gi phyir don gyi gtan tshigs ma mthong yang bsgrub par bya ba brjod pas so[#]/_/'di la yang phyin ci log dang 'gal bas kyang brjod par nus te/_ma mthong ba mthong ba yin pa'i [#]phyin ci log dang 'gal ba nyid do zhes
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]byas nas so/_/de bzhin du don gyis [#]go ba mtshungs pa yang ngo [#]/_/ji ltar bsgrub bya med pa la [#]ma dmigs pas med par dmigs pa thob pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du phyin ci log dang 'gal ba yang ngo /_/'gal ba ni ma skyes pa dang rtag par mtshungs pa la sogs pa'o/_/_
[\[85a.2\]]de la gang gi phyir snga nas skyes pa'i sgra nyid med pa de'i phyir de lta bu 'gal ba nyid do/_/med pa yang mi rtag pa'o zhes 'gal ba yang ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag pa [#]ma yin pa yang ngo /_/yod pa [#]rtag pa'i phyir med pa'o zhes [#]rtag pa nyid phyin ci log tu med kyang ngo [#]zhes byas nas so/_/rtag pa mtshungs pa
[\[85a.3\]]yang ji ltar 'gal ba bzhin du phyin ci log tu med par brjod par nus te/_'di ltar mi rtag pa dang rtag pa 'gal bas so/_/de bzhin du phyin ci log dang yang dag pa ma yin pa yang de ltar rtag pa nyid yin no/_/de'i phyir ltag gcod rnams la phyin ci log dang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang 'gal ba nyid
[\[85a.4\]]rnams 'dres pas skyon med par brjod par mi nus so/_/ltag [#]gcod rnams kyi mtshan nyid lan/_/dka' ba rigs pa phra mor yang /_/shes bya rigs pa brtag par yang /_/ltag gcod gzhan la de'i phyogs tsam/_/rigs pa phra mor yang chos mthun pa dang chos [#]mi mthun pa dag gis [#]'gal bar gnas pa
[\[85a.5\]]ste/_/ltag gcod de rnam par brtags pas kyang [#]ltag gcod mang po nyid du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan nyid de dang phrad ma phrad kyi gtan tshigs dang mi mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa la srid pa ma yin no/_/dpe brjod 'di la chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pas 'gal bar gnas pa med do/_/ma brjod pa'i
[\[85a.6\]]ltag gcod rnams ni ba lang yin pa'i phyir zhes pa las ba lang grub pa med bzhin du grub pa yin no zhes bya ba [#]la sogs pa thams cad rigs pa brtags [#]par rgyas pa [#]shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du ltag gcod gzhan rnams so/_/[#]de dag nyid phyogs tsam mo zhes bya ba bzhin sgrub pa po gzhan sgrub
[\[85a.7\]]pa dang sun 'byin pa dang /_de ltar snang ba bstan pa rnams la [#]skyon phyogs tsam bstan pa'o/_/de dag gis so sor dgag [#]pa dang gzhal bya so sor dgag pa rgyas par ni bye brag pa'i rigs pa dang /_rkang mig pa'i rigs pa brtag pa dag las shes par bya'o/_/mu stegs can thams cad kyi gzhal bya
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]go bar byed pa ni rtog ge tsam ste/_des yongs su brtags [#]pa'i dngos po rnams ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang de bzhin du brtags [#]na dpyad mi bzod do/_/gal te 'di gang gang gis na [#]don la gzhal bar bya ba bkag ce na/_gzhal bar bya ba dang /_'jal bar byed pa sgrub dka' ba nyid kyi
[\[85b.2\]]mu stegs can 'di la snying po med par bstan pa'i phyir dang /_de la spro ba rnams bzlog par bya ba'i don du 'di brtsams so/_/'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/_de'i chos rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/log na ni ston pa'i chos nyid nye bar mnyan nas dka' sla
[\[85b.3\]]med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/ring [#]du bskal pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/yang brjod pa/_rtog ge'i stobs tsam mu stegs kyi/_/de yang mtshan nyid ma bstan zhing /_/rang gi sbyor ba dang yang 'gal/_/'dod don sgrub par byed pa min/_/gang zhig rtog ge'i lam las chos nyid la khrid na/_/thub pa'i bstan las cher
[\[85b.4\]]bsrings nyams par byas pa yin/_/de lta'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid/_/gal te gzhan du 'gro na dpyad par bya ba'i 'os/_/tshad ma'i phung po skyon dang yon tan rgyas pa ru/_/rab gsal byas las 'di ru dge ba ci bsags des/_/skye ba skye bar yon tan yod min shes
[\[85b.5\]]pa yi/_/grub mtha' zhi zhing 'gro la rnam thar ster bar shog_/tshad ma kun las btus pa las ltag gcod brtag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//tshad ma kun las btus pa'i 'grel pa rtsod pa pa [#]chen po shin tu phra ba'i thugs mnga' pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[85b.6\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po bsu d+ha ra rak+Shi ta dang /_bod kyi lo tsA [#]ba dge bsnyen seng rgyal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//'jam pa'i mgon po'i bkas bskul phyogs kyi glang po'i bstan bcos rgya mtsho ltar zab 'di/_/rigs ldan rgyal po'i bkas bskul nor 'dzin
[\[85b.7\]]srung [#]ba zhes bya [#]ste bdun bshad mkhan dang /_/gzus chung ston pa'i bkas bskul dge bsnyen seng rgyal zhes bya zha ma lo tsAs [#]bsgyur/_/dge gang bsod nams bkas bskul 'gro kun rigs lam la gnas byang chub myur thob shog/_//[ #]
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]{D4205}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A laM ba na pa rAk+She/[# ]bod skad du/dmigs pa brtag pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po rnam par rig pa'i rgyu/_/phra rab rdul dag yin mod kyi/_/der mi snang phyir de'i yul ni/_/rdul phran ma yin dbang po
[\[86a.2\]]bzhin/_/gang ltar snang de de las min/_/rdzas su med phyir zla gnyis bzhin/_/de ltar phyi rol gnyis ka yang /_/blo yi yul du mi rung ngo /_/kha cig 'dus pa'i rnam pa dag_/sgrub pa yin par 'dod par byed/_/rdul phran rnam pa rnam rig gi_/_don min sra nyid la sogs bzhin/_/de dag ltar
[\[86a.3\]]na bum pa dang /_/kham phor sogs blo mtshungs par 'gyur/_/gal te rnam pa'i dbye bas dbye/_/de ni rdul phran rdzas yod la/_/med de [#]tshad dbye med phyir ro/_/de phyir de rdzas med la yod/_/rdul phran yongs su bsal na [#]ni/_/_der snang shes pa nyams 'gyur zhing [#]/_/nang gi shes bya'i ngo bo ni/_/_
[\[86a.4\]]phyi rol ltar snang gang yin der[#]/_/don yin rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/_/de'i rkyen nyid kyang yin [#]phyir ro/_/gcig cha'ang mi 'khrul phyir na rkyen/_/nus pa 'jug phyir rim gyis [#]yin/_/lhan cig byed dbang nus pa yi[#]/_/ngo bo gang yin dbang po'ang yin/_/de'ang rnam rig la mi 'gal/_/de ltar
[\[86a.5\]]yul gyi ngo bo dang /_/nus pa phan tshun rgyu can dang /_/thogs med dus nas [#]'jug pa yin/_/dmigs pa brtags pa [#]slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D4206}#]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_A [#]laM ba na pa rIk+Shi [#]br-it+ti/_bod skad du/_dmigs
[\[86a.6\]]pa brtag pa'i 'grel pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang dag mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa phyi rol gyi don yin par 'dod pa de dag ni de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rdul phra rab dag yin pa'am der snang ba'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir de
[\[86a.7\]]'dus pa yin par rtog grang na/_de la re zhig_/dbang po rnam par rig pa'i rgyu/_/phra rab rdul dag yin mod kyi/_/der mi snang phyir de [#]yul ni/_/rdul phran ma yin dbang po bzhin/_/yul zhes bya ba ni shes pas gang gis [#]rang gi ngo bo nges par 'dzin pa yin te de'i rnam par skye ba'i phyir ro/_/rdul
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]phra mo dag gi [#]ni de'i rgyu nyid yin du zin kyang de lta ma yin te dbang po bzhin no/_/de ltar na re zhig rdul phra mo dag dmigs pa ma yin no/_/'dus pa ni der snang ba nyid yin du zin kyang /_gang ltar snang de de las min/_/don gang zhig rang snang ba'i rnam par rig pa bskyed pa de ni dmigs pa yin par rigs te/_
[\[86b.2\]]'di ltar de ni skye ba'i rkyen nyid du bshad pas so/_/'dus pa ni de lta yang ma yin te/_rdzas su med phyir zla gnyis bzhin/_/dbang po ma tshang ba'i phyir zla ba gnyis mthong ba ni der snang ba nyid yin du zin kyang de'i yul ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rdzas su yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyis [#]rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir 'dus pa [# ]
[\[86b.3\]]dmigs pa ma yin no/_/de ltar phyi rol gnyis kar yang /_/blo yi [#]yul du mi rung ngo /_/yan lag gcig ma tshang ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi rdul phra mo dang tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni dmigs pa ma yin no/_/'di la ni/_kha cig 'dus pa'i rnam pa dag_/sgrub pa yin par 'dod par byed/_/don thams cad ni rnam pa du ma
[\[86b.4\]]can [#]yin pas de la rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis mngon sum nyid du 'dod do/_/rdul phra rab rnams la yang 'dus par snang ba'i shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu [#]yod do/_/rdul phran rnam par rnam rig gi_/don min sra nyid la sogs bzhin/_/ji ltar sra [#]nyid la sogs pa ni yod bzhin du yang mig gi blo'i yul ma
[\[86b.5\]]yin pa ltar rdul phra mo nyid kyang de dang [#]'dra'o/_/de dag ltar na bum pa dang kham phor sogs blo mtshungs par 'gyur/_bum pa dang kham phor la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo rnams la ni mang du zin kyang khyad par 'ga' yang med do/_/gal te rnam pa'i dbye bas dbye/_/gal te 'di snyam du mgrin pa la
[\[86b.6\]]sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par las gang gis ni [#]blo'i khyad par du 'gyur ba'i khyad par yod do snyam du sems na khyad par 'di ni bum pa la sogs pa la yod kyi/_de ni rdul phran rdzas yod la/_/med de tshad dbye med phyir ro/_/rdul phra rab rnams ni rdzas gzhan yin du zin kyang zlum po la ni dbye ba
[\[86b.7\]]med do/_/de phyir de rdzas med la yod/_/rnam pa'i dbye ba ni kun rdzob tu yod pa dag kho na la yod kyi rdul phra mo rnams la ma yin no/_/bum pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid do[#]/_/rdul phran yongs su bsal na ni/_/der snang shes pa nyams 'gyur phyir/_/rdzas su yod pa rnams la ni 'brel
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa can bsal du zin kyang kha dog la sogs pa bzhin du rang gi blo 'dor bar byed [#]do/_/de lta bas na dbang po'i blo rnams kyi yul ni phyi rol na ma yin par 'thad do/_/nang gi shes bya'i ngo bo ni/_/phyi rol ltar snang gang yin de[#]/_/don yin phyi rol gyi don med bzhin du phyi rol lta
[\[87a.2\]]bur snang ba nang na yod pa kho na dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no/_/rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/_/de rkyen nyid kyang yin phyir ro/_/nang gi rnam par shes pa ni don du snang ba dang /_de las skyes pa yin pas/_chos nyid gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir nang na yod pa kho na dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no/_/re zhig
[\[87a.3\]]de ltar snang ba nyid yin la ni rag la[#]/_de'i phyogs gcig po lhan cig skyes pa go ji ltar rkyen yin zhe na/_gcig na'ang mi 'khrul phyir na rkyen/_/lhan cig par gyur du zin kyang 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir gzhan las skye ba'i [#]rkyen du 'gyur te/_'di ltar gtan tshigs yod pa dang med pa [# ]
[\[87a.4\]]dag ni yod pa dang med pa dag gi de dang ldan pa nyid na rgyu [#]dang ldan pa rim gyis skye ba dag gi yang mtshan nyid yin par smra'o/_/yang na/_nus pa 'jog phyir rim gyis yin/_/rim gyis kyang yin te/_don du snang bas [#]de ni rang snang ba dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed par [#]nus pa/_rnam par
[\[87a.5\]]shes pa'i rten can byed pas mi 'gal lo/_/gal te 'o na ni [#]nang gi gzugs kho na dmigs pa'i rkyen yin na/_ji ltar de dang mig la brten na [#]mig gi rnam par shes pa skye zhe na/_lhan cig byed dbang nus pa yi[#]/_/ngo bo gang yin dbang po'ang yin/_/dbang po ni rang gi 'bras bu las nus
[\[87a.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rjes su dpag gi 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid du ni ma yin no/_/de yang rnam rig la mi 'gal/_/nus pa'i rnam par shes pa la yod kyang rung /_bstan du med pa'i rang gi ngo bo la yod kyang rung ste/_'bras bu skyed pa [#]la khyad par med do/_/de ltar yul gyi ngo bo dang /_/nus pa phan tshun
[\[87a.7\]]rgyu can dang /_/thog ma med du 'jug pa yin/_/mig ces bya ba'i nus pa dang /_nang gi gzugs la brten [#]nas rnam par shes pa don du snang ba dmigs kyis ma bstan pa [#]skye'o/_/'di gnyis kyang phan tshun gyi rgyu can dang /_thog ma med pa'i dus can [#]yin te/_res [#]'ga' na nus pa yongs su
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]smin pa las rnam par shes pas [#]yul gyi rnam pa nyid [#]'byung la res 'ga' ni de'i rnam pa la nus pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa las [#]de gnyis gzhan nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid du ci dgar brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar nang gi dmigs pa ni chos nyid gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir yul du mthong ngo [#]/_/dmigs
[\[87b.2\]]pa brtags [#]pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa'o[#]//[ {D4207}#]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_tri kA la pa rIk+Sha nA ma/_bod skad du/_dus gsum brtag pa zhes bya ba/_dang por yod dang de las yod/_/de nas med dang rim 'gal [#]te/_/_dus gsum de ni
[\[87b.3\]]de ltar dmigs/_/de ni de ltar rang bzhin min/_/ji ltar dbang po bslad tsam las/_/sgro 'dogs pa ni skye ba ltar/_/de bzhin bstan [#]pas skye ba'i blo/_/rkyen dag gis ni don rnams la/_/thams cad min pa'i yul snang ba/_/rkyen dang sgra la brten nas ni/_/don ni spyi yi ngo bo dang /_/rang
[\[87b.4\]]gi ngo bos rtogs par byed/_/ngo bo ldog pa tha dad dag_/'jig rten lam la gnas nas ni/_/shes pa'i dbang dang mngon brjod pa/_/byis dang mkhas pa 'dra ba yin/_/don gyi ngo bos [#]kun ma dag_/shes pa'i rang bzhin med brten pa/_/de ni shin tu dag pa gzhan/_/gcig brjod rang
[\[87b.5\]]bzhin med pa'o/_/nye bar bslad phyir shes pa ni/_/phyi rol rnam par snang ba yin/_/chu rnyog bzhin du de de yin[#]/_/_tshogs pa 'dra ba tha dad skyes/_/ji ltar don gyi [#]'bras byin zhes/_/dag pa min par rnam par gnas/_/de ltar don la der rten can/_/rang gi ngo bos bar du chod/_/'di
[\[87b.6\]]ltar don dang sgra dang ni/_/shes pa las ni phyin ci log_/dngos dang dngos med ma phye bas/_/_tha snyad la ni 'jug pa ste/_/ji ltar dngos po nyer bsten [#]nas/_/de ni dngos med rjes su rtogs/_/de ltar dngos med nyer bstan [#]nas/_/de ni dngos po'i rjes su rtogs/_/dngos las
[\[87b.7\]]dngos po skye min na/_/dngos po rjes su snang byed min/_/gcig las bdag nyid gzhan min la/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par brtags[#]/_/dngos med rjes su snang med phyir/_/rab tu sgrub byed rgyu ma yin/_/snang ldan la yang dngos po yi/_/rgyus ni ci zhig byed par
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'gyur/_/de phyir thams cad dngos med dam/_/yang na thams cad dngos por 'dod/_/gnas skabs gzhan du cung zad kyang /_/gcig las bden par gnas ma yin/_/gnyis med nyid kyang thams cad 'dir/_/rang gi ngo bos mtshan nyid gcig_/_
[\[88a.2\]]kun tu brtags [#]kyi tha snyad kyis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du dmigs/_/gnas skabs bzhi yang ji ltar ni/_/rang bzhin med la rab tu brtags/_/de ltar gsum dmigs pa yang de/_/dngos dang dngos med la brten yin/_/mi 'gal ba dang 'gal ba'am/_/yod dang med pa'ang
[\[88a.3\]]de nyid min/_/rim dang rim pa med pa yang /_/dngos dang dngos med la dmigs min/_/mi 'gal ba dang 'gal ba dang /_/yod dang med pa'ang de nyid min/_/rim dang rim pa med pa yang /_/des ni dngos po mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pas dus gsum la/_/tha dad srid pa ma
[\[88a.4\]]yin no/_/de lta bas na dngos po yang /_/dus gsum du ni rigs ma yin/_/bdag gi [#]de nyid dor nas ni/_/gzhan las rigs pa ma yin no/_/bdag gi de nyid gzhan las dang /_/rang las kyang ni mi rigs so/_/'gal ba sna tshogs kyang de ni/_/phan pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/_
[\[88a.5\]]de nyid gzhan nyid yongs bor ba'i/_/tha snyad la ni 'jug pa med/_/dngos med dngos por yod min te/_/dngos po [#]bdag nyid nyams phyir ro/_/phra [#]mo'i yod nyid gang la ni/_/nag mos gnod pa gang yang med/_/khra mo yang ni med ces te/_/nag mo la ni brtag bya min/_/dngos med
[\[88a.6\]]gal te dngos yin na/_/de la dpyad pa 'dir 'gyur te/_/de yang de tshe dngos po yang /_/yang ni dpyad pa 'dir 'gyur te/_/dngos med phyir na 'das pa ni/_/gang phyir tha snyad spyod yul phyir/_/de la dngos dbang tha dad ni/_/ma lus tshig gis rigs pa min/_/rten med don gyis brten [# ]
[\[88a.7\]]gnas pa/_/rgyu ni dmigs pa ma yin no/_/gal te dngos po med pa yang /_/rgyu las mthong ba yin zhe na/_/de yi dang po'i gnas skabs gang /_/dngos po 'di yi rten yin yang /_/_dang po'i gnas skabs dngos med la/_/de gnyis yod pa ma yin no/_/phyi ma yod dang med ces
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa'i/_/tshig ni brjod pa dag gi rgyu/_/rten med don gyi [#]gnas 'di nas ma phyi la chad[#]/_/_'di yis tshig ni rab tu brjod/_/shin tu ngo mtshar che ba skyes/_/gang phyir cha med gang rim med/_/dngos rnams dang por gyur pa yis/_/bdag gi de nyid rab tu bstan/_/_rnam rtog gis ni yongs gzhag pa'i/_/_
[\[88b.2\]]sgo nas rdzas rnams kun gyi [#]ni/_/tha snyad rnam par brjod pa yin/_/de phyir nus par 'dod sems pa/_/'di yang rtag par smra ba na/_/dngos nyid rim par smras pa yin/_/dngos las rim pa gzhan ma yin/_/ji ltar dngos dang dngos med pa/_/gzhan du cung zad rtog [#]med ltar/_/_
[\[88b.3\]]rim dang cig car cung zad ni/_/de nyid du ni tha dad med/_/de phyir nus pa'i rnam pa'i chas/_/rtag pa yod pa med pa bdag_/don gcig rjod par byed pa'i sgra/_/rang bzhin du ma rab tu bstan/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rnam dag la/_/rab rib kyis ni bslad pa'i mig[# ]/skra shad kyis ni
[\[88b.4\]]kun gang ltar/_/sna tshogs su ni mngon par rtogs/_/de ltar 'dir yang rnam shes ni/_/rnam par mi 'gyur ma rig pas/_/chu rnyog bzhin du zhugs pa ni/_/tha dad gzugs su rnam par 'jug_/dus gsum brtag pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa
[\[88b.5\]]rdzogs so//_//pan+Di ta chen po shAn tA ka [#]ra gu pa ta'i zhal snga nas dang [#]/_lo tsA [#]ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//[{D4208}#]@##/_/rgya'i skad du/_g.yin [#]ming gzhai' cing li'i lun/_bod skad du/_tshad ma'i
[\[88b.6\]]bstan bcos rigs [#]pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/_'jam pa'i [#]dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgrub nus pa dang sun 'byin nus/_/ltar snang bcas pas gzhan go byed/_/mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag_/ltar snang bcas pas bdag rig byed/_/'dir 'di skad ces pa bstan
[\[88b.7\]]bcos rnams kyi don kun las btus pa yin la/_de la rnam gzhag la sogs pa tshig rnams sgrub par byed de/_phyogs dang /_gtan tshigs dang /_de rnams du mar dbye yang phyir rgol rnams 'dris pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i phyir mngon par ston to/_/'dir bsgrub bya'i mtshan
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]nyid ni sgrub pa'i chos can la chos kyi khyad par sgrub par byed pa ste/_rang gis bsgrub [#]par bya bar 'dod pa 'di ni bsgrub bya yin no/_dper na sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa lta bu'o/_/gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni tshul gsum tshang ba'o/_/tshul gsum gang zhe na/_phyogs kyi
[\[89a.2\]]chos kyi ltos bzhi [#]la yod pa dang /_mthun phyogs la yod pa dang /_mi mthun phyogs la med pa'o/_/mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs gang zhe na/_bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis [#]mthun pa ni mthun phyogs su brjod do/_/dper na mi rtag pa [#]sgrub pa la bum pa la sogs pa'ang mi
[\[89a.3\]]rtag pa yin pas mthun phyogs yin no/_/mi mthun phyogs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa ni ma yin no/_/dper na gang rtag pa yin pa de byas pa ma yin pas khyab nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin no/_/'di dag byas pa nyid dam brtsal ma thag tu byung ba dang /_
[\[89a.4\]]phyogs chos yin la mthun phyogs la yod par nges pa yin no/_/mi mthun phyogs la med pa yin te/_mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs yin no/_/dpe yang gnyis su yod de/_dang po chos mthun pa'i dpe dang /_gnyis pa chos mi mthun pa'i dpe'o/_/chos mthun
[\[89a.5\]]pa'i dpe ni don gang yin pa de la gtan tshigs su mthun phyogs la yod pa ste/_dper na byas pa [#]de mi rtag par mthong ste bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no/_/chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ni bsgrub bya'i don med pa gang yin pa de la gtan tshigs yod pa ni ma yin te zhes bstan pa'o/_/_
[\[89a.6\]]dper na gang rtag pa de byas pa ma yin par mthong ste nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin no/_/'dir tha snyad du mi rtag pa'i sgra ni rtag pa ma yin par mtshon rung yin pa dang /_byas pa'i sgra ni ma byas pa ma yin par mtshon rung yin la/_med pa zhes brjod pa'i sgras yod pa ma
[\[89a.7\]]yin par bstan to/_/'di skad du du mar brjod pa de dag phyir rgol rnams go bar ston la sgrub par byed pa zhes brjod do/_/dper na sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa ni dam bca' ba'i tshig yin no/_/byas pa'i phyir ni gtan tshigs yin no/_/gang byas pa de mi rtag par mthong ste
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no/_/mthun phyogs su brjod la yod pa'i rjes 'gro yin no/_/gang rtag pa de byas pa ma yin par mthong ste nam mkha' bzhin no/_/ldog par brjod la ya gyal gsum po ni zhes sgrub par byed pa yang dag go/_/bsgrub [#]par bya bar 'dod kyang mngon
[\[89b.2\]]sum la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsgrub bya ltar snang ngo /_/mngon sum gyis [#]bsal ba dang /_rjes dpag gis [#]bsal ba dang /_yid ches pas [#]bsal ba dang /_grags pas bsal ba dang /_rang tshig gis [#]bsal ba dang /_bsgrub bya'i chos ma grub pa dang /_
[\[89b.3\]]bsgrub bya'i chos can ma grub pa dang /_gnyis ka ma grub pa dang /_phan tshun grub pa'o/_/de la mngon sum gyis [#]bsal ba ni/_dper na sgra mnyan bya ma yin par brjod pa lta bu'o/_/rjes dpag gis bsal ba ni dper na bum pa la sogs pa rtag par brjod pa lta bu'o/_/_
[\[89b.4\]]yid ches pas [#]bsal ba ni dper na bye brag pa sgra [#]rtag par bsgrub [#]pa lta bu'o/_/grags pas [#]bsal ba ni dper na ri bong can zla ba ma yin te yod pa'i phyir zhes pa'am/_gzhan yang mi'i thod pa gtsang ba yin te sems can gyi cha shas yin pa'i phyir dung chos bzhin zhes brjod
[\[89b.5\]]pa lta bu'o/_/rang tshig gis [#]bsal ba ni dper na bdag gi ma mo gsham yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o/_/chos ma grub pa ni dper na sangs rgyas pa rnam grangs can pa la sgra 'jig yod sgrub pa lta bu'o/_/chos can ma grub pa ni dper na grangs can pas sangs rgyas pa la
[\[89b.6\]]bdag ni sems pa [#]yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o/_/gnyis ka ma grub pa ni dper na bye brag pas sangs rgyas pa las [#]bdag ni rgyu rkyen 'dus shing rten cing 'brel par sbyor ba'i byed pa po yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o/_/phan tshun grub pa ni dper na sgra ni mnyan bya yin no zhes
[\[89b.7\]]brjod pa lta bu'o/_/'di skad du du mar brjod pa dag ngo bo gsal [#]ba'i phyir dang /_bsgrub [#]mi dgos pa'i phyir dang /_bsgrub [#]par nus kyang 'bras bu med pa'i phyir bsgrub bya'i skyon yin pas ltar snang ngo /_/bsgrub bya ltar snang bstan zin to[#]/_/da ni gtan tshigs ltar snang bshad par bya'o/_/_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]ma grub pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_'gal ba 'di rnams gtan tshigs ltar snang ngo /_/ma grub pa'ang bzhi yod de/_gnyis ka la ma grub pa dang /_gang rung gcig la ma grub pa dang /_the tshom za nas ma grub pa dang /_/gzhi ma grub pa'o/_/gnyis ka la ma
[\[90a.2\]]grub pa ni dper na sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa la ming [#]gi gzung bya nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bkod pa lta bu'o/_/gang rung gcig la ma grub pa ni sgra mngon par gsal [#]bar 'dod pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas byas pa'i phyir zhes brjod pa lta bu'o/_/the tshom za nas ma grub pa ni the tshom za
[\[90a.3\]]pa'i rlangs pa la sogs pa skya bo'i rdzas kyi rtags mthong ba'i tshe 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa'i me yod ces sgrub pa lta bu'o/_/gzhi ma grub pa ni nam mkha' dngos por yod de yon tan rten [#]pa'i phyir zhes brjod na/_/nam mkha' med par 'dod pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas gzhi
[\[90a.4\]]ma grub pa'o/_/ma nges pa la drug yod de/_thun mong ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_mthun phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug la [#]mi mthun phyogs la khyab par 'jug pa dang /_mi mthun phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug la mthun phyogs la khyab par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[90a.5\]]gnyis ka'i phyogs re la [#]'jug pa dang /_'gal ba la mi 'khrul ba'o/_/da ni thun mong ba ni dper na sgra rtag pa yin te gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir rtag mi rtag gi phyogs dag la thun mong du 'jug pa'i phyir te/_ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no/_/'di ltar gzhal bya nyid yin
[\[90a.6\]]pa'i rtags ni bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no/_/sgra mi rtag pa nyid dam gzhal bya nyid yin pa'i rtags ni nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin sgra rtag pa nyid du dogs pas so/_/thun mong ma yin par brjod pa ni dper na sgra rtag ste mnyan bya [#]yin pa'i phyir te zhes brjod pa'i tshe rtag mi
[\[90a.7\]]rtag phyogs dag la rtag mi rtag las gzhan yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'dis the tshom za bar 'gyur ro/_/mthun phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug la mi mthun phyogs la khyab par 'jug pa ni dper na sgra brtsal [#]ma thag tu byung ba na mi yin te mi rtag pa nyid yin
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pa'i phyir te/_'dir bsgrub [#]bya'i chos brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba ni ma yin te/_'di mthun phyogs glog dang /_nam mkha' la sogs pa yin te/_mi rtag pa de nyid ni glog la sogs pa la yod la nam mkha' la sogs pa la med do/_/brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba ma
[\[90b.2\]]yin pa bsgrub bya'i chos de ni mi mthun phyogs bum pa la sogs pa la gtan tshigs khyab par yod la glog dang bum pa la sogs pa mthun chos byas na ma nges pa ste/_mi rtag pa nyid ni bum pa la sogs pa bzhin brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid dam/_mi rtag pa ni glog la
[\[90b.3\]]sogs pa bzhin brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba [#]ma yin pa nyid du dogs pas so/_/mi mthun phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la 'jug la mthun phyogs la khyab par 'jug pa ni dper na sgra brtsal ma thag tu byung bar bsgrub [#]pa la mi rtag pa'i phyir te brjod pa'i tshe bsgrub bya'i chos
[\[90b.4\]]brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba 'di mthun phyogs bum pa la sogs pa la mi rtag pa nyid khyab par yod la glog dang nam mkha' la sogs pa ni mi mthun phyogs yin te/_phyogs gcig glog la sogs pa la yod la nam mkha' la sogs pa phyogs gcig la med pas de yang sngar
[\[90b.5\]]bzhin ma nges pa yin no/_/gnyis ka'i phyogs [#]re la 'jug pa ni dper na sgra rtag ste thogs pa med pa'i phyir te/_'dir rtag par sgrub pa na mthun phyogs nam mkha' dang rdul phran la sogs pa yin te/_gtan tshigs thogs pa med pa de [#]nam mkha' la sogs pa la 'jug [#]la
[\[90b.6\]]rdul phran la mi 'jug go/_/mi mthun phyogs bum pa dang bde ba la sogs pa yin te/_bde ba la sogs pa la yod la [#]bum pa la sogs pa la yod pa ni ma yin no/_de'i phyir bde ba dang nam mkha' la dpe mthun par byas pa de'ang ma nges pa yin no/_/'gal ba la mi 'khrul
[\[90b.7\]]ba ni dper na sgra ni mi rtag pa yin te bsgrub bya ni byas pa'i phyir te dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin/_sgra sgrub pa de rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir te sgra nyid bzhin no/_/de gnyis ka la the tshom za ba yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yin no/_/'gal ba la bzhi ste/_chos kyi ngo bo dang /_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'gal ba'i gtan tshigs dang /_chos kyi khyad par dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs dang /_chos can rang ldog dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs dang /_chos can gyi 'khrul pa dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs so/_/'dir chos kyi ngo bo dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs
[\[91a.2\]]ni dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te byas pa'i phyir dang /_yang na brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i phyir zhes brjod na gtan tshigs 'di mi mthun phyogs la yod pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no/_/chos kyi khyad par dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ni dper na mig la sogs pa gzhan
[\[91a.3\]]gyi don byed pa yin te/_'dus shing bsags pa'i phyir te mal cha la sogs pa bzhin zhes brjod na/_gtan tshigs 'dis mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don byed par sgrub pa'am/_gzhan du na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par dang 'gal ba sgrub par byed par
[\[91a.4\]]'gyur te/_mal cha la sogs pa yang 'dus shing bsags pa yin te gzhan gyi [#]longs spyod pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/chos can gyi ngo bo dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ni dper na yod pa nyid ni rdzas dang yon tan las ma yin te/_rdzas gcig yod pa'i phyir dang /_yon tan dang
[\[91a.5\]]las yod pa'i phyir bye brag bzhin zhes brjod na/_gtan tshigs 'di rdzas ma yin pa sgrub par byed pa'am/_gzhan du na yod pa ma yin pa [#]sgrub par byed par 'gyur te/_de gnyis ka nges pa'i phyir ro/_/chos can gyi khyad par dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ni dper na
[\[91a.6\]]sngar gyi gtan tshigs de nyid bsgrub bya'i chos can khyad par yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa dang /_gzhan du na 'di dang 'gal ba'i sgrub par byed pa yod pa nyid ma yin par [#]sgrub par byed par 'gyur te/_rdzas la sogs pa 'gog bzhin du gnyis ka nges pa'i phyir ro/_/gtan
[\[91a.7\]]tshigs ltar snang bshad zin to[#]/_/da [#]ni dpe ltar snang brjod par bya ste[#]/_chos mthun pa'i dpe ltar snang [#]la'ang lnga yod de/_sgrub byed chos ma grub pa dang /_bsgrub bya chos ma grub pa dang /[# ]gnyis ka ma grub pa dang /_ma sbyar ba dang /_phyin ci log tu sbyor [#]ba'o/_/chos mi
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]mthun pa'i dpe ltar snang la [#]yang lnga yod de/_bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa med pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa ldog pa med pa dang /_gnyis ka ldog pa med pa dang /_ldog [#]pa ma bstan pa dang /_ldog pa phyin ci log tu sbyar ba'o/_/sgrub byed chos ma grub pa ni dper na sgra rtag ste
[\[91b.2\]]thogs pa med pa'i phyir/_gang thogs pa med pa ste [#]rtag par mthong ste/_rdul phra rab bzhin zhes brjod na/_ci'i phyir rdul phra rab la bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa nyid yin la sgrub byed kyi chos thogs pa med pa [#]ma grub pa ste/_rdul phra rab rnams thogs pa [#]nyid yin pa'i phyir
[\[91b.3\]]ro/_/bsgrub bya'i chos ma grub pa ni dper na tshor ba bzhin zhes brjod na/_sgrub par byed pa'i chos thogs pa med pa yod kyang bsgrub bya'i chos rtag pa nyid med de/_tshor ba thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/gnyis ka ma grub pa ni de la'ang gnyis yod de/_
[\[91b.4\]]yod pa dang /_med pa'o/_/gal te bum pa bzhin zhes brjod na/_yod pa la gnyis ka ma grub pa'o/_/gal te nam mkha' bzhin zhes brjod na/_nam mkha' med par 'dod pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas med pa la gnyis ka ma grub pa'o/_/ma sbyar ba ni don de la
[\[91b.5\]]dpe sbyor ba gtan med pas bum pa la sogs pa la sgrub byed dang bsgrub bya'i chos gnyis 'ba' zhig kho na ston pa ste dper na bum pa la byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid brjod pa lta bu'o/_/phyin ci log tu sbyar ba ni gang byas pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin te zhes
[\[91b.6\]]brjod par bya ba las mi rtag pa thams cad byas pa yin zhes brjod pa'o/_/de rnams ni mthun dpe ltar snang ngo /_/chos mi mthun pa'i [#]dpe ltar snang ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos [#]ldog pa med pa yin te/_re zhig dper na mi rtag pa rnams ni thogs bcas mthong ba min te
[\[91b.7\]]rdul phra rab bzhin no/_/rdul phra rab ni bsgrub bya'i chos rtag pa nyid mi ldog pa yin te/_de ma yin pa'i rdul phra rab rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/_sgrub byed de'i chos ni thogs pa [#]med do/_/dper na gzhan gyi las bzhin zhes bsgrub bya ldog pa la [#]sgrub byed mi ldog pa
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ste/_pha rol gyi las rnams ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/gnyis ka ldog pa med pa [#]ni yod pa'i bstan bcos la ltos nas nam mkha' [#]bzhin zhes brjod na/_nam mkha' ni rtag pa nyid dang /_thogs pa med pa nyid mi ldog pa ste zhes nam
[\[92a.2\]]mkha' rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/_thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/ldog pa bstan pa ni dper na bum pa bzhin zhes brjod na/_mi rtag pa mthong ba nyid dang /_thogs bcas su mthong ba'i phyir ro[#]/_/ldog pa phyin ci log tu sbyar ba [#]ni thogs bcas thams cad mi rtag
[\[92a.3\]]pa yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar bsgrub bya dang /_gtan tshigs dang dper brjod pa rnams ni ltar snang ba yin te/_sgrub byed yang dag pa [#]ni ma yin no/_/des na [#]rang gis mngon par rig par bya ste/_mngon sum dang /_rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gnyis kho nar
[\[92a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/'dir mngon sum tshad ma ni rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba ste/_gzugs la sogs pa'i don la tha snyad la sogs pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba so sor mngon gyur mthong bas mngon sum tshad mar brjod do/_/rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma ni rtags rnams la ltos
[\[92a.5\]]nas don mthong ba yin te/_gtan tshigs ni tshul gsum pa'i sngar bstan zin to/_/de dag rtags la brten nas don rnams dpog pa yin la/_yang dag pa'i nges pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_me [#]yod shes pa'am mi rtag par shes pa la sogs pa ste rjes su dpag
[\[92a.6\]]pa'i tshad mar brjod do/_/tshad ma gnyis po de la yang dag pa'i shes pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin te/_rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/don byed nus pa'i dngos su gzhal ba'i phyir te tshad ma'ang yin no/_/rtog par shes pa'ang mngon sum ltar snang ngo /_/shes
[\[92a.7\]]pa rnams kyi [#]bum pa la sogs pa rtog [#]pa skyes pa de mngon sum ltar snang yin te/_shes pa de la don rang gi mtshan nyid mi snang ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te gtan tshigs ltar snang sngon du song ba la sogs pa [#]de'i rjes su don lta bur snang ba'i shes pa skyes pa de rjes dpag tshad ma'i
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ltar snang ste/_sngar [#]bshad pa bzhin du gtan tshigs ltar snang du ma rtags su bzung nas don lta bur snang ba dpag pa las skyes pa'i shes pa de rnams rjes dpag [#]tshad ma'i ltar snang ste/_yang dag par [#]rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas gal te sgrub par byed pa po'i skyon rnams yang dag [#]rjod par
[\[92b.2\]]byed pa ni sun 'byin yang dag pa'o/_/sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma tshang ba nyid dang /_bsgrub [#]bya'i skyon nyid dang /_ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang /_ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs dang /_'gal ba'i gtan tshigs dang /_dpe rnams kyi gtan tshigs gsal [#]bar bstan te/_phyir rgol gyi [#]'dri
[\[92b.3\]]ba rnams la legs par khong du chud par byed pas sun 'byin yang dag go/_/gal te sgrub byed kyi skyon rnams gsal bar mi brjod pa'am/_skyon ma yin pa ni sun 'byin ltar snang ste/_sgrub byed yan lag tshang ba la ma tshang bar brjod pa nyid dang /_bsgrub bya skyon med pa la [#]skyon can yin par
[\[92b.4\]]brjod pa dang /_gtan tshigs sgrub pa la dpe grub pa ni ma yin par brjod pa dang /_gtan tshigs nges pa la ma nges par brjod pa dang /_gtan tshigs ma [#]'gal ba la 'gal bar brjod pa dang /_dpe skyon can ma yin pa la dpe skyon can yin par brjod pa dang /_'di ltar thams cad sun
[\[92b.5\]]'byin ltar snang ngo /_/de dag gzhan gyi grub mtha' la skyon rnams gsal bar bstan mi nus pa'i phyir skyon ma yin par [#]brjod pa nyid do/_/don 'di re zhig gzhag go/_/tshig don cung zad bshad pa 'di/_/thog mar sgrub pa'i phyogs tsam yin/_/de dag tshul dang tshul min yang /_/_
[\[92b.6\]]mchog gi gzhan du shes par bya/_/tshad ma'i bstan bcos rig pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar las rgya'i lo tsA ba thang saM tsang gis bsgyur cing slad kyis rgya'i dge bshes [#]sing gyang jus dang /_bod kyi dge ba'i bshes
[\[92b.7\]]gnyen ston gzhon gyis bod skad du bsgyur zhing /_phyis gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba rgya nag chen po'i la'i btsun pa chos kyi rin chen gyis/_dpal ldan [#]sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du rgya'i dpe dang bod kyi dpe gnyis po legs par gtugs shing bcos te dag par bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]rgya'i dpe la rigs pa la 'jug pa zhes snang /_deng sang bod rnams rigs pa'i sgo zhes grags so//[# {D4209}#]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_he tu tsakra ha mAr+tha[#]/_bod skad du/_gtan tshigs kyi 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
[\[93a.2\]]lo/_/'khrul pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad pa'i/_/thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal nas/_/gtan tshigs tshul gsum 'khor lo [#]yi/_/gtan la dbab pa bshad par bya/_/rjes su dpag par bya ba la/_/yod dang med dang gnyis ka yi/_/yod pa la ni yang dag ste/_/med dang gnyis ka ma grub
[\[93a.3\]]yin/_/the tshom gnyis te ma grub bzhin/_/ma grub sbyar ba de bzhin du/_/mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang /_/med pa de bzhin gnyis ka dang /_/mi mthun phyogs la de bzhin no/_/gsum la rnam pa gsum gsum ste[#]/_/steng 'og gnyis la yang dag go_/logs la 'gal ba gnyis
[\[93a.4\]]yin te/_/zur bzhi thun mong ma nges bzhin[#]/_/dbus na thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang /_/byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung dang /_/mi rtag rtsol byung lus can min[#]/_/rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung dang /_/rtag [#]dang rtag dang rtag pa dang /_/rtsol byung min dang mi rtag dang [#]/_/rtag pa la ni sgrub pa bkod/_/steng 'og _
[\[93a.5\]]mi mthun logs dang sbyar/_/yang dag gtan tshigs gnyis yin no/_/logs dang mi mthun steng 'og sbyar/_/'gal ba'i gtan tshigs gnyis yin no/_/zur bzhi tha dad [#]snol mar sbyar/_/thun mong ma nges rnam pa bzhi/_/logs gnyis thad kar sbyar bas ni[#]/_/thun mong ma yin ma nges pa'o/_/gtan tshigs
[\[93a.6\]]'khrul 'khor rnam dgu yis/_/dpe yi [#]rnam pa 'di lta ste/_/nam mkha' bum dang bum mkha' dang /_/bum pa glog dang nam mkha' bzhin/_/mkha' dang bum pa glog bzhin [#]dang /_/glog dang nam mkha' bum bzhin dang /_/bum dang glog dang mkha' bzhin dang /_/nam mkha' rdul phran las bum bzhin/_/de ni nges pa'i dbang
[\[93a.7\]]byas yin/_/the tshom za ba'i lugs la ni/_/yod dang med dang yod med dang /_/phyogs gcig mtha' dag sbyor [#]bas so/_/phyogs chos dgu'i 'khor lo [#]slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//za hor gyi [#]mkhas pa bo d+hi satwa dang /_dge slong d+ha rma A lo [#]kas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//[ # ]
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]{D4210}]@#/_/rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel bzhugs so//[# ]
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_pra mA Na bAr ti kA [#]kA ri kA/_bod skad du/_tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal
[\[94b.2\]]zhing /_/zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba/_/kun tu bzang po'i 'od zer dag_/kun nas 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye bo phal cher phal la chags shing shes rab rtsal med pas na legs bshad rnams/_/don du mi gnyer kho nar ma
[\[94b.3\]]zad phrag dog dri ma dag gis sdang bar yang /_/yongs gyur des na bdag la 'di ni gzhan la phan pa yin zhes bsam pa'ang med//sems ni yun ring legs bshad goms pa lhur len bskyed phyir 'di la dga' ba skyes/!/phyogs
[\[94b.4\]]chos de chas khyab pa yi/_/gtan tshigs de ni rnam gsum nyid/_/med na mi 'byung nges phyir ro/_/gtan tshigs ltar snang de las gzhan/_/rgyu la rang bzhin ji snyed cig_/med na mi 'byung 'bras bu ni/_/gtan tshigs rang bzhin yod tsam
[\[94b.5\]]dang /_/'brel pa can gyi ngo bo yang /_/tshad ma rnams ni mi 'jug pa/_/med la mi 'jug 'bras bu can/_/gtan tshigs bye brag la ltos nas/_/'ga' zhig med shes 'bras bu can/_/'gal dang 'bras bu dag grub dang /_/rgyu dang
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]ngo bo bltar rung ba'i/_/bdag nyid dag ni ma grub pa/_/med don can mi [#]dmigs rnam bzhi/_/de dang 'gal ba yi ni rgyu/_/dmigs pa'i sbyor ba gang yin de/_/rgyu mtshan dag ni 'gal ba nyid/_/med na 'khrul pa can yin no/_/'gal 'bras la yang
[\[95a.2\]]yul dang ni/_/dus la sogs la bltos par 'dod/_/gzhan du 'khrul 'gyur mi grang ba/_/sgrub pa la ni thal ba bzhin/_/rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras skye bar/_/rjes su dpog pa gang yin pa/_/don gzhan la ni mi ltos phyir/_/de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod/_/_
[\[95a.3\]]tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nus pa rnams/_/'gyur ba dang 'brel 'bras bu la/_/ma nges pa ni nyid yin te/_/gegs byed pa dag srid phyir ro/_/tshogs pa gcig la rag lus pa'i/_/gzugs la sogs pa ros rtogs pa/_/rgyu chos rjes su dpag pa ste/_/du bas bud shing
[\[95a.4\]]'gyur ba bzhin/_/nus pa 'jug pa med par ni/_/ro med de nyid gzhan gyi rgyu/_/de ltar 'das dus gcig rnams rtogs/_/de ni 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes/_/rgyu ma tshogs pas 'bras bu ni/_/rjes su dpog pa gang yin de[#]/_/lhag ma dang ldan [#]nus med
[\[95a.5\]]phyir/_/lus las [#]'dod chags rjes dpog bzhin/_/mi mthun phyogs la ma mthong ba/_/tsam gyis [#]'bras spyi mthong ba las/_/gtan tshigs shes pa tshad ltar snang /_/tshig las chags can la sogs bzhin/_/mi mthun phyogs la ma mthong ba/_/tsam gyis 'khrul
[\[95a.6\]]pa med pa min/_/'khrul pa srid pa can nyid phyir/_/phru ba'i 'bras ni tshos pa bzhin/_/gang zhig ma mthong ba tsam gyis/_/ldog pa rab tu ston byed pa/_/de ni the tshom rgyu yin phyir/_/de la lhag ma ldan zhes brjod/_/gtan tshigs kyi ni tshul gsum la'ang /_/de yis ma
[\[95a.7\]]grub bzlog don dang /_/'khrul pa can gyi gnyen por ni/_/nges pa brjod par mdzad pa yin/_/'khrul pa can gyi gnyen por ni/_/mi mthun chos brjod gang yin pa/_/gal te ma mthong 'bras can de/_/de ma smos kyang rtogs par 'gyur/_/med ces bya ba'i tshig gis kyang /_/_
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]de med kho na min gal te/_/ji ltar med rigs de brjod na/_/de tshe med ces bya bar rtogs/_/gal te ma mthong bas ldog 'gyur/_/ci ste lhag [#]ldan 'khrul can yin/_/ldog pa can yang gtan tshigs 'gyur/_/ma grub sbyor [#]ba brjod bya min/_/khyad par rnam par gcod pa yi/_/_
[\[95b.2\]]gtan tshigs su 'gyur ma mthong phyir/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod ce na/_/da ni ma mthong las med min/_/de bzhin du ni gzhan la yang /_/tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa srid/_/ma mthong phyir reg mthong ba la/_/mi ldan 'khrul pa med pa can/_/yul la sogs pa'i
[\[95b.3\]]khyad par las/_/rdzas la nus pa tha dad snang /_/de la gcig mthong gzhan la de/_/yod par nges pa rigs ma yin/_/bdag dang sa la shes [#]yod sogs/_/med par rab sgrub byed min pa'i/_/ma dmigs gang yin de kho na/_/gtan tshigs med sgrub yin nam ci/_/_
[\[95b.4\]]de phyir de tsam dang 'brel ba'i/_/ngo bo nyid kyis [#]ngo bo nyid/_/ldog par 'gyur ba'am rgyu yis ni/_/'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir/_/de lta min na gcig log pas/_/ji ltar gzhan ni ldog par 'gyur/_/mi la rta mi bdog ces te/_/phyugs kyang bdog pa min nam ci/_/_
[\[95b.5\]]de bzhin gcig gcig nye ba'i phyir/_/ji lta [#]gzhan ni nye bar 'gyur/_/mi la phyugs ni bdog ces te/_/de bzhin rta yang bdog gam ci/_/de phyir chos mi mthun dpe la/_/nges par 'di la gzhi mi 'dod/_/de dag med na'ang de med ces/_/brjod pa las kyang de rtogs
[\[95b.6\]]phyir/_/dpe la de yi ngo bo dang /_/rgyu dngos de dag mi shes la/_/ston te [#]mkhas pa rnams la ni/_/gtan tshigs 'ga' [#]zhig brjod par zad/_/de nyid kyi phyir 'brel shes [#]na/_/gnyis las gang yang rung smras pas/_/don gyis go bas cig shos la/_/dran pa yang
[\[95b.7\]]dag skye bar 'gyur/_/de phyir rgyu dang rang bzhin dag_/med pas [#]'ga' zhig bsgrub [#]pa'i yang /_/gtan tshigs yin te dmigs par ni/_/rigs ldan de mi dmigs pa [#]yang /_/de ltar mi dmigs 'di rnam gsum/_/bshad kyang rnam pa du ma ste/_/de dang de 'gal la
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]sogs pa/_/ma rtogs rtogs dbye'i sbyor sgo nas/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'am/_/rang bzhin nges par byed pa las/_/med na mi 'byung nges pa ste/_/ma mthong las min mthong las min/_/gzhan du gzhan na [#]gzhan dag dang /_/nges par yod pa'i
[\[96a.2\]]nges pa gang /_/don gzhan rgyu mtshan can gyi [#]chos/_/yin na gos la tshon bzhin no/_/chos don gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan can/_/yin par gyur na de gzhan [#]nyid/_/phyis 'byung phyir na rgyu nyid min/_/'bras bu na yang ga la nges/_/me yi 'bras bu du ba ste/_/'bras bu'i [#]chos kyi
[\[96a.3\]]rjes 'jug phyir/_/de med par ni de yod na/_/rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das 'gyur/_/rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir/_/rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur/_/dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig_/'byung ba bltos pa las yin no/_/gal te brgya byin spyi bo me'i/_/rang
[\[96a.4\]]bzhin yin na de nyid me/_/'on te de me'i rang bzhin min/_/ji ltar de las du ba 'byung /_/du ba'i [#]rgyu yi rang bzhin me/_/de yi nus pa'i bye brag ldan/_/du ba du ba'i rgyu min las/_/'byung na de ni rgyu med 'gyur/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las/_/gang zhig gang gi rjes 'gror
[\[96a.5\]]mthong /_/de yi rang bzhin de rgyu can/_/de phyir mi mthun las mi 'byung /_/bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/rang bzhin la yang med mi 'byung /_/yod pa tsam dang 'brel ba yin/_/de med na ni yod pa'i bdag_/med 'gyur tha dad med phyir ro/_/gang phyir dngos kun
[\[96a.6\]]rang bzhin gyis/_/rang rang ngo bo la gnas phyir/_/mthun dngos gzhan gyi dngos dag las/_/ldog pa la ni brten pa can/_/de phyir gang dang gang las don/_/ldog pa de yi rgyu can gyi/_/rigs dbye de yi khyad par gyis/_/rtogs 'gyur ba dag rab tu byed/_/de phyir khyad par gang
[\[96a.7\]]zhig chos/_/gang gis go bar 'gyur ba de/_/de las gzhan gyis nus ma yin/_/des na tha dad rnam par gnas/_/don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig_/bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la/_/tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang /_/ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod/_/gzugs chos
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mthun pa mthong ba las/_/nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar/_/gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/_/yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na/_/de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis/_/yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid/_/'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas/_/sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa
[\[96b.2\]]yin/_/bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/rjes su dpag pa las kyang dngos/_/'dzin na chos gcig nges gyur pas/_/chos kun 'dzin te sel ba la/_/nyes pa 'di [#]ni thal mi 'gyur/_/de phyir de ltar rtags [#]sel ba'i/_/yul can yin par [#]rab tu bsgrags/_/_
[\[96b.3\]]gzhan du chos can grub gyur na/_/de las ma grub gzhan ci yod/_/mthong ba 'ga' la'ang shes pa gang /_/spyi yi don can rnam rtog pa/_/gzhan gyi [#]cha sgro ma btags pa/_/de tsam sel ba'i spyod yul can/_/nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid/_/gnod bya gnod
[\[96b.4\]]byed ngo bo'i phyir/_/'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la/_/'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin/_/cha shas sgro 'dogs ji snyed pa/_/de bsal phyir na nges pa dang /_/sgra yang de snyed kho na des/_/de dag spyod yul tha dad can/_/gzhan du dngos po gcig pu la[#]/_/sgra 'am blo
[\[96b.5\]]gcig gis khyab na/_/gzhan yul ma yin de yi phyir/_/rnam grangs pa ni nyid du 'gyur/_/gang gi ltar na blos khyad par/_/sna tshogs can don tha dad 'dzin/_/khyad par sna tshogs la phan pa'i/_/yan lag nus las dbyer med pa'i/_/bdag nyid bdag nyid
[\[96b.6\]]kun bzung na/_/phan bya'i bye brag gang ma nges/_/de dag bdag nyid la 'brel phyir/_/gcig shes na ni gnyis ka bzung /_/chos phan nus rnams tha dad na/_/de dag de'i ci yin gal te/_/de yis de dag la phan med/_/de lta yin na thug med 'gyur/_/gcig
[\[96b.7\]]la phan byed bzung na ni/_/de la mthong na ma mthong ba/_/phan pa gzhan min de yi phyir/_/de bzung na ni thams cad bzung /_/gal te 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/bzung ba la yang gzhan 'dod na/_/de ni rnam gcod yul can grub/_/de las gzhan pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]sgro 'dogs med pa'i yul la ni/_/'jug phyir gzhan yang ngo bo gang /_/nges pa rnams kyis ma nges pa/_/de ni ji ltar de yul yin/_/khyad par cha shas rnams spangs pa/_/mngon sum gyis ni bzung ba la'ang /_/khyad par gang la rtogs pa yi/_/_
[\[97a.2\]]rkyen yod de ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de la'ang gzhan las ldog pa dang /_/gzhan las log pa zhes bya ba'i/_!_/sgra dang nges pa nyid dag [#]ni/_/brda yi rjes su byed pa yin[#]/_/gnyis kas gcig gcig brjod mod kyi/_/brjod bya'i gzhan [#]gyi khyad par gyis/_/rnam dbye
[\[97a.3\]]tha dad [#]'byed pa yis/_/tha dad don bzhin sgrub par byed/_/khyad par gzhan ni spong ba dang /_/mi spong ba dag de gnyis kyi/_/brda yi bye brag rtogs pa po'i/_/'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i gzhi/_/kun la rdzas dang dngos brjod pa'i/_/sgra yi khyad par 'di nyid do[#]/_/_
[\[97a.4\]]de phyir de dag brjod bya la/_/khyad par 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/don de shes par byed 'dod pas/_/de la phan pa'am byed ldan nam/_/gal te gzhan gyis brjod kyang rung /_/de las khyad par gzhan med do/_/de phyir gzhan sel yul la ni/_/de ldan phyogs la brjod pa
[\[97a.5\]]bsal/_/rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag_/tha dad nyid na nyes par 'gyur/_/gang dag gi tshig dngos po'i dbang /_/lhur brjod brjod [#]'dod mi brten pa/_/de dag la [#]ni drug pa dang /_/tshig dbye la sogs klan ka rigs/_/phyi rol don la mi ltos pa'i/_/tshig gang
[\[97a.6\]]smra [#]pos ji lta bur/_/rjod byed nyid du nges byed pa/_/de de bzhin du rjod byed yin/_/btsun mo rnams grong drug la sogs/_/tha dad dngos min bzhag [#]pa 'am/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin mkha' nyid ces/_/bya ba 'di la rgyu ci yod/_/tha dad dngos rnams la brten nas/_/_
[\[97a.7\]]don gcig tu ni snang ba'i blo/_/gang gi rang gi ngo bo yis/_/gzhan gyi ngo bo sgrib byed pa/_/sgrib byed des bdag tha dad kyang /_/tha dad pa nyid bsgribs pa yis/_/dngos rnams ngo bo 'ga' zhig gis/_/tha dad min pa lta bur snang /_/de la bsam pa'i dbang gis na/_/spyi yod
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]par ni rab tu bsgrags/_/de yis ji ltar kun brtags pa/_/de ni dam pa'i don du med/_/gsal ba rnams ni rjes mi 'gro/_/rjes 'gro gzhan ni snang ba med/_/shes las tha dad ma yin pa/_/ji ltar don gzhan 'brang bar 'gyur/_/des na don la bdag gcig
[\[97b.2\]]tu/_/'dzin pa'i rnam rtog 'di log pa/_/ming don gang ldan phan tshun du/_/tha dad 'di yi [#]sa bon yin/_/gcig rtogs don shes la sogs pa/_/don gcig sgrub la 'ga' zhig ni/_/tha dad yin yang rang bzhin gyis/_/nges te dbang po la sogs bzhin/_/dper
[\[97b.3\]]sman kha cig tha dad kyang /_/lhan cig pa 'am so so yis/_/rims la sogs pa zhi byed par/_/mthong gi [#]gzhan gyis ma yin bzhin/_/khyad par med phyir spyis ma yin/_/de dag zhing sogs tha dad kyang /_/khyad par med par thal 'gyur phyir/_/brtan pas phan 'dogs
[\[97b.4\]]med phyir yang /_!_/rang bzhin de 'dzin rnam rtog blo/_/don med kyang de don can 'dra/_/de yi 'bras can min don las/_/tha dad mthar thug skye ba gang /_/de la ngo bo phyi rol dang /_/gcig lta gzhan las log lta bur/_/snang ba gang yin brtag pa yi/_/yan lag med phyir de nyid
[\[97b.5\]]min/_!_/shes la yod pa'i don de rnams/_/'di ltar ldog pa'i ngo bo can/_/des na tha dad min lta bur/_/de nyid gzhan las log par yang /_/snang ste de la spyi dang ni/_/gzhi mthun spyod yul can dag gi_/shes pa dang ni brjod pa yis/_/tha snyad nor don can rgyas byed/_!_/_
[\[97b.6\]]dngos po rnams kyi de kun yang [#]/_/phan tshun med la brten pa ste/_/des na gzhan sel yul can dang /_/gang la dngos dang 'brel yod pa/_/dngos po rnyed pa'i rten yin te/_/rjes dpag ji skad bshad ji bzhin/_/'khrul par 'dra yang gzhan las min/_/mar me'i 'od las
[\[97b.7\]]nor bu bzhin/_!_/de la du ma'ang 'bras gcig can/_/de 'bras can min gzhan rten can/_/brjod dang shes pas gcig nyid du/_/tha snyad rab tu 'jug par byed/_/de bzhin gcig kyang du ma byed/_/de dngos yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_/de 'bras can min don [#]las ni/_/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]tha dad pas chos sna tshogs shes/_/sgra don 'di dang gzhi mthun nyid/_/yod pa min yang ji lta bur/_/grags pa bzhin du brjod pa ste/_/dngos la 'di ni mi srid do/_!_/chos dang chos can rnam gzhag dang /_/tha dad tha dad min ci 'dra/_/de nyid don ni ma [# ]
[\[98a.2\]]brtags par/_/'jig rten ji ltar grags de la/_/de bzhin kho nar brten nas ni/_/bsgrub bya sgrub pa kun bzhag pa/_/dam pa'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin/_/dam pa'i don gyi don rnams ni/_/rang gis [#]'dre dang tha dad med/_/de la ngo bo
[\[98a.3\]]gcig pa dang /_/du ma blo yis bslad pa yin/_/de spyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i/_/bye brag 'di ni blo don la/_/de nyid la gzhan las ldog pas/_/chos kyi bye brag rab tu brtag_/bsgrub bya sgrub par rtog pa la/_/dngos po mthong ba nyams pa'i phyir/_/khyad par spyi dang 'dres pa
[\[98a.4\]]'dir/_/rang gi mtshan nyid gzung bya min/_/de ni spyi dang khyad par gyi/_/rnam sogs cir yang gzung bya min/_/bye brag khyad par mang po rnams/_/de gcig la ni mi rung phyir/_/de yi ngo bo kun las log_/de de bzhin du rtog byed pa'i/_/sgra yod ma yin rtog pa yang /_/_
[\[98a.5\]]spyi nyid du ni 'jug phyir ro/_/zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/_!_/sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags ston/_/de ni tha snyad ched du byas/_/de tshe rang gi mtshan nyid med/_/des na de la brdar ma yin/_/ci nas skyes bu don byed par/_/nus pa shes nas de bsgrub [#]phyir/_/_
[\[98a.6\]]'jug par 'gyur zhes don rnams la/_/rjod par byed pa sbyor bar byed/_/de la rigs don byed rung min/_!_/de ldan nus pa de yang ni/_/ci phyir dngos su sbyor mi byed/_/gal te mtha' yas phyir 'di mtshungs/_/de byed de byed ma yin las/_/log par mtshungs la cis ma byas/_/de
[\[98a.7\]]ldan nyes mtshungs phyir zhe na/_/bla ste rigs gzhan mi dgos so/_!_/de las gzhan pa yongs spangs nas/_/'jug 'gyur zhes kyang sgra brjod de/_!_/de yis de dag rnams las 'di/_/mi gcod na ni de ji ltar/_!_/gal te 'di la rnam gcod yod/_/sgra rnams dgos pa
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de tsam du/_/zad pa min nam khyed la der/_/spyi gzhan gyis ni ci zhig bya/_/gsal ba rnams ni tha dad kyang /_/bya ba de dang de byed pa'i/_/don rnams mthong nas gzhan mthong yang /_/de las gzhan dang bral ba yi/_/yul can gyi ni sgra rnams kyis/_/lhan cig sbyar nas ngo shes
[\[98b.2\]]byed/_!_/gzhan gyi ltar na'ang blo de ni/_/spyi ni 'ba' zhig nyid las min/_!_/rtag tu de tsam rnam shes na/_/gsal ba mi shes thal 'gyur phyir/_/de yi tshe na nam yang ni/_/de ldan 'brel pa ma bzung phyir/_/de dang ldan nges mi 'gyur bas/_/de la ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs/_!_/_
[\[98b.3\]]gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i/_/gsal rnams shes pa'i rgyu zhe na/_!_/dngos po gcig des de rnams kyi/_/tha dad pa nyid sel tam ci/_/tha dad phyir yang de rnams la/_/gcig gi rnam shes rgyur mi 'dod/_!_/gal te du ma'ang gcig bltos nas/_/tha dad min blo
[\[98b.4\]]skyed ce [#]na/_!_/de dag so so med par yang /_/de gcig gis kyang bskyed bya ba'i/_/blo la de rnams nus med phyir/_/blo yis 'dzin pa med pa yin/_!_/sngo sogs mig gi rnam shes la/_/nus pa so sor mthong ba'i phyir/_/tshogs la'ang nus grub gsal [#]ba la/_/ji ltar yang ni
[\[98b.5\]]de ltar min/_!_/gal te de dag gang rung la/_/bltos nas des [#]nus 'ba' zhig min/_/de dag de gcig la phan na/_/ji ltar blo gcig nyid la min/_/'di de rnams kyi [#]'bras bur 'gyur/_/phan 'dogs gang yin skyed [#]pa yin/_/gal te tha dad min [#]snang blo/_/tha dad rnams
[\[98b.6\]]la mi 'dod na/_/blo yi snang ba tha dad de/_/de dag mtshungs zhes 'dzin phyir ro/_!_/gal te de dag mtshungs na ni/_/ji ltar tha dad blos gzung bya/_!_/'bras bu gcig 'dra de dag gi_/'bras blo de yang tha dad do/_/zhe na gcig tu rtogs rgyu'i phyir/_blo ni tha dad med pa
[\[98b.7\]]yin/_/blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis[#]/_/gsal ba rnams kyang tha mi dad/_!_/de yang de 'bras can min bral/_!_/de las gzhan pa rjes 'gro ba'i/_/dngos ma mthong phyir bkag phyir yang /_!_/brda ni de rig [#]don can yin/_!_/de byed min la de byed dang /_/'dra ba'i ngo bor snang ba can/_/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]dngos po tha dad dngos tsam gyi/_/sa bon can don med pa'i blo/_/skyed par byed pa'ang de mi byed/_/yongs spangs yan lag ngo bo'i phyir/_/dngos po tha dad rten can phyir/_/don la mi slu yod par 'dod/_!_/de phyir gzhan sel yul can te[#]/_/de byed brten [#]pa'i
[\[99a.2\]]ngo bo'i phyir/_/shing ma yin las [#]ldog pa yis/_/shing don 'dzin na gnyis po dag_/phan tshun brten pas gcig 'dzin pa/_/med na gnyis ka mi 'dzin 'gyur/_/de yi phyir na brdar btags pa/_/mi srid do zhes kha cig smra/_/de dag gi ni brdar 'dogs la/_/shing min
[\[99a.3\]]rnam par gcod dam min/_/gal te rnam gcod shing gi don/_/'dzin pa med na ji ltar shes/_/brda las de dag mi sel na/_/tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa rnams/_/de yongs spangs nas 'jug par ni/_/mi 'gyur shing gi khyad par bzhin/_/gal te gzhan bkag mi sgrub par/_/_
[\[99a.4\]]mdun gnas gcig gcig rab bstan nas/_/'di shing yin zhes brda byed la/_/tha snyad 'dogs pa'i tshe na yang /_/de rtogs 'gyur la de yi phyir/_/nyes pa 'di ni med snyam na/_/'di yang shing yin 'di kho na/_/zhes bya'i thal ba ldog pa med/_!_/gcig rtogs zhes bya'i shes
[\[99a.5\]]pa ni/_/gcig la gnas pa'i rtogs pa pos/_/de dang de min rgyu don rnams/_/bdag nyid rnam par 'byed par byed/_!_/blo de la ni yod pa'i dngos/_/blo rgyu nyid du snang ba dang /_/rgyu min ngo bo bral ba dang /_/ngo bo gcig 'drar bdag nyid kyis/_/tha dad par ni shes
[\[99a.6\]]'gyur bas/_/tha dad pa la skad sbyor te/_/de las de rtogs 'gyur ba'i blo/_/'khrul pas dngos po gcig ltar rtogs/_!_/blo don 'ga' las rnam bzlog nas/_/don 'ga' zhig la 'jug bya'i phyir/_/sgra ni rab tu sbyor byed de/_/de don nges par gzung phyir ro/_/gzhan
[\[99a.7\]]du sbyor ba don med 'gyur/_!_/des na shes bya la sogs tshig_!_/tha snyad du ni 'jog rnams la/_/rnam par gcod pa 'ga' zhig yod/_!_/gang zhig gang las tha dad pa/_/de rnam [#]bzlog nas de dag las/_/tha dad khyad par mtshungs pa'i rgyu/_/rnam pa [#]snang ba can la 'god/_/_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]de nyid gzhan las ldog pa yis/_/dngos po de yi cha 'ga' zhig_/rtogs 'gyur zhes pas rab tu bshad/_/'di la'ang ngo bo cung zad med/_/sgra rnams las de rtogs nyid kyis/_/gzhan bzlog rtogs 'gyur de la ni/_/'ga' yis khyad par du byas pa/_/rtogs par
[\[99b.2\]]'gyur ba gzhan 'ga' med/_!_/sgra gnyis byed pa'ang ma yin te/_/phan tshun yod pa min phyir 'di/_/dngos med dngos po ldan nyid du/_/mthong ba blo yis bslad pa yin/_/de nyid phyir 'di don dam min/_!_/gzhan du dngos po las ldog pa/_/dngos por mi 'gyur 'di 'di
[\[99b.3\]]las/_/tha dad ces [#]ni brjod phyir ro/_!_/'dres pa'i don gcig gcod pa na/_/sgra'am rtags ni gcig pu [#]yis/_/bya byed de la bcad pa yi[#]/_/dngos po'i brjod bya ci yang med/_/gang gis rjod [#]par byed pa las/_/ma lus par ni rtogs 'gyur ba/_/dngos po'i nus pa
[\[99b.4\]]yin nges na/_/'bras bu du ma rten gcig 'gyur/_!_/rnam gcod gcig gcig ston pa na/_/gang tshe gzhan mi spong bar gnas/_/des ni de [#]khyab gcig pu'ang snang /_/de tshe blo yi ngor byas nas/_/gzhi mthun pa ni nyid du 'gyur/_/sgra ni rnam gcod byed pa na/_/_
[\[99b.5\]]dngos po'i chos la reg 'gyur ba/_/de ni de la yod ces bya'o/_/dngos po gcig ni rjod [#]byed min/_/blo la snang min snang rung la/_/dngos po med pas nges phyir ro/_!_/de phyir gzhan sel yul can gyi/_/sgra rnams dang ni blo nyid kyang /_/spyi yi yul can du bstan te/_/dngos
[\[99b.6\]]la de dag mi srid phyir/_!_/dngos po'i ngo bo gcig nyid phyir/_/ngo bo tha dad blo gang las/_/gcig ni rjes su 'gro ldog gi_/don gcig spyod yul can ma yin/_/tha dad gyur [#]na dbyer med pa'i/_/tha snyad dag kyang rgyu med 'gyur/_/ldog pa kun la yod pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[99b.7\]]thal 'gyur nyes pa de dag med/_/de yi 'bras bu yongs bstan phyir/_/tha dad 'bras bu gcig dag la/_/rgan pos sgra gcig brdar byas pa/_/de yi 'bras bu med pa can/_/ldog pa yi ni rgyu can yin/_!_/tha dad pa dag bstan pa ni/_/dka' dang mi nus
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'bras med phyir/_/dngos po la min dngos po kun/_/rang rang ngo bo la gnas phyir/_/khra bo yi ni ngo bo gang /_/de ni ser skya la yod min/_!_/de 'bras can [#]min las bzlog [#]pa/_/gnyis ka la yang yod pa yin/_!_/don la tha dad med par [#]yang /_/_
[\[100a.2\]]sgra yi tha dad mi rigs so/_!_/de phyir de 'bras 'dod na yang /_/de 'bras med las tha dad nyid/_!_/dper na mig la sogs pas [#]gzugs/_/rnam shes gcig gi [#]'bras bu can/_/gang phyir khyad par med 'bras de/_/ston pa dag ni srid par 'gyur/_!_/'ga' zhig cig
[\[100a.3\]]car kun rtogs phyir/_/de yi ngo bo spyi las ni/_/tha dad med du zin na yang /_/brda las byung ba bsnyad [#]par bya/_/gal te gcig gnas pa yi phyir/_/mang po dag la'ang mnyan pa gcig_/gnas pa rten [#]nam gsal ba yin/_/de ltar de la mi rigs so/_/rtags [#]la
[\[100a.4\]]phan 'dogs med pa'i phyir/_/rten min ltung ba'i tshul can gyi/_/rgya shug sogs la'ang de yi yul/_/skyed [#]pa 'khar gzhong sogs pas nus/_/de yang de la mi srid do/_/de med na yang gnas pa'i phyir/_/gnas min de yang mi rigs te/_/tha dad tha dad min pa yi/_/_
[\[100a.5\]]rnam par dpyod [#]pas mi rigs nyid/_/bdag la rnam shes skyed [#]rung ba'i/_/don du gzhan gyi ngor byed gang /_/gsal bya yin la rung nyid kyi/_/byed pa po yang rgyu ru 'dod/_/'di ni snga nas rung nyid na/_/de la ltos pa mi rung ste/_/'gyur ba med pa'i phyir de ni/_/spyi
[\[100a.6\]]ldan pa las gang las yin/_/mig sman sogs bzhin gsal ba las/_/dbang po'ang 'du byed ma yin te/_/de ni yod med dus dag la/_/rtogs pa tha dad med phyir ro/_!_/rigs rnams kyi ni gsal byed kyang /_/gal te rigs dang ldan 'dod na/_sgron me [#]la sogs
[\[100a.7\]]gsal byed ni/_/ba lang nyid sogs de ldan 'thob[#]/_/gang dag rigs ni gsal [#]ba las/_/gzhan nam gzhan min yod nyid de'i/_/sngon med gsal [#]ba rnams la ni/_/spyi yi blo gros ji ltar yin/_/gcig la yod pa mthong ba [#]ni/_/gzhan la mthong ba mi srid phyir/_!_/_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]gzhan nyid min na rjes 'gro med/_/gzhan nyid na yang rten min phyir/_/mi 'gro de na yod pa'ang min[#]/_/phyis yod cha dang ldan pa'ang min/_/rten snga ma ni yongs [#]mi 'dor/_/kye ma phongs pa'i rgyu nyid yin/_/gzhan la gnas par gyur pa ni/_/rang gi gnas las mi g.yo zhing /_/_
[\[100b.2\]]de las gnas gzhan skye ba la/_/gnas na shin tu rigs par ldan/_/gang na dngos de gnas gyur pa/_/der ni 'brel pa'ang ma yin la/_/de dag yul can la khyab pa/_/ci ga de ni ngo mtshar che/_!_/gal te kun na rigs yod na/_/gcig tu gsal [#]bas de gsal [#]nyid/_/_
[\[100b.3\]]tha dad med phyir kun tu mthong /_!_/de yang gsal [#]ba la bltos min/_gsal byed rtogs pa ma yin na/_/gsal bya yang dag rtogs pa min/_/spyi dang de dang ldan pa dag_/ci yi phyir na bzlog par 'dod/_!_/tha dad med don med par yang /_/'tshed pa po sogs brjod pa
[\[100b.4\]]yin/_!_/tha dad phyir na las rgyu min/_!_/'di yi rigs min las 'brel phyir/_!_/mnyan pa gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan phyir/_!_/las kyang gnas pa yod ma yin/_!_/'brel pa med phyir sgra yi rgyu/_/spyi [#]yin mi rigs min pa min/_/ha cang thal phyir las med na'ang /_/shes rjod [#]dag gi
[\[100b.5\]]ma yin te/_/rgyu mtshan can min thob phyir ro/_!_/rjes 'gro med phyir nus pa'ang min/_/gal te 'tshed [#]po nyid sogs spyi[#]/_/dang po nyid du de yod sogs/_/bzhin du gsal 'gyur min na ni/_/khyad par med phyir phyis mi 'gyur/_!_/bya bas phan 'dogs ltos gsal byed/_/_
[\[100b.6\]]yin na 'gyur med ltos pa med/_/'di ni phul byung yod na yang /_/skad cig nyid phyir bya gang las/_/tha dad mtshungs pa yin na rigs/_/nye ba gang gis 'ga' zhig la/_/rab 'jug gzhan la min de nyid/_/sgra dang shes pa'i rgyu yin no/_/gal te ldog pa spangs pa yi/_/_
[\[100b.7\]]dngos po'i rjes 'gro gzhan med na/_/gcig gi [#]'bras bu gzhan gyir min[#]/_/shin tu tha dad phyir zhe na/_/gal te bdag nyid gcig pa yis/_/du ma 'bras bu gcig byed na/_/bdag nyid gcig la'ang de yod phyir/_/lhan cig byed pa don med 'gyur/_/tha dad med pa'i ngo
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bo de/_/mi 'gro khyad par rnam nges bral/_!_/gcig dang bral na 'bras med phyir/_!_/bye brag rnams las de dag 'byung /_/don byed nus pa gang yin pa/_/de nyid don dam yod pa yin/_/de yang rjes 'gro med gang zhig_/rjes 'gro de las 'bras mi
[\[101a.2\]]'byung /_!_/des [#]na bdag nyid tha dad kyang /_/'ga' zhig rgyu yin gzhan pa min/_/rang bzhin 'di yin tha dad pa/_/med na cig car skye 'jig 'gyur/_!_/de las tha dad pas de ltar/_/mi 'gyur zhe na gcig 'jig tshe/_/bdag gnas na ni de yi min/_/des na spyi
[\[101a.3\]]khyad blor mi 'gyur/_/ldog pa ngo bo nyid med phyir/_/gnas dang mi gnas rtog [#]pa min/_/spyi yi blo yang bslad pa yin/_/de phyir sun dbyung ba yang med/_!_/de yi skyed byed ngo bo gang /_/de las gzhan pas ji ltar skyed[#]/_!_/tha dad khyad par nyid skyed byed/_!_/de la [#]tha dad min
[\[101a.4\]]pa'ang yod/_/ce na des de skyed [#]min brjod/_!_/snang ba'ang gzhan la mi brten pas/_/tha dad byed yin de nyid don/_/de ni gzhan las log pa yin/_/de ni rgyu dang 'bras bur bshad/_/de ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dod/_/de ni blang dor 'bras can pas/_/skyes bu thams
[\[101a.5\]]cad 'jug pa yin/_!_/ji ltar tha dad med khyad med/_/na [#]yang thams cad kun sgrub min/_/de bzhin tha dad khyad med na'ang /_/thams cad kun gyi sgrub byed min/_!_/tha dad na yang dngos po yi/_/chos nyid kyis 'ga' byed por 'gyur/_!_/tha dad med na'ang gcig nyid
[\[101a.6\]]kyi/_/byed dang mi byed 'gal bar 'gyur/_/tha dad yod de'i phyir bya med/_/ce na lhan cig byed mi byed/_/'on te rim bzhin byed po nyid/_/de ci dngos de nyid kyi 'am/_!_/de ldan dngos po shin tu ni/_/tha dad tha dad med 'gyur ba'am/_/'dra dang mi 'dra'i bdag
[\[101a.7\]]nyid can/_/rnam grangs phan tshun tha dad 'gyur/_!_/de yang tha dad 'gyur zhe na/_/bdag nyid gang gis de dag gi[# ]/khyad par spyi zhes bya ba de/_/gal te de dag [#]tha dad na/_/tha dad nyid 'gyur de lta na'ang /_/ji ltar bum sogs phan tshun bzhin/_/spyi dang khyad par
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]du 'dod pa'ang /_/spyi dang khyad par can mi 'gyur/_/gang gi bdag nyid mdun byas nas/_/bsgrub bya de 'bras 'dod pa can/_/skyes bu 'di ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/de rten tha dad tha dad med/_/dpyad bya rang bdag nyid tha dad/_/ldog pa mtshungs pa nyid [#]dag ni/_/_
[\[101b.2\]]yod nyid dngos po [#]rjes 'gro med/_/'jug pa la sogs thal 'gyur phyir/_!_/de nyid kyis ni 'dzem med pa/_/mun sprul gang ci'ang rung smra ba/_/de dag kyang ni bsal ba yin/_/mtha' gcig pa ni srid phyir ro/_/thams cad gnyis ka ngo bo nyid/_/de yi khyad par bsal
[\[101b.3\]]ba'i phyir/_/zho 'thung zhes ni bskul ba na/_/ci phyir rnga mo la mi rgyug_/'on te phul byung 'ga' zhig yod/_/gang gis khyad par 'jug 'gyur na/_/de nyid zho yin de gzhan la/_/med phyir gnyis ka min gzhan yin/_/thams cad kun bdag nyid yin na/_/blo sgra tha dad par mi
[\[101b.4\]]'gyur/_/tha dad bsdus par [#]smra ba la/_/de med phyir na mi srid 'gyur/_/dngos med ngo bo med pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo brjod pa dpyad bya nyid/_/ma yin sgra ni de dag nyid[#]/_/rnam gcod rjod par byed par [#]grub/_/rang bzhin khyad par bye brag la/_/ltos pa'am 'on te 'ba' zhig pa/_/_
[\[101b.5\]]bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir brjod de/_/'jig la 'bras dang yod nyid bzhin/_/gal te gtan tshigs yod rang bzhin/_/yod pa ji ltar bsgrub bya min/_/khyad par rjes 'gro med pa ni/_/gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dag las nyams/_/yod pa'i khyad par tsam du ni/_/bsgrub bya spyi yi
[\[101b.6\]]chos can la/_/don 'ga' zhig kyang [#]'grub mi 'gyur/_/'di 'dra ba yang bkag pa med/_!_/khyad par bsgrub byar bzung na 'dir/_/gtan tshigs rjes 'gro med can 'gyur/_/yod pa bsgrub bya yin na des/_/khyad par dag ni bsgrub byar 'gyur/_!_/de yi khyad par
[\[101b.7\]]gzung med par/_/dngos po tsam na [#]sgrub pa na/_/de tsam khyab byed bsgrub bya yi/_/rjes su 'gro ba nyams pa med/_/ma grub pa la yod chos med/_/gnyis pa la brten 'khrul pa can/_/med pa'i chos ni 'gal yin na/_/yod de ji ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur/_/rang
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bzhin sgrub [#]pa go byed yin/_/de la khyab byed nges pa yi[#]/_/rang bzhin nges pa go bya yin/_/'di ldog pa na de ldog byed/_/dper na mi rtag nyid byas pa'am/_/ma byas pas na [#]mi 'jig bzhin/_/rgyu med phyir na 'jig pa ni[#]/_/rang gi ngo bos rjes
[\[102a.2\]]'brel nyid/_/dngos po ltos dang bcas rnams ni/_/nges par 'gyur ba med par mthong /_/de [#]rgyu mang po yod na yang /_/'ga' zhig la ni mi srid 'gyur/_/des na 'bras gnas med pa'i phyir/_/'jig pa rgyu ldan smra rnams kyi/_/'jig pa'i rgyu ni thams cad dag_/_
