[\[102a.3\]]'khrul pa nyid du bshad pa yin/_!_/de rgyu nus pa med phyir yang /_/'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur/_/gang la 'gyur zhes bya de las/_/gzhan la'ang ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur/_/des na dngos po'i yul can gyi/_/rjes su dpog gang rnam gnyis te/_/'bras dang ngo bo
[\[102a.4\]]de dag las[#]/_/rang bsgrub bya la 'brel des phyir/_/'jug pa blo sngon can nyid phyir/_/de yi ngo bo mi dmigs na/_/'jug par mi byed ces bya bas/_/mi dmigs pa ni tshad mar bshad/_/bstan bcos skabs dang 'brel med dang /_/don rnams dbang po las 'das
[\[102a.5\]]pa/_/rtags med pa can de rnams ni/_/mi dmigs phyir na ji ltar med/_/yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min/_/phyir na tshad ma nyid mi 'gyur/_/rtags kyi phul byung yod pa can/_/la la tshad ma dag tu 'gyur[#]/_/rang bzhin shes byed mi shes la/_/rigs pa
[\[102a.6\]]'di ni brjod pa yin/_!_/rgyu mi shes na 'bras bu ni/_/med pa nyid du sgrub par byed/_/don gyi rang bzhin rtags can la/_/rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang yin/_/gal te gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig gis/_/de med par ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/snang rung mthong ba med pa'i rgyu/_/_
[\[102a.7\]]mi srid par ni gyur pa na/_/snang rung dngos po ma [#]dmigs pa'i/_/dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/'gal pa'i dngos po yod na yang /_/de yod pa la gnod byed phyir/_/de dang 'gal ba dmigs pa ni/_/med pa nyid du nges par 'gyur/_!_/thog med
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bag chags las byung ba'i/_/rnam par rtog pas yongs bsgrubs pa/_/yod med gnyis ka la brten pa/_/sgra don chos ni rnam pa gsum/_!_/de dngos nyer len med pa can/_/sgrub la de mi dmigs pa ni/_/de ltar gtan tshigs de nyid ni/_/med pa ma yin sgra sbyor
[\[102b.2\]]phyir/_!_/don dam gcig tu 'jug nyid can/_/mthong ba'i bye brag tha dad pa'i/_/don rnams la ni sgra rnams ni/_/rgyu med can 'jug mi 'gyur dang /_/'das dang ma skyes pa la yang /_/tshig 'ga' zhig kyang rdzun pa yi/_/don can nyid du mi 'gyur phyir/_/_
[\[102b.3\]]de dag blo don yul can 'dod/_!_/sgra don bsnyon pa sgrub pa la/_/chos kyi rten ni bsal ba'i phyir/_/tshogs pa bsgrub byar mi 'gyur la/_/yan gar chos ni grub pa yin/_/sgra don bsnyon pa med rnams kyis/_/yod med phyogs kyi bye brag gis/_/dngos po nyid ni dpyad bya [# ]
[\[102b.4\]]ste/_/'di las 'bras 'byung rag las phyir/_!_/don byed nus pa ma yin la/_/don gnyer brtags pas ci zhig bya/_/ma ning gzugs bzang mi bzang zhes/_/'dod ldan rnams kyis brtags ci phan/_!_/rtog [#]pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid kyis/_/sgra yi don ni brtags pa
[\[102b.5\]]yin/_/dngos rten ma grub 'di chos su/_/rigs pa smra bas gsungs pa yin/_!_/sgra rnams dngos dang lhan cig tu/_/med na mi 'byung [#]nyid med phyir/_/de las don grub min de dag_/smra po'i bsam pa ston par byed/_!_/yid ches tshig ni mi slu ba'i/_/spyi las rjes su dpag pa nyid/_/_
[\[102b.6\]]'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs/_/skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed ngag_/yongs brtags dbang du byas yin gyi[#]/_/de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min/_/mthong dang ma mthong dngos po yi/_/don de dag la mngon sum dang /_/rjes su dpag rnam gnyis kyis kyang /_/gnod med
[\[102b.7\]]'di yi [#]mi slu ba'o/_!_/yid ches tshig ni mi slu ba'i/_/spyi las 'di yul lkog [#]gyur na'ang /_/go skabs med pa'i phyir blo ni/_/rjes su dpag pa nyid du gsungs/_!_/blang dang dor bya'i de nyid ni/_/thabs bcas rab tu nges pa yis/_/gtso bo'i don la mi slu'i phyir/_/gzhan
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]la rjes su dpag pa yin/_!_/skyes bu phul byung la bltos pa/_/ji bzhin don du gzhan gyis shes/_!_/gal te phul du byung ba de/_/shes par nus na don 'di 'dod/_!_/'di ni 'di lta'am min no zhes/_/gzhan la skyon ldan skyon med la'am/_/tshad ma rnams ni rnyed
[\[103a.2\]]dka'i phyir/_/rtogs dka' zhes ni gzhan gyis shes/_/'grib dang phul byung brten pa kun/_/mi mthun phyogs dang bcas nyid phyir/_/de goms pa las bdag 'gyur bas/_/la la zag pa zad par 'gyur/_/'tshe ba med dang yang dag don/_/ngo bo nyid la phyin log gis/_/_
[\[103a.3\]]'bad du zin kyang mi bzlog ste[#]/_/blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro/_/nyes pa rnam pa thams cad dag_/'jig tshogs lta las skyes pa yin/_/de ma rig der de la chags/_/de las zhe sdang la sogs 'byung /_/de nyid kyis na nyes rnams kyi/_/rgyu ni gti mug yin par gsungs/_/_
[\[103a.4\]]gzhan las 'jig tshogs lta ba ste/_/de spangs pa na spong phyir ro/_!_/tshig rnams log pa nyid kyi rgyu/_/nyes rnams skyes bu la brten phyir/_/skyes bus ma byas bden don can/_/zhes ni la la rjod par byed/_/tshig rnams bden pa nyid kyi rgyu/_/yon tan skyes bu la brten phyir/_/_
[\[103a.5\]]skyes bus ma byas log pa'i don/_/ci min zhes ni gzhan dag brjod/_!_/don shes byed pa dag gi rgyu/_/brda ni skyes bu la brten pas/_/tshig rnams skyes bus [#]byas min yang /_/de phyir log pa nyid du srid/_/'brel pa skyes bus byas min na/_/brda rig med par rtogs
[\[103a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/brda las de ni gsal yin na/_/brtags [#]pa gzhan dag nus med 'gyur/_/tshig rnams don gcig la nges na/_/don gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/don du ma dang mngon 'brel na/_/'gal ba gsal bar byed pa yin/_/skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyang /_/_
[\[103a.7\]]kun tu brtags [#]pa don med 'gyur/_/tha dad rnams la 'brel [#]pa yang /_/rnam par gzhag phyir gtan tshigs brjod/_!_/skyes bus legs par ma byas pa[#]/_/rnam pa kun tu don med 'gyur/_/legs byas khas len na 'di ni/_/dngos su glang chen khrus 'drar 'gyur/_!_/_
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'brel pa can rnams mi rtag phyir/_/'brel pa la rtag yod ma yin/_!_/de phyir don dang sgra yi de/_/skyes bu'i blo yis legs par byas/_!_/don dang lhan cig skyes na [#]ni/_/sgra rnams la ni rang bzhin dag_/rnam par bzlog par mi rigs so/_!_/rnam brtags 'brel la nyes 'di
[\[103b.2\]]med/_/gal te rten 'di [#]'jig na yang /_/'jig min rtag phyir rigs dang 'dra/_/rtag rnams la brten nus pa gang /_/gang gis de rten [#]'dod pa yin/_/shes pa skyed par byed pa yi[#]/_/lhan cig byed rgyu rnams [#]tshogs na/_/de skyed [#]par ni rung nyid phyir/_/rigs pa shes
[\[103b.3\]]pas bum sogs kyang /_/skye ba la ni gsal [#]bar 'dod/_/'gyur ba med rnams khyad med pas/_/gsal byed rang gis [#]don ci byas/_/gang phyir des de gsal 'dod pa/_/'brel pa dngos po nyid gyur mod/_/tha dad phyir blo sna tshogs 'gyur/_!_/de las tha
[\[103b.4\]]dad min de nyid/_/'di las gzhan dngos yod ma yin/_/dngos po'i [#]ngo bo tha dad phyir/_/'brel pa rtog pas byas pa yin/_/yod rdzas gzhan la rag lus pa'am/_/gzhan gyi 'brel par ji ltar 'gyur/_/yi ge don med can 'gyur zhing /_/tshig sogs kun
[\[103b.5\]]brtags dngos med la/_/dngos po yi ni 'brel pa 'di/_/ji lta bur ni 'jug par 'gyur/_!_/byed pa po rnams mi dran phyir/_/skyes bus ma byas kyang 'dod lo/_/'di la'ang rjes su brjod pa yod/_/des na ngan pa'i mun pas khyab/_/ji ltar skyes bu 'di gzhan las/_/ma
[\[103b.6\]]thos bar ni yi ge dang /_/tshig bkod pa ni brjod nus med/_/de ltar gzhan la'ang 'ga' zhig smra/_!_/spel ba yi ni gzhung gzhan yang /_/man ngag las gzhan gzhan dag gis/_/'don pa gang mthong gang gis na/_/de yang de ltar rjes mi dpog_!_/rigs gang gang
[\[103b.7\]]las grub pa de[#]/_/khyad par med de me shing bzhin/_/rgyu ma mthong ba can gzhan yang /_/de las 'gyur bar yang dag shes/_/de la 'bras mtshungs mthong ba'i phyir/_/khyad par dag ni ma bstan par/_/gtan tshigs rab tu spros pa gang /_/de dag thams cad 'khrul pa
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]can/_/rnam kun thog med grub gyur mod/_/de ltar skyes min rten can min/_/de phyir skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/gzhan yang mi la mi brten 'gyur/_!_/kla klo la sogs tha snyad dang /_/med par smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang /_/thog med phyir na de bzhin 'gyur/_/sngon
[\[104a.2\]]'dus [#]byas pa'i rgyu yin phyir/_/de 'dra'i skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/grub na'ang [#]yon tan ci zhig yod/_/don gyi 'du byed khyad par rnams/_/mthong phyir the tshom dag kyang yin/_!_/yig rnams gzhan dang khyad med phyir/_/sgrub par byed na 'bras cir 'gyur/_/ngag ni yi ge
[\[104a.3\]]las tha dad/_/yod pa min te ma dmigs phyir/_/yan lag du ma'i bdag nyid yin/_/de rnams tha dad don med nyid/_/de dngos can min de dngos can/_/brtags pa seng ge nyid sogs bzhin/_/re re don bcas nyid yin na'ang [#]/_/du ma nyid btags [#]log pa yin/_/yan
[\[104a.4\]]lag gcig ni rtogs pas kyang /_/ngag gi don dag rtogs par 'gyur/_!_/thams cad cig car rtogs [#]pa na'ang /_/dus kyi khyad par mi rung ngo /_!_/gcig nyid na yang tha dad med/_/rim gyis rtogs pa mi srid phyir/_!_/mi rtag na ni rtsol byung phyir/_/de ci [#]skyes bus byas pa
[\[104a.5\]]min/_/rtag nyid yin yang [#]rtag par ni/_/dmigs 'gyur sgrib g.yogs med phyir ro/_/gal te lhan cig byed 'ga' zhig_/ma tshang thos pa min zhe na/_/cis kyang gzhan ltos yin sla [#]ste/_/nges pa dag ni 'gal ba yin/_/gal te de dag khyab byed min/_/thams
[\[104a.6\]]cad du ni dmigs mi 'gyur/_!_/gal te khyab na thams cad kyis/_/cig car dmigs pa dag tu 'gyur/_!_/'dus byas dmigs pa yin na yang /_/'gyur med gang gis 'du byed 'gyur/_!_/dbang po legs par byas gyur na/_/des kyang ma lus thob par 'gyur/_/gal te
[\[104a.7\]]legs byas khyad par las/_/tha dad phyir don gcig nges yin/_!_/sgra yi tshogs pa du ma yi/_/ca co ji ltar thos par 'gyur/_!_/de la gal te sgra yan gar/_/thos 'gyur rjod byed ma yin na/_!_/sgra las tha dad yod do zhes/_/'di la shin tu ches dad bya/_!_/sgra gzhan dag ni gnas
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]pa na/_/rjod byed ji ltar thos pa yin[#]/_!_/yang na nus pa nges pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar tha dad sgra rtogs 'gyur/_!_/nyes pa gang dang gang gis kyang /_/sgra tsam rjod byed mi 'dod pa[#]/_/sgra tsam dag gis gsal ba ni[#]/_/ji ltar rjod byed la de med/_!_/gal te yi ge rim pa ngag_/_
[\[104b.2\]]yig rnams tha dad med phyir min/_/de dag rnam par gzhag pa'ang med/_/go rim gzhan ni 'gal phyir ro/_!_/khyab dang rtag par brjod pa'i phyir/_/yul dang dus kyi go rim med/_!_/mi rtag khyab byed ma yin pa'i/_/skyon yang sngar ni brjod pa yin/_!_/gsal ba'i rim
[\[104b.3\]]pa'ang ngag min te/_/rtag la gsal ba bsal [#]phyir ro/_!_/byed pa rnams kyi bya [#]nyid las/_/de grub phyir na 'bras nyid yin/_!_/grub pa'i don la rang [#]shes pas/_/gzhan blo'i rgyu ni gsal byed 'dod/_/dper na sgron bzhin gzhan du na'ang /_/byed po las 'di khyad par ci/_/_
[\[104b.4\]]byed pa rnams kyi tshogs pa yi/_/bya ba las ni nges par yang /_/dmigs phyir 'bras bu nyid yin te/_/gsal byed la de mi srid phyir/_/gal te khyed kyi de ngo bo'i/_/sgrib byed bral ba gsal [#]yin na/_/ci phyir med pa la byed pa'i/_/tshogs kyi nus pa de rung 'gyur/_/sgra
[\[104b.5\]]dang khyad par med pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dag kyang gsal thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni khas len na/_/rgyu rnams kun ni don med nyid/_!_/ngo shes pa dang yong sbyor sogs/_/gang yin sgrub byed 'dod na ni/_/dpe med can yin dngos rnams ni/_/skad cig gis ni 'jig
[\[104b.6\]]phyir ro/_/rtags ngan gzhan yang sun dbyung bya/_/blo ni skyes bu'i rten can min/_/khas blangs mngon sum grags pa dang /_/rjes su dpag pas cig car gnod/_!_/yi ge rnams las tha dad pa'i/_/rim pa'ang gsal bar dpyad zin to/_!_/de ni rtog pas sgro btags
[\[104b.7\]]na/_/ji ltar skyes bu'i rten can min/_!_/'jig pa yod tsam 'brel pa can/_/nyid phyir sgra ni mi rtag nyid/_!_/me las don gzhan gyur pa dag_!_/skye na 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_/shing ni mthong ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de nyid 'di yis [#]'jig ce na/_/ji ltar gzhan ni gzhan 'jig
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'gyur/_/bla ste ci phyir shing mi snang /_/des gzung phyir min zhe na min/_/gang phyir de yis mi sgrib ste/_/skye phyir 'jig pa 'jig can 'gyur/_/de lta na [#]yang shing mthong 'gyur/_/gal te gsod byed bsad pa na/_/nag pa slar 'byung min ji bzhin/_/_
[\[105a.2\]]'di la'ang de bzhin yin zhe na/_/gsod byed bsad [#]pa nyid ma yin/_!_/'jig pa gzhan nyid ma yin na/_/shing nyid 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de med phyir na rgyu min nyid/_/'di las gzhan pa'i rnam pa'ang med/_/'jig pa rgyu med can yin na'ang /_/rtag phyir dngos po 'jig pa
[\[105a.3\]]dag_/lhan cig yod par 'gyur zhe na/_/med pa rtag nyid gang [#]las yin/_/med la dngos 'jig med nyid kyi/_/thal bar 'gyur ba mi rung ste/_/gang phyir dngos po 'jig pa yis/_/'jig pa dag ni mi 'dod do/_/dngos 'jig gzhan la ltos med phyir/_/de shes don du
[\[105a.4\]]sems kyis ni/_de yi tha dad sgro btags nas/_/gnas skabs de rgyu med can bshad/_!_/med pa [#]rang nyid las yod na'ang /_/rnam rtog 'di ni mtshungs [#]she na/_/de yi cung zad 'gyur med de/_/med par gyur pa tsam zhig yin/_!_/yod la rnam rtog 'di [#]'gyur te/_/bsgrub [#]pa
[\[105a.5\]]dngos dang 'brel [#]phyir ro/_!_/med pa yin zhes gsungs pa ni/_/dngos po min zhes bya ba'ang yin/_/gal te bya ba cung zad cig_/yod na gzhan la ltos 'gyur gyi/_/dngos gang cung zad mi byed la/_/ci ste 'ga' zhig gis ltos 'gyur/_!_/des ni rgyu med can yin
[\[105a.6\]]na'ang /_/ma skyes pa las 'jig 'gyur phyir/_/yod pa nyid dang [#]'jig yin skyon/_/ha cang thal ba bsal ba yin/_/ji ltar skye [#]ldan 'ga' zhig nyid/_/thogs bcas nyid 'dod de bzhin du/_/yod rnams 'jig pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/skye ldan min pa min zhe na/_!_/_
[\[105a.7\]]rgyu yi rang bzhin nges pa las/_/'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges pa ste/_!_/tha dad rgyu rnams med nyid phyir/_/mi rtag ngo bo tha dad med/_!_/de phyir de rnams 'brel pa yang /_/rtag pa nyid ni bsal ba yin/_!_/sgra yi nus pa'ang sngar bshad pa'i/_/'brel pa'i skyon gyis bsal ba yin/_/_
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]skyes bus ma byas zhes bya nyid/_/ji bzhin don shes sgrub byed min/_/skyes bu'i nyes pas skyon med pa'i/_/me sogs rnam pa gzhan du mthong /_!_/de ni ma byas par 'dod na/_/shes pa nyid kyi rgyur mi 'gyur/_/rtag pa dag la [#]dngos nus pa/_/'ga' yang skye ba yod
[\[105b.2\]]ma yin/_!_/rnam rtog bag chags las byung ba'i/_/sgro btags spyod yul can blo dag_/'ga' zhig de las skye [#]'gyur gyi/_/don gyi spyod yul can ma yin/_!_/gal te byas ngag log nyid du/_/mthong nyid phyir na ma byas pa'i/_/tshig ni bden don can yin te/_/_
[\[105b.3\]]bzlog pas 'gal ba khyab phyir ro/_!_/med phyir gtan tshigs ma bstan na'ang /_/de ni yod par dogs 'gyur [#]te/_/dngos po 'gal ba dag la yang /_/khyab par byed pa mthong phyir ro/_!_/kun la med pa mi dmigs pas/_/mi 'grub ces ni bshad zin to/_/med pa
[\[105b.4\]]nyid ni ma grub na/_/ldog pa nyid la the tshom za/_/gal te rjes 'gro ldog pa dang /_/bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod nyid/_/de nges 'bras can shes pa yis/_/grub par gyur na sgrub byed yin/_!_/gang la bsgrub bya'i mi mthun phyogs/_/bzlog pa nyid brjod de nyid
[\[105b.5\]]ni/_/'di yi chos mthun 'gyur [#]des na/_/gtan tshigs thams cad rjes 'gro can/_!_/'ga' yis brda byas nyid yin na/_/sngags rnams 'bras bu sgrub byed yin/_!_/ci ste dngos po'i nus yin na/_!_/khyad par med phyir gzhan la'ang [#]'gyur/_/don gzhan nyid du
[\[105b.6\]]gyur pa yi/_/bkod pa'ang sngar ni bsal ba yin/_!_/de don rtag tu 'grub [#]'gyur te/_/bltos pa yin na nus med 'gyur/_/gal te dngos nus de 'dra na/_/de ni kun gyi sgrub byed 'gyur[#]/_!_/legs byas min phyir byed pa po'i/_/khyad par la yang ltos mi rung /_/dngos
[\[105b.7\]]po 'dus byas pa yi yang /_/dngos po'i tha dad tha dad byed/_/byed po'i khyad par las nus pa/_/nges pa ma yin brda las 'gyur/_/khyad par byar med can yin na/_/ci zhig byed nas byed por 'gyur/_!_/gal te mngon gsal [#]sbyor yin na/_/de ni gong du bsal zin to/_!_/_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gang las blo de gsal yin la/_/de ni 'bras bur gal te sbyor/_!_/smra ba po gsal rgyu yin pas/_/nyan pa po yang 'bras 'brel 'gyur[#]/_!_/mngon par gsal min sgra dag gi[# ]/byed pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'am/_/yid kyi bzlas pa don med 'gyur/_/sgra
[\[106a.2\]]ni rna ba'i spyod yul yin/_!_/brgyud pas de las bskyed nyid phyir/_/blo de'ang gsal ba yin zhe na/_/gal te don can yin mi 'grub/_/rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro phyir ro/_/rang dang spyi yi rang bzhin rnams/_/ngo bo gcig tu [#]brjod 'dod nas/_/brda byed rnams kyis brjod pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[106a.3\]]mi 'gal dngos po la ma yin/_!_/gal te go rim med na ni/_/ro dang mtsho zhes thos pa las/_/'bras tha dad med 'gyur zhe na/_!_/de ni skyes bu'i rten can yod/_/yi ge kun slong shes pa las/_/skyes la shes las [#]sgra skye'o/_!_/de yi khyad par can de ni/_/rna bas nges par 'gyur ba
[\[106a.4\]]yin/_/shes nges skyed [#]pa'i shes pa can/_!_/de thos myur min thos pa can/_/de dran pa la bltos nas ni/_/phyis ni bdag nyid la dran byed/_/de ni rgyu dang 'dzin sems kyi/_/yig [#]rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu yi[#]/_/go rim dag ni yin zhes brjod/_/de dag skyes bus byas pa nyid/_/de
[\[106a.5\]]phyir yi ge'i ngo bo de/_/tshig dang tshig las [#]gzhan nyid de/_/byed po'i 'du byed las tha dad/_/lhan cig 'bras bu'i [#]khyad par byed/_!_/yi ge rnams kyi go rim de'ang /_/spel bar byed la 'jug yin te/_/'dod dang mi 'gal grub can gyi/_/go rim gnas pa 'gal phyir ro/_/_
[\[106a.6\]]skyes bu dang ni yi ge rnams/_/rgyu 'bras nyid du grub pa'i phyir/_/yi ge'i rim kun skyes bu las[#]/_/me dang shing gi rigs pa bzhin/_!_/shes mthu dag gis sngags zhes [#]pa'i/_/go rim byed tshul can skyes bu/_/thun mong min pa nyid grub ste/_/gzhan la de dag med phyir ro/_!_/_
[\[106a.7\]]gang yang rgyud rig 'ga' zhig gis/_/gsang sngags 'ga' zhig byed 'gyur ba/_/de dag gis [#]de gtso bo'i mthu/_/des [#]bshad rigs pa 'jug phyir ro/_/'bras bu 'dod pas sngags rnams ni/_/byas dang skyes bus byas brjod bya/_!_/skyes bu nus med sgrub byed ni/_/'di nyid kyis
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]ni gsal [#]ba yin/_/blo dbang smra dang skyes bu nyid/_/la sogs sgrub byed gang brjod pa/_/tshad ltar snang yin lhag ldan pas/_/ji bzhin don rtogs yod ma yin/_/sgra ni kho bo [#]'di don dang /_/'di don min zhes rjod mi byed/_!_/skyes bus don 'di brtags pa ste/_/de yang
[\[106b.2\]]'dod chags la sogs ldan/_/de gcig de nyid rig [#]gzhan min/_/khyad par yang ni su yis byas/_/de bzhin skyes nyid rnam 'gas kyang /_/khyed ci shes ldan 'ga' mi 'dod/_!_/gal te gang tshig [#]tshad ma yis[#]/_/mi slu de don rig yin na/_/shin tu lkog tu gyur rnams
[\[106b.3\]]la/_/tshad ma yod pa srid ma yin/_!_/gang gi tshig ni tshad ma yis[#]/_/mi slu de yis byas pa'i tshig[# ]/de lung zhes thob de yi phyir/_/skyes bus byas min don med yin/_/gal te shin tu lkog gyur don/_/lung med par ni shes srid na/_/dbang po las 'das don rig 'ga'/_/_
[\[106b.4\]]yod do zhes ni mngon 'dod 'gyur/_!_/bdag nyid 'dod chags sogs ldan pa'am/_/gzhan las rig byed don rig min/_/rig byed rig [#]par byed min na/_/rig byed don ni gang las rtogs/_/des na mtho ris 'dod me la/_/sbyin sreg sbyin zhes thos pa las[#]/_/khyi sha
[\[106b.5\]]za [#]zhes bya ba de/_/don min zhes 'di tshad ma gang /_/'jig rten tshig rab grags she na/_/de la sna tshogs don can sgra'i/_/gang gis [#]don 'di rnam dbye ba/_/dbang po las 'das don mthong gang /_/grags min don brjod mtho ris dang /_/lha mo la sogs sgra mthong ngo /_/de
[\[106b.6\]]'dra'i sgra gzhan dag la ni/_/de 'dra'i rnam rtog nyid du 'gyur/_!_/grags pa dag kyang mi rnams tshig_/de yang tshad mar mi 'dod na/_/slar yang de las don rtogs pa/_/sdang 'dod 'di ni ci zhig yin/_!_/gal te grags pa las brgal [#]ba'i/_/rtog la rgyu ci yod ce na/_/_
[\[106b.7\]]rab grags tshad ma nyid min phyir/_/der 'dzin pa la [#]rgyu ci yod/_/grags pa nyid kyis sgra don gyi/_/nges la dogs pa bskyed [#]pa ni/_/gang phyir de la sgra rnams don/_/sna tshogs 'jug pa can nyid mthong /_/nges byed ma mthong ba dag gis[#]/_/sna tshogs nus can sgra rang nyid/_/_
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]nges par dogs pa [#]'gyur ba ste/_/gzhan du mi srid med [#]phyir ro/_!_/'ga' zhig lam ni 'di yin zhes/_/sdong dum 'di ni smra [#]'gyur zhes/_/gzhan ni bdag nyid smra de ltar/_/de dag bye brag brtag par gyis/_/thams cad la rung don gcig gi_/_
[\[107a.2\]]gsal byed nges pa gang las yin/_!_/brjod 'dod nges pa ma gtogs pa[#]/_/gang gis dbang po las 'das shes/_!_/brjod 'dod nges pa'i rgyu yin zhing /_/brda ni de yi gsal byed yin/_!_/de ni skyes min la med na/_/de don gcig can de gang las/_!_/rang bzhin
[\[107a.3\]]gyis ni nges yin na/_/gzhan la des kyang mi rung ngo /_/brda yang don med can nyid 'gyur/_/brda las rang bzhin khyad par gyi/_/gsal ba'i nges pa gang las yin/_!_/gang la 'dod pa rang rgyud pa/_/de la nges pa zhes bya gang /_/des na brda ni rung ba nyid/_/'dod
[\[107a.4\]]pa kho na gsal mi 'gyur/_/bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go_/[#]gang phyir rig byed phyogs gcig phyir/_/gzhan yang de 'dra [#]yin te dper/_/mes grang bzlog [#]dag bden pa bzhin/_/de skad gzhan dag zer ro lo/_/ro 'dra ngo bo mtshungs nyid phyir/_/snod
[\[107a.5\]]gcig la yang chos[#] pa bzhin/_/lhag ldan 'khrul pa can nyid phyir/_/rigs pa shes pas 'di 'dra bkag_/skyes bu rtag pa byed po nyid/_/dngos rnams rtag dang dbang po 'das/_/dbang pos [#]gzung bya dang dngos rnams/_/rgyu dang gnas 'jig mi mnyam dang /_/gzhan yang
[\[107a.6\]]tshad ma rnams [#]gnyis kyis/_/rnam par bsal ba'i spyod yul lam/_/lung la bltos pa rjes dpag dang /_/'gal ba dag ni rjod byed pa/_/'gal ba kun tu ma bsal zhing /_/bstan bcos don [#]yang ma bstan la/_/de bden don bcas [#]khas len pa/_/g.yem ma mu cor gyis
[\[107a.7\]]rgyal lo/_!_/gal te de ltar tshad grub na/_/'o na 'di la tshad min ci/_/skyes bu mang du smra ba la/_/bden pa'i don gcig med pa min/_/rjod [#]pa po la sgra gnas pas/_/'di dngos rang bzhin nam 'bras min/_/'di las rnam par bzlog pas kyang /_/'khrul pa med pa yod ma yin/_/_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]rjod byed rnams kyi [#]'jug pa ni/_/brjod bya mthong bas byed ce na/_/phan tshun dag ni 'gal ba'i don/_/de ni gcig la ji ltar 'gyur/_/des na lung dang dngos po rnams/_/rtogs pa po [#]yi rnam 'ga' yang /_/med na mi 'byung mi 'grub na/_/de las don gang nges pa yin/_/_
[\[107b.2\]]de phyir de ni log na yang /_/dngos po med par 'grub [#]mi 'gyur/_!_/des na med nges 'bras bu can/_/mi dmigs pas ni mi 'grub bo/_!_/rig byed tshad ma dang ni 'gas [#]byed smra/_/khrus las chos 'dod dang ni rigs pa [#]smras dregs/_!_/sdig pa gzhom phyir gang gdung ba rtsom zhes pa/_/_
[\[107b.3\]]blun po shes rab 'chal ba'i rtags lnga yin/_/tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las rang [#]don rjes su dpag pa ste le'u dang po'o/_/tshad ma bslu [#]med can shes pa/_/don byed nus par gnas pa ni/_/mi slu sgra las byung ba yang /_/mngon par 'dod pa ston
[\[107b.4\]]phyir ro/_!_/smra ba po yi byed pa'i yul/_/don gang blo la rab gsal [#]ba/_/de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid[#]/_/don gyi de nyid rgyu can min/_!_/gzung ba 'dzin phyir kun rdzob ni/_/mi 'dod blo ni tshad ma nyid/_/blang dang dor bya'i dngos po yi/_/'jug la de gtso yin phyir dang /_/_
[\[107b.5\]]yul rnam [#]can ni tha dad pas/_/blo yi rtogs pa tha dad phyir/_/de yod na 'di yod phyir ro/_!_/rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs/_/tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid/_/bstan bcos rmongs pa zlog byed yin/_!_/ma shes don gyi gsal byed kyang /_/rang gi ngo bo rtogs 'og tu/_/spyi yi rnam
[\[107b.6\]]par shes pa thob/_/rang gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa/_/shes pa gang yin zhes dgongs phyir/_/rang gi mtshan nyid dpyad phyir ro/_!_/de ldan bcom ldan tshad ma nyid/_!_/ma skyes pa ni bzlog don du/_/gyur pa nyid gsungs de yi phyir/_/sgrub byed la ltos tshad yin rigs/_/_
[\[107b.7\]]tshad ma rtag pa nyid yod min/_/dngos yod rtogs pa tshad [#]phyir dang /_/shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis/_/de ni mi brtan [#]nyid phyir ro/_/rim bzhin skye ba can dag ni/_/rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir/_/ltos pa mi rung ba yi phyir/_!_/rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir/_/mi rtag
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]na yang tshad med nyid/_!_/sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang /_/don byed pa la sogs pa dag_/'dod pa grub pa'am dpe ma grub/_/yang na the tshom za ba yin/_!_/byin rlabs [#]yod med rjes 'jug can/_/dbyibs sogs ji 'dra rab grub pa/_/_
[\[108a.2\]]de las rjes su dpog gang yin/_/de ni rigs pa nyid yin no/_/tha dad dngos la rab grub pa/_/sgra mtshungs [#]tha dad med pa'i [#]phyir/_/rjes dpog rigs pa ma yin te/_/skye bo'i rdzas las me bzhin no/_!_/de lta min na rdza mkhan gyis/_bum pa la sogs 'jim pa yi/_/_
[\[108a.3\]]rnam 'gyur 'ga' zhig byed pa'i phyir/_/grog mkhar yang des byas grub 'gyur/_!_/bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro phyir 'bras bu/_/spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la/_/'brel pa can nyid tha dad phyir/_/tha dad skyon brjod 'bras mtshungs 'dod/_!_/rigs kyi khyad par la grub
[\[108a.4\]]pa/_/sgra yi spyi ni mthong ba las/_/sgrub byed mi rigs ngag la sogs/_/go nyid phyir na rwa can bzhin/_!_/rjod [#]par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir/_/sgra rnams gang la'ang med ma yin/_/de yod pas ni don grub na/_/thams cad kyis ni thams cad grub/_!_/'dis ni
[\[108a.5\]]ser skya la sogs kyi/_/mi rtag sogs phyir yang sems med/_/sogs dang shun pa bshus na ni/_/'chi phyir sems ldan dpyad pa yin/_!_/dngos po'i ngo bo ma grub na/_/tshul 'di grub na ma grub kyang /_/khyad par gnod byed ma yin te/_/sgra yi nam mkha' la brten bzhin/_/_
[\[108a.6\]]sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni/_/grub na grub par 'gyur te dper/_/'ug pa pa [#]la sangs rgyas pas/_/lus sogs sgrub byed bshad pa bzhin/_/de nyid 'khrul la sogs yin na/_/sgra ni 'khrul pa med na yang /_/sgrub byed skyon ldan shes [#]bya ste/_/dngos las dngos po [#]grub
[\[108a.7\]]phyir ro/_/'gro ba'i phyir dang lag ldan phyir/_/rwa can glang po zhes sgrub byed/_/'di yi sgra yi brjod bya ni/_/grags pa [#]yin gyi brjod 'dod min/_!_/ji ltar dngos de rgyu yin pa/_/de ltar de nyid gang gi tshe/_/rgyu min gang gis de ni rgyur/_/'dod la rgyu ma yin mi 'dod/_/mtshon dang sman
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sogs 'brel pa las/_/nag pa'i rma dang 'drubs yin na/_/'brel med sdong dum ci yi phyir/_/rgyu nyid du ni rtog [#]mi byed/_/rang bzhin khyad par med par ni/_/byed par yang ni mi rung ngo /_!_/rtag la ldog pa med pa'i phyir/_/nus pa nyid kyang rtogs par dka'/_!_/gang dag yod na
[\[108b.2\]]gang 'gyur nyid/_/de dag las gzhan de yi rgyu[#]/_/rtog pa yin na thams cad la/_/rgyu rnams thug pa med par 'gyur/_!_/myu gu skyed [#]la sa la sogs/_/rang bzhin yongs su gyur nas [#]ni/_/rgyu yin de legs byas pa na/_/de yi khyad par mthong phyir ro/_!_/gal te ji ltar yul
[\[108b.3\]]dbang po/_/tshogs pa khyad med blo rgyu yin/_/de ltar 'di yin zhe na min/_/de las [#]khyad par yod phyir ro/_/so so [#]so sor nus med rnams/_/rang bzhin khyad par med pas na/_/tshogs kyang nus pa med 'gyur bas/_/de phyir khyad par grub pa yin/_/de phyir so sor gang
[\[108b.4\]]nus med/_/tshogs na yon tan srid 'gyur ba/_/de dag rgyu yin dbang phyug sogs/_/ma yin khyad par med phyir ro/_!_/tshad ma lkog gyur don shes yin/_/de sgrub byed kyang med pa'i phyir/_/nan tan byed pa yod ma yin/_/zhes ni kha cig rab tu brjod/_/mi shes ston par
[\[108b.5\]]byed pa la/_/'khrul par dogs pa can rnams kyis/_/des bshad nan tan bya ba'i phyir/_/shes ldan 'ga' zhig 'tshol bar byed/_/de phyir de yi [#]bsgrub bya ru/_/'gyur ba'i ye shes rnam dpyad bya'i[#]/_/'di yis srin bu'i grangs mkhyen pa/_/nged la 'gar yang nyer mkho med/_!_/_
[\[108b.6\]]blang dang dor bya'i de nyid ni/_/thabs dang bcas pa rigs [#]mdzad pa/_/gang de tshad ma nyid 'dod kyi[#]/_/thams cad rigs [#]mdzad ma yin no/_/ring po mthong ba'am min yang rung /_/'dod pa'i de [#]nyid mthong ba yin/_!_/gal te ring mthong tshad yin na/_/tshur shog bya rgod bsten par
[\[108b.7\]]gyis/_!_/sgrub byed thugs rjes goms las de/_!_/blo ni lus la brten pa'i phyir/_/goms pas grub pa med ce na/_!_/ma yin rten [#]ni bkag phyir ro/_/skye ba yongs su len pa na/_/'byung rngub dbang po blo dag ni/_/rang gi rigs la ltos med can/_/lus nyid 'ba' zhig las skye
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]min/_/ha cang thal phyir mtshams sbyor bar/_/nus ldan mthong ba gang de la/_/ci zhig yod 'gyur [#]gang med pa/_/gang gis phyi nas mtshams sbyor med/_!_/gang du drod gsher la sogs pa/_/skye bo skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i/_/sa sogs cha de 'ga' yang med/_/_
[\[109a.2\]]de phyir thams cad sa bon bdag_/de phyir dbang sogs rang rigs la/_/ltos pa med par 'byung yin na/_/ji ltar gcig ni yongs 'gyur bzhin/_/kun 'gyur khyad par med phyir ro/_!_/dbang rnams re re la gnod na/_/yid blo la gnod yod ma yin/_/'di 'gyur na ni de
[\[109a.3\]]dag kyang /_/'gyur ba dag tu mthong ba yin/_!_/de phyir blo gnas pa yi rten/_/blo nyid la ni brten pa 'ga'/_/dbang po rnams kyi rgyu yin pas/_/de phyir blo las dbang po yin/_/de 'dra'i 'phen byed yod gyur na/_/phyis kyang de 'drar 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi shes pas
[\[109a.4\]]phan 'dogs phyir/_/yid ni lus la brten par bshad/_/gal te dbang po med par blo/_/ma yin de yang de med par/_/de lta'ang phan tshun rgyu nyid pas/_/de phyir phan tshun rgyu can yin/_!_/rim can min las rim can min/_/khyad par can min ltos pa'ang med/_!_/lus las
[\[109a.5\]]rim gyis blo 'gyur na/_!_/de'i yang rim pa gsal bar byed/_!_/skad cig snga ma snga ma ni/_/skad cig re re sngon med de'i/_/rgyu yin de yi phyir na [#]rgyu/_/thams cad tshe na mthong ba nyid/_!_/tha ma'i sems ni sems gzhan dang /_/mtshams sbyor ba la 'gal ci yod/_/dgra bcom
[\[109a.6\]]sems gang yin de yang /_/gang las mtshams sbyor med par 'dod/_!_/tshad mas ma grub don can gyi[#]/_/grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ngam ci/_/gal te de rgyu bral phyir na/_/de nyid 'dir ni cis ma brjod/_/de blo bzhin du 'dzin 'gyur phyir/_/dbang po bcas las yid shes
[\[109a.7\]]min/_/shes skyed [#]nus pa tha dad phyir/_/kun las kyang ni ma yin no/_/sems med nyid phyir gzhan las min/_/rgyu gcig phyir na lhan cig gnas/_/dbang bzhin gzugs dang ro bzhin no/_/don gyi sgo nas 'gyur ba yin/_!_/rtag tu de yi rjes 'jug phyir/_/gang
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]zhig yod pas phan 'dogs byed/_/de rgyu de phyir bdun pa dang /_/skyes phyir zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/'ga' zhig tshe na sems rgyun la/_/phan 'dogs byed pa'ang [#]yin sla ste/_/bum sogs la ni me sogs bzhin/_/de tsam gyis ni ldog [#]pa min/_!_/lus ni gnas pa nyid na
[\[109b.2\]]sems/_/ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_!_/de yod yod dang dbang gyur [#]phyir/_/de las 'byung rngub de ma yin/_/rlung 'byin pa dang 'dren pa ni/_/'bad rtsol med par gang las yin/_!_/de dag yul byung 'grib pa las/_/phul byung 'grib pa thob par 'gyur/_/de dag
[\[109b.3\]]la yang thal ba mtshungs/_/sems rgyu yin na mtshungs ma yin/_/gnas pa'i 'phen byed gzhan dag kyang /_/gang phyir rgyu ni yin par 'dod/_!_/gal te sdong bu la sogs bzhin/_/nyes pas mi mthun lus rgyu min/_!_/shi bas nyes pa nyams gyur [#]tshe/_/slar yang 'tsho ba dag tu
[\[109b.4\]]'gyur/_!_/gal te me ni ldog na yang /_/shing gi 'gyur ba mi ldog bzhin/_/de ni ldog pa med ce na/_!_/ma yin gso sbyor yod phyir ro/_!_/slar mi 'byung bar 'ga' zhig ni/_/la lar 'gyur ba skyed [#]par byed/_/'ga' zhig ldog [#]pa yin phyir dper/_/shing dang gser
[\[109b.5\]]la me bzhin no/_/dang po chung yang ldog pa min/_/slar ldog rung bar 'gyur byas [#]gang /_/de ni slar yang 'byung 'gyur te/_/gser gyi sra ba nyid bzhin no/_/cung zad gso bya min brjod pa/_!_/'chos byed rnyed par [#]dka' phyir ram/_/tshe zad phyir ro nyes 'ba' zhig_/yin na
[\[109b.6\]]gso min med pa gnyis[#]/_/shi ba'i dug sogs ldog phyir ram/_/de yi sos zin bcad las kyang /_/'gyur ba'i rgyu dang bral bas na/_/de cis slar yang 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/nyer len 'gyur ba med par ni/_nyer len can dag 'gyur bar ni/_/byed par mi nus dper 'jim pa[#]/_/_
[\[109b.7\]]'gyur ba med par bum sogs bzhin/_!_/dngos gang 'gyur ba med par ni/_/dngos po gang zhig rnam 'gyur ba/_/de de'i nyer len mi rigs te/_/ba glang ba men la sogs bzhin/_/sems dang lus kyang de bzhin no/_!_/de rgyu lhan cig byed pa las/_/skye ba'i 'bras bu lhan cig
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gnas/_/me dang zangs ma'i zhu nyid bzhin/_!_/yod med dag la rten [#]med phyir/_/ma yin yod pa'i gnas rgyu ni/_/rten yin zhes na 'di rten [#]med/_/gnas pa po las gzhan min phyir/_/gzhan yin na yang de rgyu nyid/_/des ni dngos po ci zhig byas/_!_/_
[\[110a.2\]]'jigs [#]pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_!_/gal te de 'jig rgyu las 'dod/_/de la'ang thal ba [#]mtshungs pa yin/_/gnas pa'i rgyus kyang ci zhig byas/_/gal te 'jig rgyu phrad bar du/_/des gnas 'jig pa dngos chos nyid/_/yod pa 'di gnod med phyir dang [#]/_/_
[\[110a.3\]]gnas pa'i rgyus ni ci zhig bya/_/gal te dper na chu sogs kyi/_/rten bzhin zhe na 'di la'ang mtshungs/_/dngos rnams [#]skad cig re rer ni/_/'jig na dngos rgyun [#]de lta bur/_/skye rgyu yin phyir de rten yin/_/de lta min na rigs ma yin/_!_/'bo ba yis [#]ni gegs
[\[110a.4\]]byed phyir/_/chu sogs kyi ni rten 'gyur gyi/_/'gro ba med can yon tan spyi/_/las rnams la ni rten ci dgos/_/'dis ni 'phrod pa 'du ba dang /_/'phrod pa 'du ba can rgyu dang /_/rigs la sogs pa rnam [#]gnas nyid/_/rten med phyir na bsal [#]ba yin/_!_/gal
[\[110a.5\]]te gzhan las dngos 'jig na/_/de yi gnas rgyus ci zhig bya/_/de gzhan med par 'jig na yang /_/gnas pa'i rgyu rnams nus med yin/_!_/rten bcas thams cad gnas ldan dang /_/skye ba can kun rten bcas yin/_/de phyir dngos po thams cad ni/_/'ga'
[\[110a.6\]]zhig tshe na'ang 'jig mi 'gyur/_!_/gal te rang 'jig ngang tshul bdag_/yin na de gnas byed gzhan gang /_/gal te rang 'jig ngang tshul bdag_/min na de gnas byed gzhan gang /_!_/lus kyi phul byung 'grib med par/_/blo yi byed pa'i khyad par gyis/_/shes rab _
[\[110a.7\]]la sogs phul byung dang /_/'grib pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/'di ni mar me'i 'od la sogs/_/rten [#]pa rnams la yod ma yin/_!_/de las kyang 'di khyad 'gyur te/_/sems la 'phan 'dogs med par min/_/'ga' tshe chags sogs rgyus sogs kyi/_/'phel ba bde
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]sdug las skyes yin/_/de yang khams snyoms la sogs pa/_/nang gi don ni nye ba las/_/'dis ni 'dus pa la sogs pa[#]/_/dran pa nyams sogs bshad pa yin/_/nang don khyad par las skyes pa'i/_/blos ni 'gyur bar byed phyir ro/_!_/dper rgyud khyad
[\[110b.2\]]par 'ga' zhig la/_/stag nyid dang ni khrag la sogs/_/thos pa dang ni mthong ba las/_/rmongs pa la sogs 'byung 'gyur bzhin/_/de phyir nges par gang nyid kyi/_/'du byed kyis [#]ni rjes 'jug pa'i/_/sems ni de med mi 'byung ba/_/de phyir sems la brten pa
[\[110b.3\]]yin/_!_/ji ltar sems la brten byas nas/_/thos sogs 'du byed sems la ni/_/dus gsal tha dad med pa'i phyir/_/de ltar lus la [#]yon tan 'gyur/_/bdag la chags pa dang ldan pas/_/sems can gzhan gyis bkri min par/_/bde sdug dor thob 'dod
[\[110b.4\]]pas na/_/dman pa'i gnas [#]ni yongs su len/_!_/sdug bsngal phyin ci log blo dang /_/sred pa kun nas 'ching ba ni/_/skye rgyu gang la de med pa/_/de ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_!_/gal te 'gro 'ong ma mthong na/_/dbang po mi gsal phyir ma mthong /_/dper na mig mi
[\[110b.5\]]gsal ba yis/_/du ba chung ngu mi mthong bzhin/_!_/lus can yin yang phra ba'i phyir/_/'ga' zhig la lar thogs med de/_/chu bzhin gser la dngul chu bzhin/_/ma mthong phyir na med pa min/_!_/lag sogs g.yo na thams cad dag_/g.yo bar 'gyur phyir 'gal ba
[\[110b.6\]]can/_!_/las ni gcig la mi rung phyir/_/gzhan du tha dad grub par 'gyur/_!_/gcig bsgribs pa na thams cad dag_/bsgribs par 'gyur ba'am ma bsgribs na/_/mthong 'gyur gcig tshon gyis bsgyur na/_/bsgyur ba'am ma bsgyur rtogs par 'gyur/_!_/de phyir tshogs
[\[110b.7\]]pa gcig yod min/_!_/du ma nyid na snga ma bzhin/_/khyad med phyir dang phra rab phyir/_/rtogs min zhe na khyad med par/_/ma grub khyad par can rnams ni/_/dbang yul de phyir rdul phran min/_/'dis ni sgrib byed la sogs pa/_/med pa dag kyang bsal ba yin/_!_/_
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dngul chu gser [#]dang 'dres pa 'am/_/rdo tshon [#]la sogs ji ltar snang /_!_/dbang sogs so sor nus med rnams/_/rtogs pa dag ni ji ltar yin/_/ldan las zhe na 'dir thal mtshungs/_/gal te gser dang dngul chu ni/_/ldan pas snang ba yin zhe na/_/_
[\[111a.2\]]rten mthong med par gang las rtogs/_/ro gzugs la sogs ldan par 'gal/_/gal te nye bar btags pa las/_/'dod na blo tha dad par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'phreng ring zhes byar 'gyur/_/de ldan rang gi ngo bo dang /_/brjod pa dag las tha dad par/_/grangs ldan
[\[111a.3\]]las la sogs pa yi/_/ngo bo blo la mi snang ngo /_!_/sgra shes dngos po tha dad pa'i/_/rjes 'brang rnam rtog brtags [#]don can/_/dper na yon tan la sogs pa[#]/_/zhig dang ma skyes dag la bzhin/_/gal te 'dir ni btags [#]'dod na/_/rgyu mtshan gang gis de 'dod pa/_/_
[\[111a.4\]]de ni dngos po thams cad la/_/de dag gi rgyus cis mi 'dod/_!_/gal te kun la nyer btags [#]min/_/tha dad khyad par gtso bo zhes/_/bya nyid gang las tha dad pa/_/med la tha dad don med na/_/don gzhan rgyu mtshan can min yang /_/dkar la sogs pa grangs sogs dang /_/_
[\[111a.5\]]ldan pa'i sgra ni rnam grangs min/_/gal te de la'ang don gzhan na/_/yon tan rdzas ni khyad med 'gyur/_!_/don gzhan min yang ldog pa yi/_/dbye bas tha dad pa yin te/_/las rdzas min pa'i sgra bzhin no/_/dngos po brjod pa'i sgra rnams kyis/_/grangs sogs de dang [#]ldan pa las/_/_
[\[111a.6\]]tha dad bzhin du bstan gang de'ang /_/chos gzhan khyad par byed pa yin/_/de tsam shes par 'dod pa la/_/gzhan kun 'phangs pa med par ni/_/la lar sor mo'i ldan pa zhes/_/tha dad chos bzhin rjod par byed/_/don gcig brjod kyang thams cad ni/_/'phen phyir sor mo ldan
[\[111a.7\]]'gyur zhes/_/chos can brjod par grags yin te/_/de ltar brdar ni byas pa yin/_/gzugs sogs nus pa'i khyad par ni/_/spong bas de mtshungs 'bras bu yi/_/rgyu min pa ni rnam gcod la/_/bum pa'i sgra ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/des na bum pa gzugs so zhes/_/gzhi
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]gcig pa can sgra ma yin/_!_/des na 'di ni rigs dang ni/_/tshogs pa brjod pa'i khyad par yin/_/de spyi yan lag tu byas te/_/bum pa yi ni gzugs sogs zhes[#]/_/de nus khyad par ston par byed/_!_/phyogs 'dis gzhan la'ang brjod par bya/_!_/ma lus rgyu nyid yin na ni/_/_
[\[111b.2\]]yan lag gcig dang bral na'ang min/_/re re nus pa nyid yin na'ang /_/cig car mang po 'byung bar 'gyur[#]/_!_/du ma nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/'byung rngub dag ni nges byed min/_!_/gcig nyid na yang mang gsal 'gyur/_/de rgyu rtag tu nye phyir ro/_!_/gal te du ma'i rgyu
[\[111b.3\]]min na/_/rim gyis kyang [#]min khyad med phyir/_!_/dbugs gcig la yang don du ma/_/'dzin phyir de las nges ma yin/_/du ma blo gcig gis shes na/_/de ni cig car nyid 'gyur te/_/'gal ba med phyir rim gyis kyang /_/mi 'gyur khyad par med phyir ro/_!_/rang rigs [# ]
[\[111b.4\]]min pa'i dus can gyi/_/dbugs kyi skad cig mang po dag_/gal te de 'dra'i sems nyid kyi/_/rgyu yin par ni rtogs [#]byed na/_/go rim ldan pa'i rgyu med par/_/de dag rim ldan ji ltar 'gyur/_!_/rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid na/_!_/dang po 'byung bar mi 'gyur te_/de rgyu
[\[111b.5\]]de 'dra yod ma yin/_/dbugs 'byung tha dad yul can phyir/_/yod kyang du ma nyid du nges/_/de phyir blo ni cig car skye/_!_/gal te du ma'ang gcig dus can/_/sems gcig gi ni rgyu yin na/_!_/dbugs rgyu zhan pa la sogs su/_/gcig ma tshang na'ang mi 'byung 'gyur/_/ci ste
[\[111b.6\]]ji ltar yod rgyu yin/_/shes pa la yang khyad yod 'gyur/_/gang zhig gang gi [#]tha dad las/_/tha dad min de [#]de 'bras min/_!_/rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir/_/gcig ni gcig gi rgyu yin te/_/rnam shes don gzhan [#]chags pa yis/_/nus med don gzhan [#]mi 'dzin phyir/_/_
[\[111b.7\]]gal te lus las cig car blo/_/skyes shing phyis ni rang rig las/_/nges na lus kyis [#]nus pa ni/_/ci yi phyir na ldog pa yin/_/gal te lus ni ldog pa na/_/rten min phyir na sems 'ba' zhig_/gnas 'gyur zhe na gal te de'i/_/rgyu 'jug thob phyir sems kyi rgyun/_/gnas
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rgyu yan lag mi 'gyur na/_!_/tshe 'di nyid kyi skye mched lnga/_/lus gzhan skyed [#]pa'i rgyu nyid yin/_!_/de yi [#]yan lag dngos po dang /_/rgyu nyid 'gog la mi [#]dmigs pa/_/nges 'byed [#]min par rab tu bshad/_/dbang sogs kyang ni lhag ldan yin/_/_
[\[112a.2\]]dbang po snga ma rang rigs las/_/nus pa dag ni mthong ba yin/_!_/'gyur ba mthong phyir gzhan dang gzhan/_/skye ba dag kyang 'grub pa [#]nyid/_!_/gal te lus las de skye na/_/snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur/_!_/sems las zhe na lus gzhan yang /_/'di nyid las ni skye
[\[112a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/des na rgyu dang bral [#]ba'i phyir/_/tha ma yi ni sems rnams kun/_/mtshams sbyor med pa min de'i phyir/_/de 'dra'i sgrub byed lhag ldan 'dod/_!_/goms las khyad par 'gyur na yang /_/mchongs dang chu yi drod [#]bzhin du/_/rang bzhin las 'das min
[\[112a.4\]]zhe na/_/byas te gal te slar yang ni/_/'bad rtsol la ni ltos 'gyur ram/_/rten mi brtan pa nyid 'gyur na/_/khyad par dag ni mi 'phel na/_/rang bzhin de 'dra'ang [#]ma yin te/_!_/de la phan 'dogs nus pa rnams/_/khyad par phyi ma dag la ni/_/sgrub pa'i nus pa med
[\[112a.5\]]phyir dang /_/rtag tu rten gnas ma yin phyir/_/khyad par 'phel yang rang bzhin nyid/_/min phyir gang tshe byas gyur pa/_/yang rtsol la ltos mi 'gyur na/_/rtsol gzhan khyad par byed par 'gyur/_!_/sems la brtse [#]sogs goms skye ba/_/rang gi ngang gis 'jug 'gyur te/_/_
[\[112a.6\]]me la sogs pas shing dag dang /_/dngul chu dang ni gser sogs bzhin/_/de phyir de dag las skyes te[#]/_/ngo bo nyid skyes yon tan yin[#]/_!_/des na rtsol ba phyi ma dang /_/phyi ma khyad par [#]byed pa yin/_/gang phyir rigs mthun snga ma yi/_/sa bon las ni 'phel ba can/_/_
[\[112a.7\]]brtse ba la sogs blo de dag_/goms par gyur na gang la [#]gnas/_/de ltar mchongs nyid las [#]mchongs min/_/de [#]rgyu stobs dang 'bad rtsol dag_/nus pa nges pa nyid kyi phyir/_/mchongs pa nges pa'i bdag nyid yin/_/de ni dang po phyis bzhin [#]du/_/mchongs min lus mi mthun
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/rtsol bas rim gyis mi mthun pa/_/bsal na rang stobs nyid du gnas/_!_/brtse rang sa bon las byung ba/_/gal te rang sa bon rgyu can/_/mi mthun phyogs kyis gnod med na/_/sems la de bdag nyid du 'gyur/_/'di ltar goms pa snga ma dang /_/_
[\[112b.2\]]snga ma'i sems chos brtse ba dang /_/chags bral blo sogs gzhan dag gi_/gsal ba yi ni rtsa ba yin/_!_/goms las brtse ba'i bdag nyid de/_/chags bral chags dang yid log bzhin/_!_/brtse ldan sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir/_/thabs rnams la ni mngon sbyor mdzad/_/_
[\[112b.3\]]thabs byung de rgyu lkog gyur pa/_/de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin/_!_/lung dang rig pas rnam dpyod pa/_/sdug bsngal nyid kyi khyad par gyis/_/sdug bsngal rgyu dang de mi rtag_/la sogs rang bzhin rtog [#]par mdzad/_/gang phyir de ltar rgyu gnas na/_/'bras ldog [#]gzigs
[\[112b.4\]]pa med phyir ro/_!_/de rgyu gzhom phyir de yi ni[#]/_/mi mthun phyogs la brtag pa mdzad/_/rgyu yi ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir/_/de mi mthun phyogs kyang nges 'gyur/_/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin byas pa/_/'dus byas spyod yul can chags ni/_/rgyu yin de yi gnod byed ni/_/bdag
[\[112b.5\]]med mthong ba 'gal ba yin/_!_/rnam pa du mar thabs mang po/_/yun ring dus su goms pa las/_/de la skyon dang yon tan dag_/rab tu gsal ba nyid du 'gyur/_/des na thugs kyang gsal ba'i phyir/_/rgyu yi bag chags spangs pa yin/_!_/thub chen gzhan don 'jug
[\[112b.6\]]can gyi/_/bse ru la sogs khyad 'di yin/_/de don phyir na thabs goms pa/_/de nyid ston pa yin par 'dod/_/grub las dang po 'byung ba'i phyir/_/gnyis po 'di ni rgyu ru bshad/_!_/rgyu spangs yon tan gsum bde gshegs/_/nyid yin sdug bsngal rten min phyir/_/_
[\[112b.7\]]legs yin de ni bdag med pa/_/mthong ba'am sbyor ba las yin no/_/skye dang skyon ni kun 'byung dag_/slar yang ldog ces bshad pa yin/_/bdag lta'i sa bon spangs pa'i phyir/_/slar mi gshegs pa nyid yin no/_/de bden tha dad bdag nyid kyis/_!_/lus ngag sems
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]kyi gnas ngan len/_/nyon mongs med dang nad med dang /_/lam bshad mi gsal nyid lus yin[#]/_/goms phyir ma lus spangs pa nyid/_!_/kha cig smra sogs phyir na skyon/_/zad min zhes zer 'di ldog la/_/the tshom za ba de phyir 'khrul/_/rtag nyid phyir
[\[113a.2\]]ram thabs med phyir/_/yang na thabs ni mi shes phyir/_/skyon rnams mi zad pa nyid ces/_/bya bar yongs su rtog grang na/_!_/rgyu yod phyir dang rgyu yi ni/_/gnyen po goms pas zad phyir dang /_/rgyu yi rang bzhin shes pa yis/_/de shes pa yang grub pa yin/_!_/skyob pa
[\[113a.3\]]nyid gzigs lam gsungs pa[#]/_/'bras med phyir na rdzun mi gsung /_/thugs brtse ldan phyir rtsom kun yang /_/gzhan gyi don du sbyor phyir ro/_/de phyir tshad yin yang na skyob/_/bden pa bzhi ni ston mdzad pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'khor ba can phung po/_/goms las 'dod
[\[113a.4\]]chags sogs gsal ba/_/mthong phyir 'dod [#]rgyal nyid min te/_/rgyu med skye ba 'gal phyir ro/_/'khrul phyir rlung sogs chos ma yin/_/gal te rang bzhin 'dres pa'i phyir/_/skyon med ce na de yi chos/_/de las gzhan yang cis ma mthong /_/thams cad 'dod
[\[113a.5\]]chags mtshungs par ni/_/thal phyir kun gyi chos ma yin/_/gzugs sogs bzhin skyon med ce na/_/gal te de la khyad par can/_/las rnams bdag po ma yin na/_/der yang rtsod pa mtshungs pa yin/_/[#]chags sogs rang bzhin thams cad kyi/_/chos yin par yang
[\[113a.6\]]'dod na go_/nus med rang bzhin med pas na/_/'bras bu mi mtshungs gang las yin/_/skyon rnams khyad par yod na yang /_/khyad par med phyir ma grub nyid/_/ma yin thams cad 'gyur ba yis/_/'gyur phyir kun las skye ba'ang min/_/rgyu ni 'phel bar gyur pa na/_/'bras
[\[113a.7\]]bu 'grib par mi rung ste/_/tsha ba sogs bzhin chags sogs kyi/_/'gyur ba bde sdug las skyes yin/_/cha mi mnyam skyes sdug bsngal gyis/_/gal te 'dod chags mi skyed [#]na/_!_/cis skyed [#]smros shig cha mnyam las/_/khu 'phel de las 'dod chags yin/_!_/cha mi
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]mnyam la chags can mthong /_/gzhan ni cha mnyam na yang min/_/gzhan ni zad nas khrag 'dzag [#]kyang /_!_/bud med gcig la khu nges med/_/de gcig la chags drag mi 'gyur/_/gal te gzugs sogs kyang yan lag_/ma yin kun ma nges phyir ro/_/nges pa med par
[\[113b.2\]]'byung [#]ba'ang min/_/yon tan mi 'dzin pa la'ang 'gyur/_/gal te yon tan 'dzin de yang /_/yan lag yin na thams cad kyis/_/yon tan 'dzin pa can 'gyur te/_/rgyu la khyad par med phyir ro/_!_/gnas skabs gang la chags can 'dod/_/de 'dra zhe sdang can mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[113b.3\]]de gnyis ngo bo mi mtshungs phyir/_/'di la nges par mthong ba'ang med/_/gang gi 'dod chags la sogs pa/_/rigs mthun bag chags khyad par la/_/rag las pas [#]ni 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de la skyon 'dir thal ba med/_!_/'dis ni 'byung ba'i chos nyid bkag_!_/rten yang
[\[113b.4\]]bkag pa nyid phyir ro/_/dkar po la sogs sa sogs la/_/brten pa nyid ni ma yin no/_!_/de rten sgra yang rgyu don nam/_/yang [#]na rang gi rten dag dang /_/dbyer med par ni gnas pa'i phyir/_/rten yin gzhan du 'thad ma yin/_/gal te myos sogs nus pa bzhin/_/_
[\[113b.5\]]dbyer yod ce na dngos po las/_/nus pa don gzhan nyid ma yin/_/dngos po 'jig 'gyur rten chad bar/_/gnas na rten [#]pa 'jig ma yin/_/gal te de mtshungs zhe na min/_/snang ba tha dad can rtogs [#]pas/_/'byung sems tha dad nyid phyir ro/_/ji srid lus ni 'gyur bar du/_/_
[\[113b.6\]]gzugs sogs bzhin du yid ngo bo/_/mtshungs 'gyur rnam par rtog pa ni/_/don gyi gzhan dbang can nyid gang /_/gang tshe lus la ltos med par/_/shes pa 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gis[#]/_/bag chags sad pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba/_/des na 'ga' zhig las 'ga' yin/_/_
[\[113b.7\]]rnam shes min pa rnam shes kyi/_/nyer [#]len min pa'i phyir yang 'grub[#]/_!_/gal te dngos po thams cad ni/_/rnam shes nus ldan phyir 'dod na/_!_/rtsa [#]sogs rtse na glang chen brgya/_/sngon tshe ma mthong yod do zhes/_/de skad grangs can phyugs las gzhan/_/ngo mtshar bcas pa
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]su brjod rtsol/_!_/rgyu ni lan brgyar rnam phye yang /_/ngo bo gang zhig snang gyur pa'i/_/ngo bo de ni sngar mi snang /_/ji ltar de ni yod par 'gyur/_/snga na med pa 'byung ba las[#]/_/chags sogs nges med thal bar 'gyur/_!_/'byung ba'i bdag las ma
[\[114a.2\]]'das phyir/_/gal te kun chags sogs ldan na/_!_/thams cad 'dod chags mtshungs par 'gyur/_!_/gal te 'byung khyad [#]las yin na/_/'byung rnams srog [#]chags khyad med kyang /_!_/khyad par 'di rten gang yin pa/_/de ni phul byung 'grib pa bzhin/_/de yod
[\[114a.3\]]pa las de med 'gyur/_!_/gal te chags sogs tha dad kyang /_/rgyu mtshungs [#]bdag nyid mi ldog phyir/_/min na bdag nyid 'dra rgyu'i phyir/_/kun la 'dod chags 'dra bar 'gyur/_!_/mtshungs bdag las byung ba glang gi_/shes pa'am 'dir yang sa sogs la/_/_
[\[114a.4\]]srog chags nyid sogs khyad par gyi/_/rim pa la lar yod ma yin/_!_/dro rim khyad par yod na yang /_/dro [#]med me 'ga' yod min pa/_/de bzhin 'dir yang zhe na min/_/dro las me gzhan bkag phyir ro/_!_/gang zhig gzhan yod yon tan ni/_/khyad par rim pa dang ldan pa/_/_
[\[114a.5\]]de dag de yi khyad par ni/_/la lar 'chad [#]'gyur dkar sogs bzhin/_/gzugs sogs bzhin du nges min te/_/de dag 'byung dang dbyer med phyir/_!_/gal te de mtshungs she na min/_/chags sogs lhan cig skyes thal phyir/_/rnam par brtags [#]pa yul yin phyir/_/_
[\[114a.6\]]yul yang nges byed ma yin no/_/skal mnyam rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir/_/chags sogs nges pa med pa'am/_!_/rgyu ni nye phyir blo rnams kun/_/thams cad kun tshe skye bar 'gyur/_!_/de ni res 'ga' dmigs pa'i phyir/_/mi rtag nyes pa'i rten phyir dang /_/rgyu dbang phyir yang sdug bsngal
[\[114a.7\]]yin/_/bdag min byin gyis brlabs [#]pa'ang min/_/rgyu min byin gyis rlob pa min/_!_/rtag pa ji ltar skyed byed yin/_/de phyir gcig las du ma ni/_/dus tha dad par skye mi 'gyur/_!_/rgyu gzhan dag ni chogs na [#]yang /_/'bras bu skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/rgyu gzhan rjes su dpog
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'gyur na/_/de ni rtag rnams la yod min/_/res 'ga' ba nyid yin pas na/_/sdug bsngal 'di [#]rgyu bcas nyid grub/_/rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir/_/rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur/_!_/ji ltar tsher ma la sogs kyi/_/rno [#]ba nyid sogs rgyu med pa/_/de ltar
[\[114b.2\]]'di dag rgyu med 'gyur/_/zhes ni kha cig rab tu brjod/_/gang yod nyid na'ang gang skye ba'am/_/gang 'gyur na yang rnam 'gyur ba/_/de ni de [#]rgyu rab tu brjod/_/de ni de [#]rnams la yang yod/_/reg pa gzugs rgyu nyid yin phyir/_/mthong ba la ni rgyu mtshan yin/_/rtag
[\[114b.3\]]rnams bkag cing dbang phyug la/_/sogs pa las kyang srid min te/_/nus med phyir ro de yi phyir/_/srid 'dod rgyu yin gang gi phyir/_/mi rnams yul gyi khyad par ni[#]/_/yongs 'dzin de thob bsam pas byas/_!_/de ni srid 'dod gang phyir yang /_/srog chags bde
[\[114b.4\]]sdug thob pa dang /_/'dor 'dod 'jug pa de dag ni/_/'dod dang 'jig sred yin par 'dod/_/bdag tu chags pa'i rgyu nyid las/_/bde min bde bar 'du shes pas/_/kun la rab tu 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de phyir sred pa srid rten yin/_/chags bral skye ba ma mthong phyir/_/_
[\[114b.5\]]zhes ni slob dpon rnams kyis gsungs/_/lus med chags pa ma mthong phyir/_/lus las kyang ni 'dod chags 'byung /_!_/rgyu mtshan khas blangs phyir na 'dod/_!_/nyer len nyid ni bsal ba yin/_/rigs 'di rjes su 'dod na ni/_/rang nyid rang 'dod la gnod 'gyur/_/_
[\[114b.6\]]gal te skye la chags mthong phyir/_/skye dang lhan cig 'byung zhe na/_/skal mnyam skye phyir sngar grub yin/_!_/mi shes srid pa'i rgyu yin yang /_/ma brjod sred [#]pa nyid bshad pa/_/rgyun ni 'phen pa [#]byed phyir dang /_/de ma thag phyir las kyang min/_/de yod na yod me phyir ro/_!_/_
[\[114b.7\]]de ni gtan du ba [#]min te/_/rgyu la gegs sogs srid phyir ro/_/'khor phyir thar pa med ce na/_/ma yin 'dod dang ma grub phyir/_/ji srid bdag chags [#]ma bcom zhing /_/de ni yongs su gdung 'gyur ba/_/de srid sdug bsngal sgro btags nas/_/rang bzhin du ni gnas
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]pa med/_/grol ba po ni med na yang /_/log par sgro 'dogs [#]gzhom phyir brtson[#]/_!_/'dod chags bral ba'i gnas pa ni/_/brtse ba'am yang na las kyis yin/_/'phangs las [#]ldog med 'dod phyir ro/_/srid pa'i sred las rnam brgal ba'i/_/las
[\[115a.2\]]gzhan 'phen nus ma yin te/_/lhan cig byed pa zad phyir ro/_!_/sdug bsngal shes la 'gal med pas/_/'du byed snga ma 'jug pa can/_/dngos chos brtse ba skye ba de[#]/_/sems can rjes 'brel can ma yin/_!_/de bdag [#]min pa'i chos la ni/_/bdag gzhan sgro 'dogs
[\[115a.3\]]pa las chags/_/sdug bsngal rgyun rig tsam las ni/_/brtse ba skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_!_/gti mug nyes pa'i rtsa ba ste/_/de yang sems can 'dzin pa yin/_/de med nyes rgyu las khro min/_/des na brtse ba nyes med 'dod/_!_/grol med ma yin mngon 'du [#]byed/_/zad
[\[115a.4\]]nas gzhan mtshams mi sbyor phyir/_!_/'du byed nus pa ma zad na/_/gang de gnas pa nyes med nyid[#]/_!_/snying rje dman pa nyid phyir yang /_/gnas pa'i 'bad rtsol chen po med/_/gang dag brtse ba chen po pa/_/gzhan gyi ngor ni bzhugs pa yin/_/gal te 'jig tshogs lta
[\[115a.5\]]bral phyir/_/lam dang por ni srid med 'gyur/_/lhan cig skyes pa ma spangs phyir/_/spangs na'ang srid pa ga la yod/_/bde bar 'gyur pa'am sdug bsngal bar/_/ma gyur cig ces 'dod pa na/_/nga 'o snyam pa'i blo gang de/_/sems can la lta [#]lhan cig skyes/_!_/nga zhes
[\[115a.6\]]mthong ba med par ni/_/'ga' yang bdag la chags ma yin/_/bdag la sred [#]pa med par yang /_/bde ba 'dod pas mngon rgyug min/_!_/sdug bsngal skye ba'i rgyu nyid ni/_/'ching yin rtag la de gang las/_/sdug bsngal mi skye [#]rgyu nyid ni/_/thar yin rtag la de gang las/_!_/_
[\[115a.7\]]mi rtag nyid du brjod med gang /_/de ni 'ga' yi'ang [#]rgyu ma yin/_!_/brjod bya min la'ang bcings dang thar/_/ji lta bur yang yod ma yin/_/gang gi rang bzhin 'jig med pa/_/de la mkhas rnams rtag ces brjod/_/des na ngo tsha'i lta ba 'di/_/spongs la de ni rtag par smros/_/_
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bshad zin lam de goms pa las/_/gnas gyur gal te gnas gyur kyang /_/lam bzhin skyon ni 'byung zhe na/_/ma yin nus pa med phyir ro/_!_/rnam shes yul 'dzin pa yi chos/_/ji ltar yod de 'dzin pa dang /_/yod pa yi ni bdag nyid de/_/'di yi [#]skyed par
[\[115b.2\]]byed pa'ang yin/_/rang bzhin 'di yin 'di las de/_/rkyen gzhan gyis ni gol 'gyur zhing /_!_/ldog pa la ni rkyen la ltos/_/mi brtan sbrul gyi blo bzhin no/_/sems kyi [#]rang bzhin 'od gsal te/_/dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba/_/de phyir sngar yang nus med rnams/_/_
[\[115b.3\]]de bdag [#]gyur la phyis nus med/_!_/nus yod na yang gnod pa can/_/skyed [#]nus snying po can dngos la/_/yun du gnas nus yod min te/_/sa rlon la ni me bzhin no/_/'tshe ba med dang yang dag don/_/rang bzhin la ni phyin log gis/_/'bad du zin kyang mi zlogs [#]te/_/_
[\[115b.4\]]blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro/_/bdag 'dzin rgyu gcig can nyid dang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i phyir/_/'dod chags khong khro phan tshun du/_/tha dad na yang gnod ma yin/_/byams sogs rmongs dang 'gal med phyir/_/shin tu nyes pa tshar gcod min/_!_/_
[\[115b.5\]]nyes kun de yi rtsa ba can/_/de yang 'jig tshogs lta ba yin/_/rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs phyir dang /_/sems byung nyid kyis dmigs pa'i phyir/_/log par dmigs nyid ma rig par/_/gsungs [#]phyir gzhan ni rigs ma yin/_/'gal ba gang yin 'dir
[\[115b.6\]]bshad bya/_/stong nyid lta dang de 'gal phyir/_/de yi rang bzhin nyes kun dang /_/'gal bar rab tu grub pa yin/_!_/zad [#]min srog chags chos nyid phyir/_/gzugs sogs bzhin min ma grub phyir/_/gnyen po'i phyogs dang 'brel ba na/_/ldog pa dag kyang
[\[115b.7\]]mthong phyir ro/_!_/nyes pa rnam par 'gags pa [#]ni/_/sra zhing [#]slar yang skye med de/_/de bdag nyid kyis 'bral med dang /_/thal ba bzhin du ma nges phyir/_!_/gang zhig bdag mthong de la ni/_/nga zhes rtag tu zhen par 'gyur/_/zhen pas bde la sred 'gyur te/_/_
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]sred pas skyon rnams sgrib par byed/_/yon tan mthong bas yongs sred [#]pa/_/nga yi zhes de'i sgrub byed len/_/des na bdag la mngon chags pa/_/de srid de ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/bdag yod na ni gzhan du shes/_/bdag gzhan cha las
[\[116a.2\]]'dzin dang sdang [#]/_/'di dag dang ni yongs 'brel las/_/nyes pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_!_/nges par bdag la chags pa ni/_/bdag gi la chags mi 'bral zhing /_/nyes med bdag la chags pa dang /_/bral ba'i rgyu yang yod ma yin/_!_/gal te chags pa
[\[116a.3\]]skyon bcas na/_/de las cir 'gyur de spong 'gyur/_/'di yul sun phyung med par ni/_/de spong bar ni [#]nus ma yin/_!_/yon tan skyon dang rjes 'brel ba'i/_/'dod dang sdang sogs spong ba ni/_/de dag yul la ma mthong bas/_/yin gyi [#]phyi tshul gang gis min/_!_/_
[\[116a.4\]]chags yon tan gyis chags min gyi[#]/_/don gyi yon tan mthong bas yin/_/ma tshang med rgyu de la ni/_/'bras bu gang gis zlog par byed/_!_/chags la skyon yang gang zhig mthong /_!_/gal te sdug bsngal rten zhe na/_/de lta'ang 'di la chags bral min/_/bdag gir mthong
[\[116a.5\]]phyir dper bdag bzhin/_!_/gal te de med bdag sdug bsngal/_/rgyu min de yang de dang 'dra/_!_/de ltar gnyis ka'ang skyon med pa/_/de phyir gnyis la chags bral min[#]/_!_/gal te sbrul bzung yan lag bzhin/_/sdug bsngal bsgoms pas spong 'gyur na/_/bdag
[\[116a.6\]]gi ba blo bcom pas 'di/_/'dor ba yin gyi bzlog la [#]min/_!_/dbang po la sogs longs spyod kyi/_/rten nyid du ni bzung ba la/_/rang blo gang gis bzlog 'gyur te[#]/_/de la chags bral de gang las/_!_/lus las bog pa'i skra sogs la/_/yid byung blo ni skye 'gyur
[\[116a.7\]]zhing /_/gzhan la zhen bcas skye 'gyur ba/_/thams cad kyi ni mngon sum yin/_!_/de la 'du sogs 'brel pa las/_/rang gi blo ni skye 'gyur ba'i/_/'brel te [#]de bzhin nyid gnas phyir/_/mthong du zin kyang spong mi 'gyur/_!_/'du ba la sogs med na yang /_/phan
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]'dogs nyid ni kun la yod/_!_/sdug bsngal bskyed phyir sor mo bzhin/_/rang gi blo ni mi 'gyur na/_/gcig tu de ni sdug bsngal min/_!_/phal cher dug bcas zas bzhin no/_/khyad par can bde [#]la chags pas/_/de 'gal ba la chags bral 'gyur/_!_/khyad par can
[\[116b.2\]]bde [#]la sred pas/_/bde ba cung zad yongs su spong /_!_/bsam med bdag la chags pa yis/_/ji ltar rnyed bzhin la 'jug ste/_bud med dag ni ma rnyed par/_/dud 'gro la 'dod spyod mthong bzhin/_!_/bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin te[#]/_/ji ltar de ni 'jig par 'dod/_!_/_
[\[116b.3\]]myong ba dang ni tha snyad dang /_/yon tan kun gyi rten log pa/_/ji ltar zhen pa yin 'dod de/_/zhen pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra min/_!_/rnam pa kun tu bdag 'dzin ni/_/bdag la chags pa bstan [#]par byed/_/de ni bdag gir zhen pa yi/_/sa bon gnas skabs de
[\[116b.4\]]nyid [#]gnas/_!_/brtson yang yon tan cha brten nas/_/'jug ldan bdag gi ba la ni/_/chags bral gegs byed pa nyid dang /_/de yi skyon yang sgrib pa yin/_!_/gal te bdag la'ang chags bral na/_/da ni chags bral gang yin med/_/de ni ji ltar bdag 'dor
[\[116b.5\]]ba[#]/_/sdug bsngal bsgom [#]pa don med 'gyur/_!_/de dag sdug bsngal bsgoms pas kyang /_/sdug bsngal nyid ni rnam shes byed/_/de ni sngar yang mngon sum nyid/_/de lta na yang chags bral med/_/gal te de la nyes pa yis/_/skad cig de yi blo ldog
[\[116b.6\]]kyang /_/de la chags bral mi 'gyur te/_/'dod ldan bud med gzhan la bzhin/_!_/blang dang dor bya'i khyad yod na/_/gcig las byung [#]ba'i chags gang yin/_/de nyid rnam grangs kyis bskyed tshe[#]/_/chags pa kun gyi sa bon yin/_/skyon med yul can
[\[116b.7\]]chags pa dang /_/sgrub byed kyang ni skyon med yin/_/'gro ba'ang de tsam nyid yin na/_/da ni gang la chags bral 'gyur/_/der de skyon bcas kyang yin na/_/de ni bdag la'ang mtshungs pa yin/_/der de'i skyon la chags bral med/_/da ni gang la de chags
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bral/_!_/yon tan mthong ba las byung ba'i/_/zhen pa nyes pa [#]mthong bas 'jig_!_/de ltar dbang sogs la de min/_/byis sogs la yang mthong phyir dang /_/skyon ldan la yang yod phyir dang /_/yon tan ldan yang gzhan dag la/_/med phyir 'das pa
[\[117a.2\]]la sogs pa/_/bdag gi ba la med phyir ro/_!_/de nyid phyir na bdag gi ba'i/_/blo rgyu'ang yon tan mthong bas min[#]/_/de phyir yon tan min mthong bas/_/de yang spong ba ma yin no/_/gzhan yang yod min yon tan ni/_/sgro 'dogs chags pas der yang mthong /_!_/des na de
[\[117a.3\]]rgyu gnod med can/_/bsgrubs pas de la ji ltar gnod/_!_/mchog gzhan don du gnyer phyir dang /_/skye 'jig blo can nyid kyi phyir/_/skye bo 'di yis dbang sogs las/_/bdag ni tha dad gyur par shes/_!_/de phyir gcig nyid mthong bas kyang /_/chags min bdag la chags
[\[117a.4\]]pa de/_/dmigs pa'i nang gi yan lag pa/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur/_!_/gang zhig da ltar sdug bsngal bas/_/yid 'byung de 'dra sdang yin gyi/_/chags bral ma yin de tshe yang /_/chags yod skabs gzhan 'tshol phyir ro/_!_/zhe sdang sdug bsngal rgyu can phyir/_/de ni de
[\[117a.5\]]srid tsam du gnas/_/de log na ni rang nyid kyi[#]/_/rang bzhin nyid la slar brten 'gyur/_!_/blang dang dor bya spangs pa'i phyir/_/thams cad la ni mnyam snyom can/_/tsan dan ste'u mtshungs pa la/_/chags bral zhes ni brjod pa yin/_!_/'du byed sdug bsngal la dgongs nas/_/_
[\[117a.6\]]sdug bsngal bsgom [#]par gsungs pa yin/_!_/nged kyi de yang rkyen las skyes/_/de ni bdag med lta brten yin/_/stong nyid lta bas grol bar 'gyur/_/sgom pa lhag ma de don yin/_/de phyir mi rtag las sdug bsngal/_/sdug bsngal las ni bdag med gsungs/_/chags
[\[117a.7\]]bral min dang sred ldan dang /_/rtsom pa kun la brten pa de/_!_/nyon mongs las las grol ma yin/_/de 'dra 'khor ba pa zhes bya/_!_/bdag gi nyid ni mi 'dod na/_/de yi za ba po yang med/_/bya dang longs spyod mtshan nyid can/_/de tshe [#]de yi bdag kyang med/_!_/de phyir grol 'dod
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]thog med pa'i/_/rgyu can rigs mthun sa bon las/_/byung ba'i 'jig tshogs lta ba dag_/rtsa ba nyid nas dbyung bar gyis/_!_/lung ni de lta'i [#]dngos yin pa'i/_/rgyu ma mthong ba rnams la ni/_/lung tsam gyis ni grol bar yang /_/smra ba yongs su mgu byed min/_!_/_
[\[117b.2\]]sa bon sogs grub cho ga ni/_/skyes bu mi skyed [#]par nus min/_/til mar bskus dang mes [#]bsregs sogs/_/bdag [#]kyang grol bar thal phyir ro/_!_/sngar lci ba dag phyis yang phyir/_/sdig pa bcom par byas pa min/_/'di yi lci nyid med 'gyur gyi/_/lus can
[\[117b.3\]]min phyir sdig lci min/_!_/log shes dang ni de las byung /_/sred pa sems pa'i dbang dag gis/_/dman gnas 'gro ba skye ba yin/_/de phyir de bcad 'gro mi 'gyur/_/de tsam las ni 'byung [#]ba'i phyir/_/skye la de dag nyid nus yin/_!_/sems pa de dag rang nyid las/_/_
[\[117b.4\]]yin phyir skye rgyu nyams pa med/_/'gro dang rtogs rten byed pa yin/_/de ni ma mthong ba las 'gyur/_/ma mthong zhig phyir 'gro ba med/_/des na 'du byed sems pa min/_!_/yod dang med pa'i rjes 'jug phyir/_/byed pa skyed [#]la blo yi ni/_/nus mthong gzhan gyis [#]ma yin na/_/_
[\[117b.5\]]de yod de dag cis mi 'gro/_!_/gal te de dag nus med na/_/dbang sogs byas ma thag de dag_/sems pa'i dbang gis 'dzin dang 'jug_/g.yeng dang 'gog pa med par 'gyur/_!_/ci ste de tshe blo med phyir/_/mi 'gyur dri ma rnams kyi [#]blo/_/mtshams sbyor de rnams
[\[117b.6\]]nus med na/_/gson pa nyid na'ang nus med 'gyur/_!_/gnyen po dang ni rang gi phyogs/_/'phel na [#]'grib dang 'phel ba'i phyir/_/nyes rgyun rang gi sa bon can/_/dbang bskur ba las ldog pa med/_/rtag pa [#]ltos pa med pa'i phyir/_/rim gyis skyed par byed pa
[\[117b.7\]]dang /_/byed dang mi byed pa dag ni/_/'dra ba'i bdag nyid byed pa [#]'gal/_!_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'ang gcig par 'gyur/_/de dag de las tha dad na/_/byed po za bo nyams par 'gyur/_!_/nus pa yang ni 'grub ma yin/_!_/gzhan gyis dran dang longs spyod sogs/_/thal
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ba gnod byed ma yin te/_/'ga'i yang dran pa med pa'i phyir/_/des na myong las dran pa 'byung /_!_/bden pa bzhi la [#]brten pa dang /_/bde dang nga dang nga'i zhes sogs/_/yang dag min pa rnam bcu drug_/sgro btags nas ni yongs su sred/_!_/de nyid
[\[118a.2\]]las [#]ni de 'gal don/_/de nyid rnam pa rjes rtogs can/_/legs bsgoms yang dag lta ba yis/_/sred pa rjes 'brang [#]bcas 'joms byed/_!_/las dang lus dag gnas na yang /_/gcig med phyir na rgyu gsum can/_/skye ba [#]srid pa ma yin te/_/sa bon med par myu gu
[\[118a.3\]]bzhin/_!_/las dang lus dag spong min te/_/gnyen po dag ni med phyir dang /_/nus med phyir ro sred pa ni/_/yod na slar yang 'byung phyir ro/_!_/gnyis zad don du 'bad na yang /_/las zad dub pa don med yin/_/'bras bu sna tshogs mthong ba'i phyir/_/las rnams
[\[118a.4\]]nus pa tha dad du/_/rjes dpog des na dka' thub kyi/_/nyon mongs dngos gcig gis mi mdzad/_!_/rnam 'gas de bskyed 'bras bu ni/_/chung 'gyur rigs mi mthun can min/_!_/'bras bu nyams su myong ba ni/_/[#]ci ste dka' thub nus pa yis/_/nus pa 'dres pa zad pa na/_/nyon mongs cha
[\[118a.5\]]'ga' spong ba'am/_/nyon mongs med par kun spang [#]'gyur/_/gal te dka' thub nyon mongs las/_/gzhan 'dod nyon mongs nyid ce na/_/de ni las 'bras yin phyir 'dis/_/nus pa 'dres sogs 'gyur ma yin/_!_/skye 'dod nyes pa bcom pa'i phyir/_/gang yang skyon rnams 'gog
[\[118a.6\]]byed pa/_/des skyed [#]las la nus 'gyur gyi/_/ji ltar byas pa nyams par 'gyur/_!_/las las nyes pa ma yin te/_/skyon ldan byed [#]'gyur bzlog las min/_!_/log pa'i rnam rtog med par ni/_/bde ba las kyang 'dod mi 'gyur/_!_/skyob las de nyid dang brtan dang /_/_
[\[118a.7\]]ma lus khyad par mkhyen par grub/_/gshegs pa rtogs pa'i don phyir te/_/de phyir phyi rol pa dang slob/_mi slob las lhag de yi phyir/_/gzhan don mkhyen sbyor de ston pa/_!_/de las brtse yin gzhan don ngor/_/don grub [#]mdzad pa mi 'dor phyir/_/brtse bas legs
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dang ye shes las/_/bden pa gsung mdzad sgrub byed bcas/_/de gsung bar [#]yang mngon sbyor ldan/_/gang phyir des na tshad ma nyid/_!_/de lta'i dngos ston bstod pa ni/_/de yi bstan pa nyid las ni/_/tshad ma'i de nyid grub don de[#]/_/rjes su dpag [#]pa ma bzlog phyir/_/_
[\[118b.2\]]cung zad skye ba'i bdag nyid can/_/gang de thams cad 'gag [#]chos can/_/zhes sogs rnam pa du mar ni/_/'di yi sbyor ba'ang [#]mthong phyir ro/_/med na mi 'byung mtshan nyid can/_/rtags ni rjes dpag rten yin no/_/bsgrub byas gtan tshigs khyab pa ni/_/bstan
[\[118b.3\]]phyir de yang gsal bar bshad/_/tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa [#]las tshad ma grub pa zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa'o//_/gzhal bya gnyis phyir tshad ma gnyis/_/don byed nus dang mi nus phyir/_/skra shad la sogs don min te/_/don du mos pa med phyir
[\[118b.4\]]ro/_/'dra dang mi 'dra nyid phyir dang /_/sgra yi yul dang yul min phyir/_/rgyu mtshan gzhan ni yod pa na/_/blo ni yod dang med phyir ro/_/don dam don byed nus pa gang /_/de 'dir don dam yod pa yin/_/gzhan ni kun rdzob yod pa ste/_/de dag rang spyi'i mtshan nyid
[\[118b.5\]]bshad/_!_/gal te thams cad nus med na/_/sa bon sogs ni myug sogs la/_/nus mthong gal te de kun rdzob/_/'dod na ci ste de ltar 'gyur/_!_/gal te kun la de yod na/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog_/blo la ma mthong phyir min te/_/mig dang gzugs sogs
[\[118b.6\]]blo bzhin no/_/des ni brda dang rtsol ba sogs/_/nang gi yan lag rjes 'jug phyir/_/bum pa 'degs [#]dang spyi dang ni/_/grangs sogs blo ni bshad pa yin/_!_/skra shad sogs ni spyi min te/_/don du zhen pa med phyir ro/_!_/shes byar 'dzin phyir med pa la/_/nyes pa dag tu thal
[\[118b.7\]]mi 'gyur/_!_/de dag gi yang de lta'i dngos/_/bkag med gsal bar [#]snang ba nyid/_/shes pa'i ngo bo'i don nyid phyir/_!_/skra sogs zhes bya'i blo dag ni/_/spyi yi spyod yul can yin la/_/skrar snang don med can yin no/_!_/gal de spyi ni shes ngo bo'i/_/don nyid yin na
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]thal bar 'gyur/_/de ltar 'dod phyir skyon yod min/_!_/don gyi ngo bo nyid kyi spyi/_/kun la ngo bo mtshungs phyir dang /_/de ldog [#]pa la brten phyir ro/_!_/brjod bya nyid phyir de dngos min/_!_/dbang sogs 'bras bcas nyid phyir ro/_!_/ming sogs
[\[119a.2\]]brjod na 'chad po dang /_/nyan po brjod bya rjes 'brel can/_/ming sogs 'brel pa med pa can/_/don la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te don la tshul 'dra las/_/'khrul 'jug gyur [#]na dus kun dang /_/yul la 'khrul min shes pa la/_/mtshungs min
[\[119a.3\]]rnam pa de 'dra'i blo/_/skye [#]phyir gzhan la de med de/_/phyi rol don du snang ba yi/_/blo ni khas len med phyir ro/_!_/khas len na yang rnam shes las/_/tha dad pa na [#]tshad can min/_/ldog pa grub pa med phyir ro/_!_/shes kun don ldan phyir zhe na/_/'thad min rmi sogs
[\[119a.4\]]rnam gzhan du/_/mthong phyir 'du byed las kyang min/_/sngo la sogs par snang phyir ro/_!_/thogs med phyir na [#]sngo sogs min/_!_/rung [#]yul gnas pas mi shes pa/_/rang nyid shes phyir de shes yin/_/des ni ming sogs brjod pa yin[#]/_!_/mig la sogs pa'i blo 'dod pa/_/_
[\[119a.5\]]de nyid don ldan gang gis 'dod/_/gal te don nus mthong phyir na/_/gzhan pa don med can thob 'gyur/_/'brel med na yang 'jug mi 'gyur/_/gal te don dang 'brel ldan na/_/'das dang ma 'ongs brjod bya min/_/don [#]dang de ni zad phyir ro/_!_/sgra yis [#]spyi ni
[\[119a.6\]]brjod pa'i phyir/_!_/gal te thal bar mi 'dod na/_/de min spyi ni yan gar ba/_/brjod med phyir ro [#]brjod na yang /_/de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min/_/des na rtag tu dmigs 'gyur te/_/rtag nyid phyir ro gal te yang /_/gsal las mngon sum la gsal yin/_/_
[\[119a.7\]]bdag la shes pa skyed pa na[#]/_/nus pa gang de nus nyid yin/_/gal te 'ga' tshe nus med na/_/de ni kun tshe [#]nus med 'gyur/_!_/de yis [#]nus pa'am nus med pa/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gang gnas pa/_/rtag phyir bcos su yod min na/_/de zad bya phyir nus pa gang /_/spyi yi rnam
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]par shes de dang /_/rjes 'brel sngon po la sogs pa'i/_/rnam pa'i cha ni rnam nges gang /_/de ni de la gang gis sprul/_/gal te mngon sum shes don nyid/_/phyir na dbang po don med min/_/de dngos gcig phyir sgra sogs las/_/tha dad snang blo gang las yin/_!_/rigs
[\[119b.2\]]ldan rigs min gang gi phyir/_/gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan rten med/_/gal te tha dad grub ce na/_/bltos phyir 'bras bu nyid du brjod/_/rang gi rgyu las grub pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu rag las med par yang /_/rtog pa yis [#]ni 'brel par byed/_/'bras min ji ltar yong ci
[\[119b.3\]]zhig_/gzhan nyid yin na de 'brel [#]med/_/de phyir rang bzhin med par grub/_!_/med pa'i [#]rigs su thal mi 'gyur/_/de la ltos pa med pa'i phyir/_/de phyir ngo bo la brten nas/_/ngo bo med pa'i rigs brtags pa/_/khyad par de la 'jug don can/_/sgra rnams kyis ni rab
[\[119b.4\]]tu bstan/_/de la ngo bor [#]snang ba 'am/_/don la de nyid du 'dzin pa/_/gang de 'khrul pa thog med pa'i/_/dus can mthong goms kyis sprul yin/_!_/don rnams kyi ni spyi gang yin/_/gzhan las log [#]pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/sgra 'di dag gis gang brjod pa/_/de la
[\[119b.5\]]ngo bo cung zad med/_!_/ngo bo med can spyi blo la/_/spyi nyid du ni mthong phyir dang /_/don la 'khrul pa'am [#]med pa ni/_/spyir [#]'dod de yang bslad phyir dang /_/de nyid du na [#]don dngos su/_/med phyir ngo bo can ma yin/_/ngo bo med pas brjod bya min/_/gal te brjod bya 'ga' zhig las/_/_
[\[119b.6\]]dngos 'dod dngos rnams ji ltar yang /_/brjod bya min pa nyid ma yin/_/nyer len tha dad phyir gzhan du/_/brjod par bya min nyer brtags [#]phyir/_/'das pa dang ni ma 'ong pa'i/_/don la'ang [#]spyi yi rgyu can gyi/_/mnyan pa ngag ni 'jug 'gyur na/_/yod pa med chos ji
[\[119b.7\]]ltar 'gyur/_!_/gal te nyer brtags las de 'dod/_/gang zhig snam sogs la med la/_/da [#]ltar ba yi bum pa yi/_/dngos med dang ni nye ba gang /_!_/blo ni 'khrul pa med 'jug pa/_/rtag tu dngos dang sgro 'dogs la/_/seng ge bram ze'i khye'u la/_/de ltar brjod pa'ang
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]'jig rten yod/_!_/don med na yang 'gro ba yis/_/gang la grags pas sgra bkod pa/_/de la de dngos [#]de mtshungs phyir/_/'khrul rtog [#]can gzhan phal pa yin/_!_/ji ltar dngos po nus med la/_/med ce'am rtog pa ji bzhin du/_/nus la'ang
[\[120a.2\]]gtso bo la sogs pa'i/_/mnyan pa skye bos byas pa yin/_!_/zhig la [#]sgra las blo ji 'dra/_/snang ba de 'ang ma zhig la'ang /_!_/rna ba la sogs rnam par shes/_/don yod can la de dag med/_!_/spyi tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir/_/sems gnyis dag ni mtshungs pa yin/_/_
[\[120a.3\]]de 'ba' zhig ni 'dzin byed pa/_/sngar ni rnam par bzlog [#]zin to/_!_/phan tshun khyad par can rnams ni/_/khyad med ngo bo ji ltar 'gyur/_/ngo bo nyid gnyis yod na yang /_/de dngos gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur/_/gal te de dag mtshungs pa yi/_/dngos de de dag las
[\[120a.4\]]gzhan nyid/_/de dag gi zhes 'brel med 'gyur/_/ldog pa la ni sun dbyung med/_/de phyir mtshungs nyid spyi 'di la/_/dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/de 'bras she na du ma dang /_/'jig 'gyur de yang 'dod ma yin/_/'jig pa dngos po tsam dang ni/_/rjes
[\[120a.5\]]'brel phyir na rtag nyid min/_/rigs rnams 'bras bu min phyir na/_/ma 'brel pa dang dngos med 'gyur/_/dngos po'i stobs kyis [#]skyes pa yin[#]/_/shes pa gang de brda dag la/_/bltos pa ma yin spyi yi ni/_/blo la de ltar snang ba med/_/dngos gnyis mthong la blo 'ga'
[\[120a.6\]]zhig_/brda med na yang tha dad med/_/rjes su 'jug pa gang yin de[#]/_/don nye ba dang 'brel ba yin/_/ji ltar rigs med shes pa yi/_/'bras can mig sogs nye 'dod bzhin/_!_/gang gis rnam par phye ba yis/_/rigs kyang rjes su 'gro ba yin/_!_/rnam pa
[\[120a.7\]]'gas kyang rnam shes la/_/de dngos snang ba med phyir ro/_/gzugs can yin phyir dbang rnams la/_/gal te lta ba po yod na/_/de lus snang 'gyur rigs rnams ni/_/ma yin yan gar mthong min phyir/_/gsal 'dzin tshe na'ang [#]de sgra dang /_/ngo bo las gzhan
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]snang ba med/_!_/de phyir de ni shes tsam gyi/_/don byed par yang mi rung ngo /_!_/de mi rung phyir rang bzhin med/_/de ni dngos med mtshan nyid yin/_!_/ji skad bshad las bzlog gang yin/_/de ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dod/_!_/dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka la/_/_
[\[120b.2\]]brten [#]phyir spyi de'ang rnam pa gsum/_!_/gal te dngos brten dngos 'brel phyir/_/dngos po shes 'gyur zhe na min/_/lan btab phyir dang 'das sogs la/_/rnam pa gzhan du mthong phyir ro/_!_/gal te dngos chos nyid nyams na/_/dngos por 'dzin pa sngon
[\[120b.3\]]'gro can/_/de shes yin phyir nyes 'di med/_!_/rang gi mtshan nyid gcig gzhal [#]bya/_/yod med nyid du dpyod rnams kyi/_/don bya de las grub phyir ro/_/de ni rang gzhan ngo bo yis/_/rtogs phyir gzhal bya gnyis su bzhed/_/ji bzhin mngon zhen min pa'i
[\[120b.4\]]phyir/_/gnyis pa [#]'khrul pa yin par bzhed/_/gal te gzhan gyi ngo bos ni/_/rtogs [#]na 'khrul pa tshad ma min[#]/_!_/bsam pa la ni bslu [#]med phyir/_/'khrul pa yin yang tshad ma nyid/_/rnam gzhan gyis kyang rtogs pa mthong /_/phyogs 'di la ni lan btab zin/_!_/_
[\[120b.5\]]nor bu sgron me'i [#]'od dag la/_/nor bu'i blo yis mngon rgyug pa/_/log pa'i shes par khyad med kyang /_/ji ltar don byed la khyad yod/_!_/de ltar ji bzhin don med na'ang /_/rjes dpag dang ni der snang dag_/don byed pa dang rjes 'brel bas/_/tshad ma nyid du rnam
[\[120b.6\]]par gzhag[# ]!_/gang la don gyi nus pa las/_/rjes 'gro ldog pa can gyi blo/_/de la 'dzin pa rang dbang can/_!_/de las gzhan dngos dbang po 'das/_/ma [#]mthong bdag nyid ngo bo de/_/rtog [#]pa'i rten ni don gzhan yin/_/gal te de rten dang 'brel can/_/yin
[\[120b.7\]]na de tshe go byed nyid/_!_/de tshe go byed rjes 'gro ba/_!_/spyi yi ngo bo nyid du rtogs/_/des na lkog gyur don thams cad/_/khyad par du ni rtogs mi 'gyur/_/'brel pa can gyi chos las ni/_/chos can la rtogs [#]skye ba gang /_/de ni rjes dpag lkog gyur gyi/_/sgrub
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]byed gcig tu nges pa yin/_!_/mngon sum lkog [#]tu gyur pa las/_/gzhal bya gzhan ni yod ma yin/_!_/de phyir gzhal bya gnyis nyid kyis[#]/_/tshad ma gnyis su bzhed pa dang /_!_/gzhal bya gnyis ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/gsum gcig grangs ni gsal [# ]
[\[121a.2\]]ba yin/_!_/med pa gzhal bya ma yin phyir/_/gcig nyid ce na kho bo'ang 'dod/_/med pa'ang nges phyir gzhal bya ni/_/min la ma nges pa nyid dam/_!_/de nges tshad ma gnyis pa nyid/_!_/med la dbang skyes blo min te/_/don gyi stobs las [#]skyes pa'i phyir/_/don gyi nus la
[\[121a.3\]]ltos med na/_/bar chod la sogs yod na yang /_/dbang skyes blo ni skye bar 'gyur/_/gal te mngon sum nyid ldog las/_/med par nges pa yin zhe na/_/'gal ba'am de nyid ldog pa dang /_/rjes 'gro can gyi rtags yin na[#]/_/gzhan sems dag ni rtogs phyir yang /_/_
[\[121a.4\]]tshad ma gnyis ni grub pa yin/_/smra sogs la ni 'jug pa'i phyir/_/de yi ngo bo nges par grub/_/bslu [#]med phyir de tshad ma nyid/_!_/gal te la la dag tu ni/_/'khrul phyir yid brtan med ce na/_!_/rtags log [#]mthong phyir de de 'dra/_!_/gang las 'ga' tshe dngos 'ga' la/_/_
[\[121a.5\]]de yi rtogs pa [#]grub gyur pa/_/de ni de las skyes pa'am/_/de yi ngo bor gdon mi za/_/rang gi rgyu'am ngo bo dag_/med par don ni srid min pa/_/de dag rang bzhin mthong gang yin/_/de nyid gzhan du'ang mtshan nyid yin/_!_/ltar [#]rung rang gi ngo bo 'am/_/rang rgyu mthong ba'i
[\[121a.6\]]rgyu gzhan dag_!_/yod par snang ba med na ni/_/de dang ldan pa'ang ci [#]ltar yod/_!_/spyi yi blo ni tshad min na/_/med pa thob 'gyur pha rol gyi/_/dngos bzhin gal te dbang rnams kyis/_/dus gzhan du ni rtogs she na/_/de min dbang dang nus sogs la/_/dbang skyes
[\[121a.7\]]blo ni mi srid phyir/_/med pa [#]rtogs pa yin na ni/_!_/blo dang skye ba rgyu med 'gyur/_!_/rnam rtog med pa nyid kyis na/_/rang gi mtshan nyid la mngon sum/_/rnam rtog med par spyi 'dzin min/_/de phyir de la rjes dpag nyid/_!_/gzhal bya [#]nges na kha dog ni/_/mi rtag nyid du rtogs
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]mi 'gyur/_/de blo tshad ma gzhan 'gyur te/_/rtags [#]med par ni yod phyir ro/_!_/khyad par mthong la rtags dang ni/_/'brel pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir/_/de ni tshad ma gzhan yin no/_/gzhal bya mang [#]phyir tshad ma rnams/_/mang po nyid dam gcig la yang /_/_
[\[121b.2\]]du ma nyid ni 'jug phyir te/_/gcig gsum grangs kyang sel mi 'gyur/_/dper na khyad par mthong ba bzhin/_/yul nges pa ni med phyir dang /_/gzhal bya gzhan ni yod phyir ro/_!_/skyon 'dir thal bar mi 'gyur te/_/kha dog spyi la sbyor phyir ro/_/dngos med ngo bo
[\[121b.3\]]min de nyid/_/de ltar grub pas bsgrub [#]phyir ro/_/gzhan las [#]gzhan grub min zhe na/_!_/min te de nyid grub phyir ro/_!_/dngos gang ci lta bur gyur pa/_/de 'dra de ni rtags [#]sems kyi/_/rgyu yin de las de lta yi/_/dngos la des bskyed rtags can blo/_/de ltar rtags
[\[121b.4\]]dang rtags can blo/_/brgyud pa yis ni dngos po la/_/'brel phyir der snang ba yis ni/_/stong yang slu byed nyid ma yin/_!_/de yi ngo bos stong de dag_/de yi ngo bor zhen pa'i phyir/_/de dngos slu byed nyid min yang /_/'khrul par rnam gzhag byas pa yin/_/de phyir dngos
[\[121b.5\]]po rtogs bya la/_/khyab byed de yi ngo bo 'am/_/rgyu dag khyab par bya sems kyi/_/rgyu mtshan de yang de [#]blo'i yin/_!_/dgag pa nyid ni thams cad du/_/mi dmigs pa las 'grub pa yin/_/tshad mas grub par smra rnams kyi/_/don gyi [#]bzlog pa nyid las yin/_!_/dgag la
[\[121b.6\]]de 'am de rgyu dang /_/'gal bar brjod pa mthong gang yin/_/de yang de yi tshad ma nyid/_/med pa 'phen par byed pa yin/_!_/gzhan du dngos gcig yod brjod pas/_/gzhan med de ni [#]gang las rtogs/_!_/'gal phyir zhe na de nyid kyang /_/cis 'grub [#]lhan cig mi gnas phyir/_/_
[\[121b.7\]]zhe na de yang gang las 'dod/_/snang ba mthong med phyir zhe na/_/de ni tshad ma nyid ma yin/_/de phyir rang sgras [#]brjod na yang /_/de nyid med pa'i sgrub byed yin/_/gang la de ni tshad min des/_/dgag pa rnam kun brjod bya min/_!_/des na [#]de dang 'gal don gyi/_/'bras bu
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]brjod pa bshad pa yin/_/kun la sbyor ba tha dad nyid/_/yin gyi [#]don la tha dad med/_!_/'gal dang de ni thabs bcas pa/_/grub dang bkag pa med par ni/_/dgag la tshad smra gang yin de[#]/_/rig pa'i rjes 'brang can min de[#]/_!_/smra la sogs pas
[\[122a.2\]]kun mkhyen dang /_/'jig rten gzhan sogs med sgrub bzhin/_!_/dbang po las 'das don rnams dang /_/'gal ba grub pa med phyir ro/_/gal te smra po rig [#]yin na/_/gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo gang /_!_/de 'dra mi dmigs phyir zhe na/_/de nyid sgrub byed yin par brjod/_/_
[\[122a.3\]]mi dmigs pa ni de lta bu/_/nges byed min par rab tu brjod/_/de phyir shin tu lkog gyur la/_/yod med nges pa yod ma yin/_!_/'gal de [#]chos ni tha dad dam/_/tha dad med la rab sbyor te/_/kha la [#]med par sgrub pa la/_/me dang skye la yod gnod bzhin/_/ji ltar dngos
[\[122a.4\]]nyid sgrub pa la/_/dngos po rnams kyi sgrub byed 'dod/_/de bzhin dngos nyid rang ldog na/_/dngos rnams ldog par byed pa yin/_!_/des ni rtog [#]pas sbyar ba'i chos/_/phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las/_/gang rung nyid sogs bsal yin te/_/ci yang rung la srid
[\[122a.5\]]phyir ro/_!_/de la'ang khyab par byed pa'i chos/_/khyab bya ldog pa'i go byed 'dod/_/gal te rang gi ldog pa ni/_/rnam 'gar [#]yongs su bcad na 'o/_!_/med pa la ni de nyid kyi/_/tshad med rtags su brjod gang yin/_/de ni shin tu rmongs don te[#]/_/gnag rdzi mo bar grags phyir
[\[122a.6\]]ro/_/mi dmigs pa ni 'di tsam zhig_/med la nges pa'i 'bras can yin/_/de yang snang bar 'dod pa yi/_/rgyu 'am rang bzhin snang med nyid/_!_/rjes su dpag pas mi rtag sogs/_/'dzin pa la ni tshul 'dir 'dod/_/gzhan du gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/tshad ma
[\[122a.7\]]nyid du 'dod ma yin/_/dngos las mi rtag gzhan du med/_/de yang dbang po las sngar grub/_!_/du ma'i dngos de brjod bya min/_/rtog pas bskyed chos brjod bya yin/_!_/spyi yi rten ni grub pa na/_/spyi de nyid ni grub pa yin/_!_/de ma grub na de ltar de/_/rab tu grub phyir rjes
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]dpog yin/_!_/'dra ba gzhan ni yod pa'i phyir/_/la lar yongs su mi shes te/_/'khrul phyir sgong gi tha dad bzhin/_/tha dad mthong ba med phyir ro/_!_/'di ltar rtags med byis par gyi[#]/_/skye bos phyis 'byung ba dang ni/_/'brel med mar me la sogs kyi/_/'jig pa
[\[122b.2\]]mthong bas yongs gcod nyid/_!_/nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du/_/gyur kyang de ma thag med pas/_/'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir/_/rmongs gyur [#]nges gsal med phyir ro/_!_/de nyid bzlog pa'i ched du ni/_/rjes su dpag pa brjod pa yin/_!_/blo gros chen pos
[\[122b.3\]]mthong nyid las/_/rnam pa thams cad nges par byed/_!_/thams cad las ni ldog [#]pa yis/_/tha dad med don de la ni/_/ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can blo dang /_/ji ltar brdar [#]btags pa yi sgra/_/tha dad rten can bzhin 'jug 'gyur/_!_/'khrul rgyu med na de yis ni/_/_
[\[122b.4\]]ngo bo nyid kyis rang dang ni/_/rjes su mthun pa'i blo skyed byed/_!_/yang na 'dir ni [#]mi dmigs pa'i/_/rtags las 'jig pa [#]grub pa yin/_!_/sngar byung dngos po med gyur pa/_/mi rtag ces ni brjod pa yin/_!_/gang gi mtha' gnyis tshod [#]yod pa'am/_/'brel
[\[122b.5\]]pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can/_/mi rtag nyid kyi sgra yin pa/_!_/de mtha' de dag gang la brjod/_/gal te snga phyir med yin na/_/de nyid mi rtag cis ma yin/_/drug pa sogs sbyor mi rung phyir/_/zhe na mtha' la de ci ltar/_/yod nyid dang 'brel rtag pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[122b.6\]]mtha' yis khyad par 'gyur ba min[#]/_!_/gal te rgyu 'bras mtha' yin na/_/khyad par med pa nyid 'gyur te/_/'brel med phyir ro de yis ni/_/dngos po sngar med 'dod min pas/_/de la de yi khyad par can/_/brjod pa de yang mi 'grub [#]phyir/_!_/yod pa nyid dang rang rgyu dang /_/_
[\[122b.7\]]'brel byed phyir na rgyu zhes grag[# ]/yod nyid de [#]dang 'brel [#]de yang /_/rtag na 'o na 'di 'bras gang /_!_/gang zhig med pa de byed na[#]/_/dngos po sngar med ldan min te/_/'brel pa khas len med phyir ro/_!_/de phyir ril 'di rtag par 'gyur/_/de phyir med don sgro 'dogs pa/_/_
[\[123a\]]
