[\[123a.1\]]brjod bya tha dad can blo ni/_/tha dad med don mngon 'dod can/_/sgra la'ang ldog pa'i rten yin no/_!_/skad cig so sor [#]tha dad phyir/_/khyad par ngo shes ma yin no/_/mthong dang mtshungs par de 'dzin phyir/_/khyad par yul can nyid kyang min/_!_/_
[\[123a.2\]]gal te de nyid dpe yin pa'i/_/phyir na spyi 'dzin min zhe na/_/dpe nyid yin phyir grub de la/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/_/gal te brjed [#]phyir skyon med na/_/de nyid phyir na dpe ma yin/_!_/gal te mthong la de dngos ni/_/tshad mas grub na dngos gzhan la/_/de nyid
[\[123a.3\]]sgro 'dogs phyin ci log_/des grub tshad can nyid ma yin/_/mngon sum cig shos gcig yin phyir/_/gcig grub pa na gnyis ka grub[#]/_/gzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yi[#]/_/zhen pa mkhas pas dran par shes/_!_/gal te de rtags la bltos phyir/_/dran min ma yin 'khrul
[\[123a.4\]]phyir ro/_!_/mngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni/_/mngon sum nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/kun gyi rnam rtog ming rten [#]can/_/so so [#]rang gis rig [#]bya yin/_/thams cad las [#]ni sems bsdus nas/_/nang gi bdag nyid g.yo med par[#]/_/gnas na'ang mig gis [#]gzugs
[\[123a.5\]]dag ni/_/mthong ba'i blo de dbang skyes yin/_!_/slar yang cung zad rnam rtog na/_/kho bo'i rnam rtog 'di 'drar gyur[#]/_/ces rig [#]sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi/_/dbang po rtogs [#]pa la med do/_!_/gcig tu mthong ba'i khyad par ni/_/gzhan 'ga' zhig tu mthong mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[123a.6\]]de las spyi [#]gzhan tha dad pa/_/yod min tha dad blo med phyir/_!_/de phyir dbang po las skyes blo/_/thams cad khyad par yul can yin/_!_/khyad par rnams la sgra dag ni/_/'jug pa srid pa yod min te/_/khyad par rjes 'gro med pas na/_!_/brda 'jug pa ni med phyir ro/_/sgra
[\[123a.7\]]rnams yul yang gang de nyid/_/de rnams nyid ni sbyor bar byed/_!_/de'i 'di zhes ni 'brel pa la/_/don snang ba ni [#]gang yin pa/_/de dag nyid ni 'brel yin na/_/de ni dbang po'i spyod yul min/_/de tshe gsal bar snang ba yi/_/don snang ba ni med phyir ro/_/shes snang tha dad pa
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]yis ni/_/don rnams khyad par byed pa yin/_/mig la don snang ba na yang /_/'di zhes gzhan gyis bstan pa gang /_/de nyid sgra yis sbyor [#]byed kyi/_/dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin no/_/dbang po'i bya ba med pa la/_/gzhan dag tsam gyis snang med phyir/_/'brel ba
[\[123b.2\]]ma byas can min te/_/rang nyid shes par thal phyir ro/_!_/rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid/_/cig car du ni 'jug phyir ram/_/'jug pa myur phyir blun po dag_/de dag la ni gcig tu zhen/_/gal te rnam rtog gis bcad pas/_/mthong ba rgyun chad 'gyur zhe na/_/_
[\[123b.3\]]gzhan gyi'ang rigs ni tha dad pa'i/_/rnam par rtog tshe ji ltar min/_!_/gal te mgal me mthong ba bzhin/_/dngos phyogs stobs dang ldan 'dod na/_!_/de ni gzhan la'ang mtshungs pa yin/_!_/yi ge'ang cig car thos par 'gyur/_!_/'dir don kun dang cig
[\[123b.4\]]car du/_/'dus can dbang rnams yod pa na/_/lnga po rnams kyis chod na yang /_/chod med bzhin du snang ba'i blo/_/gang de ming gi mthar thug pa'i/_/shes pa skad cig dang 'dres phyir/_/chod par snang ba de ngo mtshar/_/de phyir blo ni cig car 'gyur/_!_/snang
[\[123b.5\]]ba la yang khyad med na/_/bar bcas bar med ji ltar yin/_!_/yid kyi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la'ang /_/rim du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_!_/la lar kun tu chags sems can/_/don nye ba la'ang 'dzin med gang /_/chags pas gzhan skyes [#]nus nyams phyir/_/gnyis
[\[123b.6\]]ka la yang rtsod 'di yod/_/mgal me la sogs myur 'jug [#]pa'i/_/rjes su 'gro bas gnod pa can/_/mig las 'khor lor 'khrul skye yi/_/de mthong mtshams sbyor las ma yin/_!_/la la dbang skyes la sogs phyir/_/byis pa'i blo bzhin rtog med dang /_/_
[\[123b.7\]]byis pa'i rtog [#]med nyid kyi rgyu/_/brda nyams pa nyid yin smra ba/_/de dag gi ni rtog med phyir/_/byis pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/_!_/brda yi rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir/_/de ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur ro/_!_/gal te brda la ma byang ba'i/_/yid yod des na de 'dod na/_!_/_
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]de bzhin dbang skyes la yang 'gyur/_/'di 'dra 'di yang lhag ldan yin/_!_/byis la sgrub par byed gang yin/_/de nyid 'dir yang brjod bya ste/_/dbang po'i blo [#]ni mtshungs phyir ro/_!_/'dis [#]ni myong sogs bshad pa yin/_!_/khyad par
[\[124a.2\]]dang ni khyad par gzhi[#]/_/'brel dang 'jig rten gzhung lugs ni/_/bzung nas de dag sdom byas te/_/de ltar rtogs kyi [#]gzhan du min/_/dper dbyug can bzhin rigs sogs kyi/_/bye brag rtogs pa med pa'i phyir/_/de ldan sbyor ba yod min pa/_/des na 'di
[\[124a.3\]]la rtog [#]pa'ang med/_!_/rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang /_/de yang sgra dang gsal bar snang /_/kha dog dbyibs yig rnam pa yis/_/stong pa ba lang nyid du brjod/_!_/de nyid mtshungs pa nyid yin kyang /_/mig gi yul la mthong med de/_/snang ba gnyis ni med phyir
[\[124a.4\]]ro/_/blo tha dad pa'ang rnyed par [#]dka'/_/dbang pos 'phro 'du 'dzin med phyir/_/'brel pa mthong ba med par gnas/_!_/snal ma 'di la snam bu zhes/_/sgra 'di dag kyang rang gis byas/_/ba lang la rwa zhes 'jig rten/_/rwa la ba lang 'jig rten min/_/ba lang zhes bya [# ]
[\[124a.5\]]yan lag ni/_/lhag ma rnam bcad dmigs med phyir/_/snal ma de rnams kyi [#]snam bu/_/'di zhes snal ma 'dus byas las/_/phyis 'byung 'bras bur brjod yin gyi/_/ji lta bur yang dus gcig min/_!_/'ga' yis rgyu sgro btags pa'am/_/sgra mi [#]rten ni ston pa na/_/_
[\[124a.6\]]snal ma gcig ni bkar [#]byas la/_/'bras la snal ma zhes 'jug 'gyur/_!_/phan gdags phan 'dogs byed nyid dam/_/rnam par chad med snang ba nyid/_/'khrul med can shes [#]dang po yi/_/brda la [#]spyod yul gang yin dngos/_!_/dngos po las ni tha dad can/_/_
[\[124a.7\]]rigs sogs la ni rjes dpag med/_/dbyug pa can sogs thams cad la'ang /_/kun rdzob pa las tha snyad 'dogs/_!_/dngos po khang bzang 'phreng sogs kyi/_/sgra yang gzhan la bltos pa min/_!_/gal te khang pa ldan yin na/_/de 'phreng de ni ci zhig yin/_!_/gal te rigs
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]yin khang gcig kyang /_/shing bzhin 'phreng zhes brjod par 'gyur/_/'phreng mang po la de yi sgra/_/ci ltar rigs la rigs med phyir/_/'phreng sogs la ni chen po sogs/_/nyer brtags [#]las 'dod gang yin pa/_/dngos dang khyad med rnam shes kyi[#]/_/gzung bya
[\[124b.2\]]nyid phyir nyer brtags [#]min/_!_/dngos su mngon par 'dod pa la'ang /_/rgyu gzhan min pa nyid de mtshungs/_/drug rnams la ni tshig don sgra/_/rgyu gzhan gang la ltos par mthong /_!_/ji ltar grags las grub gang yin/_/dngos dang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/gang
[\[124b.3\]]la de skad brjod phal pa/_/dngos la [#]dngos med btags phyir ro/_!_/grags pa brda yi rjes 'gro can/_/de yang brjod 'dod rjes 'gro can/_/tha snyad don du byas pa ste/_/sdeb sbyor ming dang sgra cha bzhin/_!_/tha dad kyang gang dngos chos kyis[#]/_/de 'dra'i rnam shes
[\[124b.4\]]rgyu yi ni/_/don de dag la shes pa des/_/de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_!_/tha dad tha dad min par ni/_/rtogs la shes pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de phyir de 'bras med bral ba/_/rjes 'gro dngos gcig yod ma yin/_/dngos rnams la yod de yi phyir/_/_
[\[124b.5\]]dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' can/_!_/phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la/_/reg pa med kyang sgra de ni/_/rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/de yi mthar thug rnams dang 'brel/_/des na gzhan sel mthar thug phyir/_/mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod/_!_/ldog
[\[124b.6\]]pa bzhin du sgra dag las/_/shes la gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan snang /_/gang de'ang don gyi bdag nyid min/_/de 'khrul bag chags las byung yin/_!_/de ni mnyan pas brjod pa na/_/don gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur/_/de ma rtogs na de don can/_/brda byed pa ni
[\[124b.7\]]don med 'gyur/_/sgras don cha ni ci [#]brjod ces/_/de la gzhan sel brjod par bya/_/rnam pa de yang don la med/_/de brjod ci ltar don brten [#]yin/_!_/rjes 'gro can sgras [#]rjes 'gro can/_/don gyi 'bras yin mthong goms pas/_/sbrul de'ang rjes 'gro med pa
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]can/_/blo las tha dad med phyir ro/_/de dngos sgro btags rtogs pa yis/_/gzhan las bzlog pa rtogs phyir yang /_/sgra don gang yin de nyid ces/_/brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med/_!_/shes pa sgra yis nges sprul pa/_/de dag log par snang ba nyid/_/_
[\[125a.2\]]don gyi cha la 'di rjes 'gro/_!_/de ltar mnyan pa gzhan sel byed/_!_/de phyir brda yi dus na yang /_/rang nyid mthong ba'i 'bras bu can/_/bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa'i phyir[#]/_/gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur/_!_/gzhan du ma mthong la bltos dang /_/la lar de mthong
[\[125a.3\]]la ltos phyir/_/gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel 'gyur gyi/_/de ni dngos la mi rung ngo /_/de phyir rigs sogs de ldan ni/_/yod min don dang de dag la/_/mnyan pa 'brel min gzhan las ni/_/ldog pa nyid la sgra sbyor phyir/_/brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyi/_/mthong ba sre
[\[125a.4\]]byed bdag nyid can/_/snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa yi/_/mig shes la ni de ci ltar/_!_/gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang /_/mig gis gzugs dag mthong gyur pa/_/der ni gsal bar de yi brda/_/mi 'dzin des bskyed [#]rtog pa'ang med/_!_/gang la sgra ni nges 'god
[\[125a.5\]]pa/_/de la rtog pa skye bar 'gyur/_/des na dbang skyes 'dod pa yis/_/'jug 'gyur phyi rol mthong mi 'gyur/_/gzugs la gzugs zhes mthong ba na/_/de [#]blo zhes ni ji ltar mthong /_/de yis [#]nyams su myong ba'ang yod/_/de ni rtog med ci ltar yin/_/de nyid kyis myong yin
[\[125a.6\]]na ni/_/rtog gnyis cig car mthong ba med/_/des ni dus mtshungs rnam par shes/_/gzhan gyis myong ba bstan pa yin/_!_/'das pa la ni dran par 'gyur/_/myong ba med la de ci ltar/_!_/rang blo'i blo dang gzhan gyi blo/_/yongs gcod ngo bo gcig par 'gyur/_!_/don rig
[\[125a.7\]]'das pa dpe dag dang /_/bral zhing rtags ni yod min te/_/cis grub gang phyir de la ni/_/mngon sum ma yin rtags can min/_!_/gal te de yi ngo bor ni/_/snang can de ma thag pa'i blos/_/gzugs sogs bzhin du 'dzin 'gyur na/_/snga blo de ni 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]ji ltar rang gi yul can gyi/_/rnam shes nyams myong de rtog med/_/de bzhin brda bya mi nus pa/_/gzhan yang rtog pa med par 'gyur/_!_/spyi brjod ngang tshul can sgra dang /_/rtog pa'ang de dang don gcig na/_/rtog pa med pa med na ni/_/khyad par gang gis rtogs par 'gyur/_/_
[\[125b.2\]]gal te rtog med 'ga' zhig kyang /_/yod na de dang mtshungs rgyu can/_/thams cad de bzhin 'bras bdag nyid/_/tha dad rgyu tha dad las yin/_!_/phyi rol don la ltos med par/_/brda dran pa las sbyor ba yin/_/de bzhin brda la ltos med par/_/dngos nus nyid las mig
[\[125b.3\]]blor 'gyur/_/gal te gzugs ni brda dran la/_/bltos na dbang po'i blo dag la/_/nus 'gyur ltos med ma yin na/_/rtags [#]bzhin dran pa nyid la 'gyur/_!_/de ni de 'brel skye ba'i phyir/_/dran las dbang blo [#]'gyur ba'am min/_/de las dus gzhan du yang 'gyur/_/_
[\[125b.4\]]la lar rnam g.yeng srid phyir ro/_!_/gal te rim gyis gnyis rgyu yin/_/tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur/_!_/dbang po'i blo rgyu gzhan yin na/_/de la [#]dran pa don med 'gyur/_/brda dran ji ltar brdar btags pa/_/grub pa'i don du 'dod pa dang /_/khyad par brdar
[\[125b.5\]]btags med 'dzin na/_/de la dran pa don ci yod/_/spyi [#]tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni/_/khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo [#]/_!_/de phyir mig dang gzugs dag la/_/brten nas mig blo skye bar 'gyur/_/gal te mngon sum shes bskyed la/_/dbang po bzhin du yul nus yin/_/_
[\[125b.6\]]'o na ci phyir gnyis rag las/_/skye ba de ni des mi brjod/_!_/go bar byed pa nyid mthong nas/_/tha snyad nges par sbyar ba yin[#]/_!_/dbang po'i tha snyad la de yod/_/sbyar bar bya ba'ang de chos yin/_!_/de phyir tha snyad 'di la ni/_/sbyar bya rang bzhin rtags yin te/_/_
[\[125b.7\]]khyab [#]par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/log pa'i phyir ni ldog par 'gyur/_/bsags pa dag ni tshogs pa yin/_/de spyi de la [#]dbang po'i blo/_/spyi blo gdon mi za bar yang /_/rnam par rtog dang rjes su 'brel/_!_/don gzhan dang ni mngon 'brel phyir/_/rdul phran gzhan
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]gang skye 'gyur ba/_/de dag bsags bshad de dag ni/_/shes pa skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin/_!_/rdul phran gzhan dag med par ni/_/rdul phran khyad par de yang med/_/shes de gcig la nges min phyir/_/spyi yi spyod yul can du bshad/_!_/gal te skye
[\[126a.2\]]mched gcig yin yang /_/cig car du ma 'dzin ma yin/_!_/til sogs tha dad la ji ltar/_/cig car 'dzin par [#]snang ba yin/_!_/'di la mgyogs pa bshad zin to/_!_/rim bzhin 'bab pa de nyid la/_/ji ltar rim min [#]'dzin mi 'gyur/_!_/blo rnams dag ni thams
[\[126a.3\]]cad kyang /_/dus mtshungs ci ltar de dag la/_/'ga' zhig rim min [#]snang ba dang /_/gzhan ni rim ldan snang bar 'gyur/_/de phyir don kun 'dzin pa la/_/'di ni rim min thal bar 'gyur/_!_/phye ma leb khra la sogs gzugs/_/du ma'ang ci yang [#]snang bar 'gyur/_/gal
[\[126a.4\]]te sna tshogs de gcig na/_/de bas chos 'di ngo mtshar che/_!_/sna tshogs gcig pa'i rang bzhin min/_/dper na nor bu'i gzugs de bzhin/_!_/sngo sogs rnam par dbye ba ni/_/snam khra la sogs dag la'ang mtshungs/_/gal te de la yan lag gzugs/_/'ba' zhig
[\[126a.5\]]de ltar mthong zhe na/_/gal te sngo sogs spangs pa yi/_/khra bo gzhan mthong ngo mtshar ro/_!_/dus dang don gyi rnam pa ni/_/mtshungs par rtogs pa'i blo dag las[#]/_/gcig ni rim ldan don mang dang /_/gcig ni rim min [#]don gcig gis/_!_/blo rnams sna tshogs ngo bo'i
[\[126a.6\]]phyir/_/don rnams sna tshogs ngo bo nyid/_!_/gal te de rgyu min zhe na/_/tha dad bzhag [#]'di gang gis 'grub/_!_/rigs mi mthun rnams rtsom med phyir/_/ri mo sogs blo sna tshogs min/_/gzugs med phyir ldan sna tshogs min/_/nye bar brtags [#]la brten pa'ang min/_/_
[\[126a.7\]]re re sna tshogs min phyir ro/_!_/rim bzhin du ni bzung ba la/_/sna tshogs blo yis bsres min te/_/gcig gis du ma mi 'dzin phyir/_!_/de phyir gcig don du ma can/_/gang phyir don gcig rtog [#]pa na'ang /_/gzhan dag mthong ba de phyir yang /_/rtog pa med par grub pa yin/_/_
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]sna tshogs snang can don rnams la/_/gal te gcig nyid mi rigs na/_/re zhig gcig pu'i blo de nyid/_/sna tshogs su ni ci ltar snang /_!_/ji lta ji ltar don bsams pa/_/de lta de ltar rnam 'brel [#]zhes/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa/_/de ni dngos stobs
[\[126b.2\]]'ongs pa yin/_!_/gcig la sna tshogs de cir 'gyur/_!_/blo de la yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te don rnams bdag nyid 'dir/_/'dod na de la [#]ngas ci bya/_/de phyir don dang shes pa la/_/rags snang yod min de bdag [#]nyid/_/gcig la bkag pa nyid phyir dang /_/mang
[\[126b.3\]]po la yang yod ma yin/_!_/yongs gcod [#]nang yin phyi rol ltar/_/gnas pa 'di ni cha gzhan yin/_!_/tha dad med can shes pa yi/_/tha dad snang ba bslad pa [#]nyid/_/de la gcig ni med pas kyang /_/gnyis ka'ang nyams par 'gyur ba yin/_!_/de phyir gnyis stong
[\[126b.4\]]gang yin pa/_/de ni de yi'ang de nyid yin/_/dngos rnams tha dad gnas pa 'di/_/de tha dad la brten pa yin/_/de ni bslad pa nyid yin na/_/de dag tha dad kyang bslad 'gyur/_!_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las/_/mtshan nyid gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/des na mtshan
[\[126b.5\]]nyid stong pa'i phyir/_/rang bzhin med par [#]rab tu bshad/_!_/phung po la sogs bye brag gis/_/mtshan nyid thams cad byed pa yi/_/khyad par can de'ang de nyid min/_/des kyang de dag mtshan nyid bral/_!_/ma rig gis bslad bdag nyid la/_/ji lta'i rang rkyen la ltos
[\[126b.6\]]nas/_/rnam rig de bzhin min rnam pa/_/skye 'gyur rab rib la sogs bzhin/_!_/pha rol mthong min thams cad kyis[#]/_/de nyid de ni rig ma yin/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bslad pa dag_/med na de ni med phyir ro/_!_/des de nyid don btang snyoms can/_/glang chen
[\[126b.7\]]gzigs stangs nyid mdzad nas/_/'jig rten thugs ni 'ga' [#]zhig gis/_/phyi rol dpyod [#]la 'jug par mdzad/_/shes pa sngo sogs sna tshogs pa/_/shes pa'i khyad par gzhan rten [#]med/_/mthong nus ma yin de yi tshe/_/rnam dbye don la 'jug par 'gyur/_/_
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]shes gang ji ltar snang ba de/_/de lta nyid du myong ba yin/_/de ltar sems kyi rnam pa ni/_/sna tshogs gcig gi [#]ngo bor 'gyur/_!_/ras sogs gzugs ni gcig yin na/_/de bzhin rnam dbye med par 'gyur/_/tha dad can ni rnam bsal [#]ba/_/_
[\[127a.2\]]tha dad med pa gzhan mthong med/_!_/gal te dbang po la sogs bzhin/_/khyad par skyes gyur mang po dag_/cig car blo yi rgyur 'gyur yang /_/'gal ba dag ni ci zhig yod/_!_/rgyu yi dngos po ma gtogs pa/_/gzung ba zhes bya [#]gzhan ci'ang med/_/de la blo ni gang du snang /_/_
[\[127a.3\]]de ni de yi gzung bar brjod/_!_/ji ltar rang gi yan lag bcas/_/cig car yan lag can bzung yin/_!_/lkog shal sogs mthong med par ni/_/ba glang shes pa mthong ba med/_!_/gal te yon tan gtso bo dag_/cig car rtogs par 'dod na yang /_/cig car yan
[\[127a.4\]]lag rdzogs 'dzin min/_/yon tan la sogs ldan pa'ang min/_!_/khyad par dang ni khyad par can/_/brjod par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir/_/yan lag nyid du nyer bzung gang /_/de nyid kyis ni de 'dzin 'gyur/_!_/rang gis [#]dngos po gzhan dag las/_/tha dad
[\[127a.5\]]med phyir yon tan sogs/_/tha dad byed pa'ang ma bzung phyir/_/gzhan gzhan mthong yang blo gcig 'gyur/_!_/yon tan la sogs khyad par [#]ni/_/gzung phyir du ma rtogs [#]'gyur na/_/'gyur mod de lta yin na yang /_/'di dag gi 'brel 'tshol bar 'gyur/_!_/sgra
[\[127a.6\]]sogs du ma nyid yin phyir/_/cig car du ma 'dzin par grub/_/bkod pa can ni ma bzung bar/_/bkod pa 'dzin pa mi rung phyir/_!_/chos can thams cad las ldog pa/_/gang dang gang las log de las/_/tha dad brtags [#]pa'i tha dad can/_/de ni du ma'i ngo bo nyid/_/_
[\[127a.7\]]brtags pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa/_/sna tshogs snang ba de dag ni/_/rtog pa med sems sna tshogs min/_/res 'ga' pa yi spyod yul min/_/gal te dkar sogs yod gyur kyang /_/dbang po'i spyod yul ci 'dra ba/_/de ni sgra yis brjod min te/_/shes pa'i rang
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bzhin tha dad phyir/_!_/blo rnams don gcig nyid yin yang /_/rten sna tshogs pas der 'gyur na/_/da ni rna ba la sogs sems/_/tha dad don can de gang las/_/sems kyi rten ni gzhan dang gzhan/_/skyes su chug kyang gcig nyid kyi/_/dngos de rang bzhin sna tshogs
[\[127b.2\]]su/_/snang ba de ni gang las yin/_!_/mthong ba rtags [#]pa med par ni/_/brjod dang rnam rtog 'jug pa'i phyir/_/mthong las ba glang la sogs pa'i/_/ngo shes pa ni bzlog pa yin/_/ba lang la sogs mthong ba la/_/rigs sogs brjod dang rnam rtog dag_/rjes su
[\[127b.3\]]'gro las rjes dpog gang /_/de yang 'di yis sun phyung ngo /_!_/mthong ba tha dad nyid yin yang /_/ngo shes pa zhes bya ba yi/_/rnam rtog gcig ni rang bzhin gyis/_/byed pa yin zhes brjod zin to/_!_/sngar myong ba ni 'dzin pa na/_/yid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin/_/ma mthong
[\[127b.4\]]'dzin na long ba la/_/sogs pa yis kyang don mthong 'gyur/_!_/skad cig nyid phyir 'das pa yi/_/don mthong yod pa ma yin zhing /_/skad cig min na mtshan nyid ni/_/khyad par bcas pa brjod byar 'gyur/_!_/bya ba bsgrubs can las la ni/_/khyad par cung zad mi byed
[\[127b.5\]]la[#]/_/dbang po can nam [#]gzhan dag ni/_/sgrub par byed pa ji ltar 'dod/_!_/dngos po de las skye ba'i blo'ang /_/thams cad cig car 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gzhan gyis khyad par bya min na/_/de la ltos pa 'gal phyir ro/_/de phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes/_/de ma
[\[127b.6\]]thag rkyen las byung can/_/yid ni yul gzhan nyid 'dzin byed/_/de phyir long bas mthong ba min/_!_/rang don rjes 'gro'i don ltos can/_/dbang skyes blo ni rgyu yin no/_/de phyir 'di gzhan 'dzin na yang /_/nges pa 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/_/de dang byed dus [#]mtshungs
[\[127b.7\]]med can/_/rang shes dus can don [#]dag ni/_/ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa yi/_/lhan cig byed pa yin zhe na/_/med pa sngar nus med phyir dang /_/phyis kyang nye bar mi sbyor phyir/_/rgyu rnams thams cad sngar yod yin/_/de phyir rang blo bcas don min/_!_/dus tha dad pas [# ]
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]ji ltar 'dzin/_/zhe na rig pa shes pa yis/_/shes pa'i rnam pa [#]'jog nus pa'i/_/rgyu nyid la ni gzung bar shes/_!_/rgyu du ma nyid yod na yang /_/'bras bu rjes byed skye ba gang /_/de ni de yi ngo bo de/_/bzhag dang gzung [#]zhes brjod pa yin/_!_/_
[\[128a.2\]]bde sogs bdag nyid gzhan ma bsten[#]/_/brda byed par ni nus ma yin/_!_/de phyir de dag rang rig ni/_/brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin/_!_/gzhan yang rig byed min de dag_/rang gi ngo bo ci ltar rig_/don gcig la brten rnam shes kyi[#]/_/rig bya yin zhes 'ga' zhig zer/_!_/de
[\[128a.3\]]dang de min rang bzhin can/_/de dang de min dngos rgyus bskyed/_!_/rnam shes rgyu las gzhan min skyes/_/bde sogs de cis shes ma yin/_!_/don bcas dbang po rung ba dang /_/bdag nyid ji lta'i sems yod na/_/bde ba la sogs skye bar mthong /_/yid kyang de dang mtshungs pa
[\[128a.4\]]yin/_/de dag med dang yod pa na/_/'ga' la bde la sogs dang blo/_/skye dang mi skye mthong de'i phyir/_/de las de skye gzhan las min/_!_/de dag nyid kyi khyad par las/_/bde sdug la sogs tha dad yin/_/dper na blo de nyid kyi ni/_/gsal dang mi gsal the tshom bzhin/_!_/don gang [#]nye
[\[128a.5\]]bas blo dang ni/_/bde sogs de dag skye 'gyur ba/_/de bor nas ni bde sogs nyid/_/des ni ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur/_!_/rim gyis 'dzin na de myong ba/_/rnam chad med par snang mi 'gyur/_/mgyogs phyir zhe na de mtshungs phyir/_/myong ba med par cis ma yin/_!_/gcig gis gnyis shes
[\[128a.6\]]ma yin te/_/dbang po'i sems ni nges phyir dang /_!_/bde sogs med kyang don dag las/_/skye phyir de nus grub med phyir/_!_/gnyis kyis so so so sor yang /_/nus pa yin na sngo sogs bzhin/_/bde sogs 'ba' zhig 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de rgyu'i don ni ma bzung bar/_/de myong bar ni mi
[\[128a.7\]]rigs so/_!_/don dang lhan cig nyid 'dzin na/_/bde sogs kyi ni nus pa ci/_/gang phyir des bskyed blo mi 'dod/_!_/don med par ni bde [#]la sogs/_/mig sogs rnams kyis myong na ni/_/gzugs sogs bud med sogs khyad par/_/nam yang mig gis 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/nang gi
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]yan lag nus pa'i don/_/yod na phyi rol mthong mi 'gyur/_/don 'dzin na ni de las skyes/_/bde ba la sogs myong mi 'gyur/_!_/yul de dang ni de yod las/_/blo ni cig car skye na ni/_/cig car don ni yod pa na/_/bde sdug dag ni rig par 'gyur/_!_/nang gi nyer len shes pa
[\[128b.2\]]yang /_/yod na sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung /_/gcig po de ni 'gal ba yi/_/nyer len min par 'dod ce na/_/gang gis rnam par shes pa ni/_/mi shes pa yi nyer len rgyu/_/bdag po nyid du 'gyur yin na/_/de ni 'gal ba dag la'ang mthong /_/dper na snang gcig
[\[128b.3\]]mtshan rgyu dang /_/de las gzhan pa'i dbang po dag_/gzugs mthong ba dang mi mthun dang /_/mthun pa cig car byed pa bzhin/_!_/de phyir bde sogs rang nyid la/_/'phos pa'i don ni snang ba dang /_/de myong phyir na 'jig rten 'dogs/_!_/phyi rol don ni dngos su min/_/rang bdag
[\[128b.4\]]rig byed 'di dag ni/_/don las skyes pa tsam du zad/_/don gyi bdag nyid de dag gi_/rang gi bdag gyur des myong yin/_/des na don myong bar bshad de/_/dmigs pa nyid ni der snang ba'o/_!_/'ga' zhig bde sogs phyi rol na/_/gnas nyid dang ni sems med dang /_/gzung
[\[128b.5\]]bar smra ste de yi yang /_/cig car gnyis 'dzin mi rigs so/_/sngo sogs rang bzhin bde sogs dang /_/gcig phyir cig car 'dzin zhe na/_!_/tha dad snang can sems kyis ni/_/gzung de ci ltar tha mi dad/_/phyi der khyad par yod min yang /_/goms pa yi ni khyad par las/_/_
[\[128b.6\]]blo la dga' dang yongs su gdung /_/khyad par du ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te blo yang bde sogs kyi/_/bdag nyid yin pas mi 'gal na/_/da ni phyi de bde sogs kyi/_/bdag nyid yin zhes ci ltar rtogs/_!_/gal te rigs ni tha dad dag_/gzung 'dzin min na skyes bu ni/_/kun gyi
[\[128b.7\]]'dzin byed mi 'gyur te/_/des na za ba po nyid nyams/_!_/'dis ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bsal[#]/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu ma yin te/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa nyid med phyir/_/yod na de [#]ni gzhan la'ang 'gyur/_/de phyir de ni nang nyid dang /_!_/myong bya nyid phyir sems
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]yin no/_!_/gang gi rang bzhin myong ma [#]yin/_/de ni de yi [#]myong ma yin/_!_/gal te de rang bzhin min pa/_/myong ba'i blo gnas de rig na/_/mngon sum dran pa'i rnam pa can/_/myong ba ma gtogs 'di blo gang /_/de dang de don la brten nas/_/_
[\[129a.2\]]bde dang sdug bsngal sogs myong ba/_/gcig nyid 'byung bar 'gyur mthong gi_/bar du gzhan ni ma mthong ngo /_!_/lcags gong dang ni me bzhin du/_/'dres pas rnam dbyer [#]med ce na/_!_/de lta yin na dngos kun la/_/tha dad tha dad min bzhag nyams/_!_/tha dad
[\[129a.3\]]med myong gcig yin na/_/de ltar gang min de tha dad/_/can sgrub 'di sgrub byed min na/_/tha dad sgrub byed 'grub ma yin/_!_/sdug bsngal dkar sogs tha dad snang /_/tha dad ma yin blo myong ni/_/tha dad med snang tha dad na/_/tha dad tha dad med rten ci[#]/_!_/gcig
[\[129a.4\]]tshe gsal bas bsgribs na yang /_/sems kyi khyad par rgyun dag la/_/tha dad par ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/tha dad rnam gzhag grub pa yin/_!_/rnal 'byor shes pa sngar bshad pa/_/de dag gi de bsgoms byung yin/_/rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal bas/_/gsal
[\[129a.5\]]ba nyid du snang ba yin/_!_/'dod 'jigs mya ngan gyis brlams dang /_/rkun po rmi sogs kyis bslad pas[#]/_/mdun na gnas pa bzhin du ni/_/yang dag min pa [#]mthong bar 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog dang rjes 'brel ni/_/don gsal snang ba can ma yin/_!_/_
[\[129a.6\]]rmi lam na yang dran pa de/_/de 'dra'i don ldan min par dran/_!_/mi gtsang zad par sa la sogs/_/yang dag min pa'ang bsgoms pa yi/_/stobs kyis [#]sprul pa rtog med dang /_/gsal bar snang ba can du mthong /_!_/de phyir yang dag yang dag min/_/_
[\[129a.7\]]gang gang shin tu bsgoms gyur pa/_/bsgom [#]pa yongs su rdzogs pa na/_/de gsal [#]mi rtog blo 'bras can/_/de la sngar bshad [#]dngos po bzhin/_/bslu [#]ba med can gang yin de/_/bsgoms byung mngon sum tshad mar 'dod/_bsgoms byung mngon sum tshad mar 'dod/_/lhag ma nye bar
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bslad pa yin/_!_/shes gang gang la sgra don 'dzin/_/de ni de la rtog pa yin/_/rang gi ngo bo [#]sgra don min/_/de phyir de la kun mngon sum/_!_/mngon sum ltar snang rnam pa bzhi/_/rtog pa'i shes pa rnam gsum dang /_/rten [#]bslad
[\[129b.2\]]pa las byung ba can/_/rtog pa med pa gcig yin no/_/dbang skyes min par grub don du/_/gnyis bshad 'khrul pa mthong phyir ro/_!_/rjes dpag sogs grub brjod pa ni/_/snga ma gnyis nyid bsgrub [#]phyir ro/_!_/brda rten [#]can dang don gzhan la/_/_
[\[129b.3\]]sgro 'dogs rnam par rtog [#]pa dag_/mngon sum nyer 'jug can nyid phyir/_/'ga' tshe 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin no/_!_/ji ltar lkog tu gyur don can/_/dran pa la sogs rtog pa 'di/_/brda la bltos pa'i ngang tshul can/_/mngon sum don la 'dzin mi
[\[129b.4\]]byed/_/de ltar nyams myong dran med par/_/bum pa la sogs pa dag la/_/shes yod min pas de yang ni/_/mngon sum las ni yongs nyams 'gyur/_!_/'dir ni bzhi pa dmigs bsal te/_/der ni nyer gnod las [#]skyes brjod/_/de la rab rib 'ba' zhig
[\[129b.5\]]ni/_/nyer gnod mtshon par byed pa yin/_!_/de yang yid kyi zhes kha cig_/sngo dang zla gnyis la sogs blo'i[#]/_/dbang po'ang rgyu yin zhes bya ba'i/_/gzhung 'di dang ni de dag 'gal/_!_/gal te brgyud pas rgyu yin na/_/dbang po'i shes pa'i spyod yul
[\[129b.6\]]dag_/dpyad pa 'di la yid kyi ni/_/skabs su ci ltar 'gyur ba yin/_!_/dbang rten gang yin gal te gang /_/dbang po yod med rjes 'jug can/_/de mtshungs gal te 'gyur ldan na/_/de 'di nyid na ci phyir 'gog_!_/'dir [#]yang sbrul sogs 'khrul pa
[\[129b.7\]]bzhin/_/dbang po'i 'gyur ba yod na yang /_/ldog 'gyur dbang po'i bslad pa ni/_/log [#]kyang ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gzhan gyi rgyud la ni/_/brjod pa dag gis 'ga' [#]tshe 'jog_/mthong ba dran la ltos 'gyur zhing /_/yongs su gsal [#]bar snang mi 'gyur/_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]gnyid log pa 'am sad pa na/_/gsal bar snang ba can blo gang /_/de ni rtog med gnyi gar yang /_/de lta min na rtog pa yin/_/de phyir de rtog med na yang /_/tshad ma nyid ni bkag pa ste/_/bslu ba'i phyir ro de don du'ang /_/mngon sum
[\[130a.2\]]ltar snang [#]gnyis su bshad/_!_/bya ba sgrub [#]par byed ces te/_/las kun gyi ni sgrub byed dag_/thams cad ma yin gang las 'bras/_/gang yin de ni de [#]sgrub byed/_/de la nyams myong tsam du ni/_/'dra ba'i bdag can shes pa ni/_/gang gi [#]las ni
[\[130a.3\]]so so la/_/rnam 'byed de bdag 'gyur ba yin/_!_/bdag nyid 'gyur min rgyu dag la/_/tha dad yod kyang tha dad kyi/_/las la tha dad med pa 'di/_/tha dad par ni nges byed min/_!_/de phyir 'di bdag tha dad pa/_/gang las 'di 'di'i rtogs pa zhes/_/_
[\[130a.4\]]byed pa yi ni las nges te/_/de yi sgrub byed can du grub/_!_/rnam 'gas shes pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/tha dad par ni byed na yang /_/'di ni don dang 'brel byed pa/_!_/don gyi ngo bo las gzhan min/_!_/de phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa yi/_/sgrub byed gzhal
[\[130a.5\]]bya'i rang bzhin nyid/_/sgrub byed gzhan yin na de ni/_/de las dang 'brel mi 'grub bo/_!_/de yang de yi bdag nyid yin/_/des na 'bras bu don gzhan min/_!_/de yi bdag nyid 'dzin pa de/_/don rtogs pa yi bdag nyid kyi/_/byed pas rang gi
[\[130a.6\]]las la ni/_/byed dang bcas pa lta bur snang /_/bdag nyid byed po min na yang /_/de yi dbang gis der bzhag phyir/_/dper na 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi/_/bdag nyid 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir/_/bya ba bdag nyid ma yin yang /_/'jig rten rgyu gzugs 'dzin zhes
[\[130a.7\]]brjod/_!_/de phyir mthong dang dbang 'brel dang /_/khyad par gyi ni blo de dag_/bya ba la ni chod pa'i phyir/_/tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod do/_/bya ba la ni byed pa rnams/_/thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang /_/tha ma'i tha dad byed gang de/_/de yi sgrub byed dam par 'dod/_!_/_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin pa'i phyir/_/'di 'dra dbang po la yod min/_/de tha dad kyang tha dad med/_/'di 'di zhes bya de gang las/_/'dis ni lhag ma bshad pa yin/_!_/de dngos med na khyad par gyi/_/blo yang tha dad med 'gyur te/_/blo gzhan dag
[\[130b.2\]]kyang de bzhin no/_!_/bya ba dang ni sgrub byed gnyis/_/yul tha dad pa'ang mi 'dod do/_/don gcig yin na gnyis don med/_/rim bzhin 'byung ba med par 'gyur/_/blo ni cig car 'byung 'gyur na/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur/_/de rnam gzhag la brten [# ]
[\[130b.3\]]nas ni/_/cha dag bsgrub bya sgrub byed gzhag_!_/bdag nyid kun gyis 'brel na yang /_/chos 'ga' zhig ni rtogs 'gyur ba'i/_/nges pa der ni mi 'gyur te/_/'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro/_!_/de tha dad med kyang gang las/_/tha dad de 'di'i tshad ma nyid/_/_
[\[130b.4\]]'dus byas las ni min de'i dngos/_/med na de yang gzhag med phyir/_!_/gal te bya byed gcig yin par/_/'gal lo zhe na mi bden te/_/chos tha dad pa khas len phyir/_/dngos su tha dad med par 'dod/_/bya ba byed pa'i tha snyad dag_/thams cad de ltar rnam par gnas/_/_
[\[130b.5\]]tha dad 'dod pa'i dngos rnams la[#]/_/sgro 'dogs pas ni 'jug phyir ro/_/don rig gang yin so sor rig_/mngon sum gang yin 'di nyid do/_/de ni gang gis don rig yin/_/de 'dra las yin 'khrul par 'gyur/_!_/'on te 'di myong de gang las/_/'di ni de nyid rnam dpyod
[\[130b.6\]]yin/_/rdul phran de dag gang gis na/_/rags par snang ba de 'drar byed/_/de phyir de ni don dngos min/_!_/yin yang 'khrul pa can yin pas/_/de myong ba yi ngo bo nyid/_/sgrub par byed par nus ma yin/_/de 'dra ba dang de las byung /_/gal te myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/_
[\[130b.7\]]don mtshungs can gyi rnam par shes/_/mtshungs pa de ma thag myong 'gyur/_!_/'di mthong 'di thos zhes bya bar/_/gang la blo ni nges pa de/_/des myong yin na gang gis de/_/de yi sgrub byed yin 'dod pa/_/snang dang mthong ba de dag gi_/nye ba de nyid [#]dpyad bya yin/_/de dag
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]'brel pa la brten nas/_/lta ba po yi nges de yin/_!_/de yi myong de bdag nyid de/_/de yang gzhan 'ga' zhig gi min/_/mngon sum so so [#]rig bya yin[#]/_/de yi de ni bdag nyid yin/_!_/des na nyams myong bya gzhan med/_/de la'ang
[\[131a.2\]]myong ba gzhan yod min/_/der yang [#]brtsad pa [#]mtshungs phyir te/_/de ni rang nyid gsal ba yin/_/de yi dngos de sngo sogs phyir/_/rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'ang de/_/rang gi ngo bo myong gyur kyang /_/sngo sogs myong bar snang ba yin/_!_/ji ltar de
[\[131a.3\]]yi bdag nyid phyir/_/gsal byed rab tu gsal ba na/_/rang gi ngo bo gsal byed 'dod/_/de ltar blo bdag rig [#]can yin/_/de yi rig bya don gzhan na/_/tshor bya tshor byed 'thad par dka'/_!_/rig bya rig byed rnam pa med/_/skra sogs shes pa'i
[\[131a.4\]]tha dad bzhin/_/gang tshe gzung 'dzin rnam phye ba'i/_/mtshan nyid rnam par bslad pa can/_/ji ltar 'khrul pas mthong gyur pa[#]/_/de ltar 'di rnam [#]gzhag byas pa/_/de tshe gzung dang 'dzin pa yi/_/mtshan nyid la ni brtsad bya min/_!_/des na gzhan rig med
[\[131a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_/rang gi [#]'bras bu yin par 'dod/_!_/gal te phyi rol myong gyur na/_/nyes pa ci yod ci yang med/_/phyi rol don ni myong gyur pa/_/'di nyid kyis ni ci brjod 'gyur/_/gal te blo ni de rnam can/_/rnam pa rjes zhugs can de yod/_/de ni phyi 'am gzhan las
[\[131a.6\]]zhes[#]/_/'di ni dpyad par rigs pa yin/_!_/mthong ba'i khyad par dang bral ba/_/mi 'dzin de 'dzin na 'dzin phyir/_/sngon por snang ba mthong ba yin/_/phyi rol yan gar don yod min/_!_/'dir 'ga' zhig ni 'ga' zhig gi_/bag chags rab tu sad byed pa/_/de
[\[131a.7\]]phyir blo ni rnam nges kyi/_/phyi rol don ltos ma yin no/_/de phyir gcig la tshul gnyis yod/_/gang phyir de ltar myong ba dang /_/dran pas 'di yi rnam pa gnyis/_/myong ba nyid ni 'bras bu yin/_!_/gang tshe rnam rig rgyu yi yul/_/gzhan 'dod pa'am mi
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'dod pa[#]/_/de yi dngos por ma grub pa/_/de ni de ltar myong ba yin/_!_/gang tshe shes cha don du ni/_/gzhag phyir shes pa yul bcas pa/_/de tshe bdag nyid nyams myong gang /_/de nyid don du rnam par nges/_!_/gal te 'di bdag 'dod rnam [#]dang /_/rnam pa gzhan du myong
[\[131b.2\]]gyur [#]na/_/'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa des kyang /_/don rig par ni 'gyur ba min[#]/_/phyi rol don ni yod na yang /_/ji ltar nyams su myong nyid de/_/shes [#]pa'i bdag nyid rang ngo bos/_/ma yin du ma'i bdag skyon phyir/_/khas blangs na yang gnyis po dag_/tha dad par ni myong
[\[131b.3\]]mi 'gyur/_!_/ma mthong bsgribs phyir min zhe na/_/don gyi dbang gis rtogs mi 'gyur/_/du ma'i bdag nyid dngos de la/_/gcig gi bdag tu mthong byed pa/_/ma mthong ba de ci ltar na/_/don mthong byed par 'gyur ba yin/_!_/gal te 'dod dang mi 'dod par/_/snang ba rtog yin don blo min/_/_
[\[131b.4\]]de la'ang 'chi ltas la sogs par/_/mtshams sbyor med sems mthong ba yin/_!_/de phyir phyi rol gzhal bya la'ang /_/rang nyid nyams myong 'bras yin rigs/_/gang phyir ji ltar 'di [#]rang bzhin/_/de ltar don ni rnam par nges/_!_/de'i [#]tshe don snang 'di nyid ni/_/tshad yin yod du zin kyang ni/_/don gzhan
[\[131b.5\]]min phyir phyi rol la/_/'dzin bdag ltos par bya ba min[#]/_!_/gang phyir ji ltar don bdag de/_/shes la gnas pa de lta bur/_/'di ni de ltar gnas so zhes/_/nges byed bdag nyid rig pa yin/_/de phyir 'di nyid don rig 'dod/_/'di ltar don bdag snang ma yin/_/de yi sgrub byed blo la ni/_/gnas don de yi
[\[131b.6\]]bya ba de/_/gang phyir ji ltar don de ni/_/gnas pa de ltar de rab gsal/_!_/don 'jog de yi bdag nyid phyir/_/rang rig yin yang don rig 'dod/_/de phyir yul tha dad pa'ang min/_/rang gi ngo bo dpyod pa na/_/rang rig 'bras bu yin par bshad/_/don rig de bdag nyid phyir ro/_!_/de dang
[\[131b.7\]]'dra ba'am [#]gzhan 'dra'ang rung /_/shes pa de [#]ltar snang ba yin[#]/_/rgyu ni don yang yin pas na/_/don ni gzhal bya nyid du 'dod/_!_/ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar/_/don dngos med par snang can de/_/ji ltar don 'dzin zhe na bden/_/de 'dra ngas kyang mi shes so/_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]blo bdag rnam par dbyer med kyang /_/mthong ba phyin ci log rnams kyis/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa myong ba dag_/tha dad ldan bzhin rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_!_/dper na dbang po sngags sogs kyis/_/bslad pa rnams la 'jim dum sogs/_/_
[\[132a.2\]]de yi gzugs dang bral ba [#]yang /_/rnam pa gzhan du snang bzhin na[#]/_/de dag ma bslad mig can gyis/_/de ltar mthong ba med phyir ro/_/dper na thag ring mya ngam na/_/chung ngu chen por snang ba bzhin/_/gzung ba 'dzin pa rig pa dag_/yod pa min
[\[132a.3\]]yang gzhal bya dang /_/'jal byed 'bras bur gnas pa 'di/_/ji ltar rjes su snang bzhin byas/_!_/de lta min na sna tshogs kyi/_/ngo bor snang can dngos gcig la/_/rnam pa ji ltar bden 'gyur te/_/gcig pa nyid de nyams phyir ro/_/gzhan la gzhan nyid
[\[132a.4\]]nyams phyir ro/_!_/rang bzhin mthong med phyir gcig min/_/blo dngos tha dad med mthong phyir/_/tha dad med par nges par 'gyur/_/gang gis dngos po rnam dpyad na/_/de nyid du na de dngos med/_/gang gi phyir na de dag la/_/gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin med/_/_
[\[132a.5\]]chos mthun pa nyid mthong ba las/_/de bdag min la de bdag tu/_/zhen pas 'jig rten pa dag gi_/'khrul skye 'di la de med de/_/'gro ba 'di la de bdag nyid/_/gcig kyang mthong ba med phyir ro/_/nang gi bslad pa las byung gang /_/de ni nyes pa las byung bas/_/rang
[\[132a.6\]]bzhin gyis ni phyin log tu/_/snang ba can 'di'ang yod pa yin/_/chos mthun mthong sogs can nyid la/_/ltos med rab rib la sogs bzhin/_/de la blo ni yongs gcod pa/_/'dzin pa'i rnam par 'dod pa de/_/de yi bdag nyid phyir bdag rig_/de phyir de yi sgrub byed yin/_!_/_
[\[132a.7\]]dper na 'dod chags sogs myong bzhin/_/rang bdag yul du bzhag pa na/_/gzhal bya 'jal byed 'bras gnas pa/_/'di ni kun la sbyar bar bya/_/de la'ang nyams myong bdag nyid phyir/_/de dag rang bdag myong bar rung [#]/_/de ltar rung nyid de chad bdag_/gzhal bya
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rang rig 'bras bu yin/_/bdag la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes/_/yongs su gcod pa'i bdag nyid de/_/rung nyid ces bya tshad ma dang /_/rang rig ces ni rab tu bshad/_/yul rnams las ni byung ba yi/_/rnam par shes pa thams cad dag_/de las gzhan rgyu yin
[\[132b.2\]]na yang /_/rnam 'gas yul gyi rnam par 'gyur/_/dper na zas dang dus la sogs/_/bu skye ba yi rgyu yin yang /_/de ni pha ma gcig gi gzugs/_/'dzin 'gyur gzhan 'ga'i [#]ma yin bzhin/_/de las gzhan dang yul dag ni/_/de rgyu nyid du mtshungs na
[\[132b.3\]]yang /_/de chas yul nyid yin 'dod de/_/de med par ni der mi 'gyur/_!_/don dang ldan pa'i sems la ni/_/don rnams med par dogs na yang /_/'das pa'i don ni 'dzin pa la/_/tshul gnyis rang rig grub pa yin/_!_/sngo sogs tha dad can snang phyir/_/_
[\[132b.4\]]de ldan min rigs don ma yin/_/rigs de'ang mi rtag mi 'gyur zhing /_/rtag na'ang ji ltar skyed byed yin/_!_/ming sogs sngar ni bkag zin to/_/tshul 'di don ldan ma yin te/_/'dod pa tsam dang rjes 'brel phyir/_/don gyi nus pa grub ma yin/_/rnam pa
[\[132b.5\]]'di 'dra'i shes pa ni/_/dran yin de yang myong [#]las byung /_/de yang don rnam stong na de/_/de ni ci ltar de ldan 'gyur/_!_/de tshe med phyir don las min/_/de ltar myong la'ang der 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa de ni don gyi min/_/gsal ba'i rnam pas dben phyir ro/_/_
[\[132b.6\]]rnam pa de ni tha dad na/_/gzhan gyis de bzhin rtogs [#]pa 'gyur/_!_/bdag la rtag tu 'brel yin na/_/brjod kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_!_/re re dag dang 'brel na ni/_/mtshams sbyor bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/don gcig mngon zhen bdag nyid can/_/_
[\[132b.7\]]'chad po [#]nyan po'i sems dag gi_/gal te 'dra las de gcig par/_/tha snyad yod na der snang min/_/tha dad bdag nyid ji ltar gzung /_/de tshe blo don med can 'gyur/_/nyams myong rnam shes de yang ni/_/cha gnyis la ni brten gyur pa/_/rnam pa gcig
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gis khyad par can/_/de shes pa yis dmigs par 'gyur/_!_/gzhan du de rnam can min na/_/ci ltar shes la gnas par 'gyur/_!_/'di ltar phyi ma phyi ma yi/_/shes pa rnam gcig lhag pa nyid/_/don gyi ngo bos rnam gnyis dang /_/_
[\[133a.2\]]bdag gi rnam pa 'ga' [#]zhig tu/_/gnyis pa de ni gsum pa yi/_/shes pa yis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_!_/don 'bras nyid kyis shes dran na/_/don dran phyir na 'khrul pa yis/_/gal te sre na snang ba dang /_/yid byed la yang der 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 'bras bu
[\[133a.3\]]thams cad kyang /_/rgyu dang lhan cig 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de phyir rdza mkhan la sogs pa/_/med par bum pa dran mi 'gyur/_!_/khyad par gang las shes pa ni/_/don dang 'dre ba bsten [#]pa de/_/'dra ba las gzhan cir 'gyur te/_/mtshe ma sogs la [#]mthong phyir ro/_!_/_
[\[133a.4\]]dang po'i rang bzhin gnyis min na/_/gnyis pa'i [#]rang bzhin gcig la ni/_/rnam gnas nges par 'dzin pa yi/_/sems kyis 'byed par 'gyur ma yin/_!_/de phyir sngo sogs ngo bo ru/_/mdun na gnas par 'gyur ba'i blo/_/don sre [#]ba dang 'brel pa can/_blo
[\[133a.5\]]gnyis pas ni dmigs par 'gyur/_!_/gzhan du dang po gcig po nyid/_/don las byung phyir 'brel 'gyur gyi/_/snga ma'i don dang 'brel mthong med/_/shes pa phyi ma phyi ma min/_!_/nges par blo dang lhan cig tu/_/cig car du ni myong 'gyur ba'i[#]/_/yul ni
[\[133a.6\]]de las gzhan nyid du/_/rnam gang gis na 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnam shes 'khrul pas zla ba gnyis/_/med par tha dad mthong ba bzhin/_/sngo ser tha dad dag la ni/_/myong ba'i nges pa yod ma yin/_!_/myong ba med par don 'ga' 'am/_/don med pa yi [# ]
[\[133a.7\]]myong ba yang /_/myong bar 'gyur ba ma mthong ba/_/des na de dag tha dad min/_!_/de phyir shes dus [#]snang ba yi/_/don ni shes las gzhan min pa/_/bzlog par [#]rab tu dka' ba nyid/_!_/rgyu gzhan dag ni yod na yang /_/dbang po'i blo rnams med pa'i phyir/_/tha dad rgyu
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]ni rjes dpog 'gyur/_/gal te mtshungs pa de ma thag_/rkyen las nges par mi smra na'o/_/sa bon las ni myug skye dang /_/du ba las me grub pa zhes/_/de 'dra phyi rol don rten [#]can/_/byed po shes byed gnas pa gang /_!_/de yang gal te de'i ngo bor/_/snang ba de ltar
[\[133b.2\]]nges 'brel ba'i/_/blo la brten nas rtog byed na/_/'gal ba dag ni ci zhig yod/_!_/du ba mes bskyed 'gyur ba min/_/de phyir 'bras las rgyu rtogs min/_/de rgyu dag ni yin na yang /_/gang las nges par rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_!_/de la'ang du bar snang ba'i blos/_/_
[\[133b.3\]]bag chags gsal bar sad pa can/_/mer snang ba yi blo nyid ni/_/rtogs 'gyur me nyid ma yin no/_!_/sems rgyud der rung bag chags kyi/_/snying po can nyid du bar ni/_/snang ba'i blo dag gsal [#]byed pa/_/des na me las du ba yin/_/mkhas pa rnams la
[\[133b.4\]]brjod 'di yod/_/phyi rol la ni brten nas su/_/tshul gnyis brjod yin de yang ni/_/lhan cig myong ba'i nges pas 'grub[#]/_!_/dbang po'i khyad par gyis gsal dang /_/mi gsal 'dren ma la sogs pa/_/snang ba tha dad 'dzin pa yi/_/shes pa don
[\[133b.5\]]gcig la dmigs so/_!_/de don la der snang min na/_/don gyi rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir/_/de yi don can yid kun ni/_/rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du 'gyur/_!_/don [#]la brten nas 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/de yi ngo bo'i rjes byed pa/_/de ni gzhan 'ga' zhig
[\[133b.6\]]las kyang /_/cha 'ga' yis ni tha dad 'gyur/_/'di ltar pha la brten nas bu[#]/_/pha de yi ni gzugs yin [#]yang /_/'ga' zhig las ni cha 'ga' yis/_/tha dad par ni dmigs pa yin/_!_/mar me la sogs dkyil 'khor ni/_/rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa
[\[133b.7\]]can/_/sngo dang dmar dang mdangs gsal bar/_/mig mi gsal bas mthong bar 'gyur/_!_/de de phyi rol dngos yin na/_/dbang po gsal la ci nus med/_!_/yang dag mthong na de [#]mthong ba/_/dbang po nyams pa'ang ji ltar yin/_/rab rib kyis sbyangs gsal ba'i mig/_
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]dbang po las 'das [#]mthong de la[#]/_/gzhan gyi mthong ba'i don de yang /_/ji lta bur na gsal ma yin/_!_/snang dbang yid la byed pa las/_/gzhan ni gcig gi nus rtogs pa/_/des na gzhan ni rgyu ma yin/_/rgyu min yul yang ji ltar yin/_!_/gal te
[\[134a.2\]]de nyid blo rgyu yin/_/ji ltar mar me la ltos 'gyur/_!_/mar me tsam gyis yod pa'i phyir/_/gnyis ka dag kyang rgyu ma yin/_/nye ring la sogs khyad par gyis[#]/_/gsal dang mi gsal mi rung ngo /_!_/gal te snang khyad las der 'gyur/_/de ni chod dang ma chod dag[# ]/mthong ngam mi
[\[134a.3\]]mthong mtshungs par 'gyur/_!_/gal te snang ba mi gsal bas/_/de cha phra mo 'ga' zhig ni/_/ma mthong de phyir tha dad na/_/phyi rol don gcig mthong ba dang /_/mi mthong tha dad gang las yin/_/phra rdul du ma tha dad mthong /_/mi mthong tha dad gang las yin/_!_/gal te snang
[\[134a.4\]]ba gsal mi gsal[#]/_/khyad par gyis blo tha dad na/_/gzhan tha dad pas tha dad med/_/gang las tha dad par snang 'gyur/_/snang ba de yang cis mi gsal/_/sgrib [#]phyir de 'dir cis ma yin/_/srab phyir snang ba'ang de lta nyid/_/gzhan du [#]srab min yod pa nyid/_/shin tu nye
[\[134a.5\]]la snang ba ni/_/cher gsal de [#]yang snang bar 'gyur/_!_/gal te der yang mthong med la/_/brten nas gzugs gzhan 'byung 'gyur na/_/de dag rnams ni phan tshun du/_/bsgrib [#]'gyur de phyir snang ba ni/_/sgrib byed de la gcig snang 'gyur/_/de ma bsgribs na cig car ni/_/gsal
[\[134a.6\]]dang mi gsal rang bzhin dag_/mthong 'gyur mthong med kyis gcig bsgribs/_/gang gis don dang don min med/_/de la ma mthong bas ci byed/_/de phyir don brten skyes gyur pa'i/_/myong ba ji lta'i rgyu bzhin du/_/rnam pa tha dad 'dzin byed de/_/lhag ma blo ngan lugs ngan yin/_!_/_
[\[134a.7\]]shes pa sgra dang mar me rnams/_/mngon sum dang ni cig shos kyi/_/skyed byed nyid kyis [#]snga ma yi/_/skad cig rnams ni zhig pa'i phyir/_/gang gis shes la med gsal 'gyur/_/phan 'dogs byed pa ma yin gzhan/_/gsal na don kun gsal bar 'gyur/_/gal te
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]de rgyu las nges na/_/shes la rtog pa 'di yang med/_/nges byas shes la [#]de med kyang /_/don du snang ba nyid kyi phyir/_/de gsal ba zhes brjod pa yin/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i don gzhan ni/_/phan 'dogs min phyir [#]rnam mi byed/_/shes la rang gi rnam pa yis[#]/_/rnam 'byed [# ]
[\[134b.2\]]min gsal ji ltar 'gyur/_!_/brtan gang rdo rje rdo sogs kyi/_/don yang gzhan la ltos med phyir/_/'gro ba kun gyi shes pa ni/_/cig car rang nyid skyed [#]par 'gyur/_!_/lhan cig byed pas phan 'dogs phyir/_/'di yi de dag rim 'byung [#]na/_/skad cig so sor gzhan yin brjod/_/_
[\[134b.3\]]'dir yang skyon ni sngar bzhin no/_/de bdag nyid kyis myong ba la/_/brtsad pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_!_/de don rang bzhin nyid ma grub/_/de yang yang dag dran las [#]grub/_/rang spyod yul gyis phye [#]med cing /_/tha dad par myong med de la/_/'di ni 'di lta 'am [#]'di ltar ni/_/min zhes
[\[134b.4\]]tha dad 'di med 'gyur/_/nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni/_/tha dad 'ga' zhig rnam 'byed min/_/tha dad gsal ba med pa la/_/rnam 'byed blo med tshe sogs bzhin/_!_/tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas kyang /_/rang rig phal cher grub pa yin/_/rang gi ngo bor gyur snang ba/_/de tsho
[\[134b.5\]]myong bar grub phyir ro/_!_/de dngos can gyi blo yis ni/_/shes 'gags ji ltar myong ba yin/_!_/des rang ngo bo'ang myong med phyir/_/nyams myong ma lus ldog par 'gyur/_/don du snang ba dang ldan shes/_/de ni phyi rol mngon phyogs snang /_/blo la 'dzin par byed pa'i blo/_/_
[\[134b.6\]]rtag tu bdag la nang mngon phyogs/_/yul gang gi ni snang ba gang /_/des de myong min zhes pa'ang 'thob/_/gal te de dang 'dra ba las/_/myong gzhan ci yod ces 'dod na/_/'dra ba thams cad phan tshun du/_/myong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur/_!_/gal te blo 'dra de myong na/_/da [#]ni 'dra las
[\[134b.7\]]myong ma yin/_/de yi myong de [#]rang nyid de/_/de ni 'dra ba'i rgyu can min/_!_/bya ba las kyi rnam gzhag gi_/'di ni 'jig rten na rgyur 'gyur/_/rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin de'i[#]/_/myong ba sgro 'dogs 'khrul pa las/_/sngo sogs myong bar grags yin gyi/_/gzhan gyi bdag nyid
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]myong las min[#]/_!_/blo ni sngo sogs dngos yin na/_/[#]phyi rol don la tshad ma gang /_/blo ni sngo sogs dngos min na/_/de ni ji ltar don myong yin/_!_/gang tshe myong ba'i bdag nyid ni/_/'dra ba'i rgyu can ma yin na/_/'di de rang nyid grub pas na/_/_
[\[135a.2\]]don gyis ci zhig nye bar sgrub/_/bdag nyid kun gyis 'dra na ni/_/shes pa shes pa nyid min [#]'gyur/_/cha 'ga' zhig gis mtshungs na ni/_/thams cad thams cad kyis myong 'gyur/_/ji ltar sngo sogs ngo bo'i phyir/_/sngo sogs nyams su myong bar 'dod/_/de bzhin
[\[135a.3\]]nyams myong ngo bo'i phyir/_/de yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/nyams myong nyams su myong ngo zhes/_/don bzhin du ni nges min pa/_/de phyir nyes pa med ce na/_/don la'ang de ni rtag tu med/_/yong ba nyid kyi rgyu yod na/_/myong la med pa'ang ci yi phyir/_!_/gzhan yang
[\[135a.4\]]dkar sogs mthong ba na/_/dkar sogs mngon par gsal ba yi/_/rang bzhin rig pa gsal [#]ba ni/_/skyes pa'i snang ba 'di gang yin/_/de ci dkar sogs mngon gsal [#]las/_/gzhan dngos 'on te bdag gyur yin/_!_/gzhan dngos yin na gsal ba ni/_/gsal min ci
[\[135a.5\]]ltar dkar gsal 'gyur/_!_/shes pa gsal yin de gsal min/_/'gro ba ma lus gsal ma yin/_/gsal ba gsal gzhan gyis gsal na'ang [#]/_/thug pa med par thal 'gyur phyir/_/mthong dang 'brel pa shes med pa/_/ci ltar de yis khyad par 'gyur/_!_/gang
[\[135a.6\]]phyir gnyis las gcig rtogs tshe/_/gnyis pa mthong ba yod ma yin/_/gnyis dag 'brel par mthong ba na/_/mthong zhes bya bar nges par 'gyur/_/gang gis mthong ba 'dra ba [#]ni/_/sems gzhan gyis ni mthong gyur pa/_/de la mthong zhes brjod ce na/_/'di 'dra bas na
[\[135a.7\]]rang rig grub/_/ci ste rang dngos mi rig na/_/ci ltar gzhan gyi ngo bo rig_/'dra ba las ni myong zhes pa'ang /_/sngar nyid rnam par gsal ba yin/_/mthong ba dag ni 'drar 'dzin na/_/don ni sngar mthong yod min pas/_/ci ltar de ni mthong ba dang /_/'dra ba yin par [# ]
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]des nges 'gyur/_/'dra ba nyid kyang mi 'dod pa/_/gang yin de la gnyis mthong med/_/de tshe don dang shes pa zhes/_/de dag smos su ga la yod/_!_/ci ste rab [#]dngos 'o na de/_/rang nyid rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/_!_/gang phyir de mi gsal na ni/_/don mi gsal ba nyid
[\[135b.2\]]du 'gyur/_/bdag rig min pa'i phyogs dag la/_/don kun mthong med 'di yis ni/_/blo ni mngon sum min [#]smra ba/_/gang yin de la'ang lan btab bo/_!_/rten dmigs goms pa'i khyad par las/_/tha dad par [#]ni 'jug pa can/_/bde sdug 'dod pa la sogs pa'i/_/khyad
[\[135b.3\]]par mngon sum de dag ni/_/blo nyid de las tha dad gzhan/_/de shes gang yin cung zad kyang /_/rtogs med gzhan gyis rig [#]yin na/_/gzhan gyis kyang ni de spyod 'gyur/_/gal te des bskyed pa dang der/_/snang ba'i blo rig [#]gzhan min na/_/dmigs par byed pa gzhan la
[\[135b.4\]]yang /_/gnyis 'di gdon mi za bar yod/_/ci ste de las skyes min zhing /_/der snang can yang ma yin na/_/blo de yul med can du 'gyur/_/de ma bzung na spyi dag kyang /_/mi 'dzin de ni cung zad kyang /_/dngos min zhes kyang sngar bshad do/_!_/de phyir don snang ba de ni/_/_
[\[135b.5\]]blo de las gzhan min des na/_/mngon sum dang ni bdag rig grub/_!_/gal te de la 'dzin byed kyang /_/mngon sum nyid ni min zhe na/_/don mtshungs tha dad de gang las/_!_/ma mthong don gcig ldan sogs kyis/_/gal te myong ba [#]des yin na/_/gzhan ni rnam
[\[135b.6\]]kun 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/myong ba'i dbye ba'ang gsal [#]zin to/_!_/gang dag rnal 'byor mngon sum gyis[#]/_/gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa/[# ]/myong la nyams myong mtshungs pas na/_/de yang de bzhin gdung bar 'gyur/_!_/gal te yul dbang 'dus med pas/_/de las
[\[135b.7\]]byung ba'i sdug bsngal ni/_/de dag la ni skye [#]min na/_/sdug bsngal skyes par gyur [#]nyid ni/_/sdug bsngal myong min 'on kyang ni/_/sdug bsngal shes pa skyes pa yin/_!_/sdug bsngal la sogs myong min par/_/gdung dang phan 'dogs rgyu ma yin/_/gang tshe rang nyid
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]sdug bsngal gyi/_/rang gi ngo bor snang ba ni/_/gdung yin de dmigs shes min [#]pa/_/de tshe de ltar thal mi 'gyur/_!_/des na shes pa thams cad kyi/_/dmigs myong dag ni tha dad yin/_/don dang 'dra ba dmigs pa
[\[136a.2\]]ste/_/rang nyid gsal ba bdag myong yin/_!_/gzhan yang mngon sum med pas na/_/blo ni rtags las rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_!_/de yang dbang po don nam [#]blo/_/yang na yid byed snga mar 'gyur/_/rgyu 'bras tshogs pa 'di dag las/_/'brel
[\[136a.3\]]pa can gzhan yod min te/_/nus pa mthong ba med phyir ro/_!_/de la 'khrul phyir dbang po min/_/don yang de bzhin blo yid byed/_/shes yin de yang ma grub nyid/_/ma grub pa ni rtags nyid min/_!_/gal te don gsal rtags yin par/_/_
[\[136a.4\]]'dod na de nyid shes min nam/_/'dis ni gsal gyur [#]don gsal te/_/gsal ba [#]nyams su myong min na/_/de yis gsal 'gyur [#]mi nges phyir/_/'on te gsal te [#]don nyid kyi[#]/_/khyad par 'ga' zhig yin 'dod na/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig med pa'i/_/_
[\[136a.5\]]don la khyad par 'ga' yang med/_/de 'dod na yang shes so sor/_/skad cig 'jig par thal bar 'gyur/_!_/de'ang shes pa'am shes ma gyur/_/gal te shes pa rtags yin na/_/shes par yongs su bcad med par/_/des [#]shes zhes
[\[136a.6\]]bya de gang las/_!_/shes gyur [#]nyid du bcad med kyang /_/de ni ci ltar go byed yin/_!_/mthong ba mthong gyur [#]min gzhan gyis[#]/_/mthong gyur [#]'gar yang mthong 'gyur med/_/khyad par de gzhan mthong ba la'ang /_/yod phyir rang blo rtogs par 'gyur/_/_
[\[136a.7\]]de phyir rang chos ltos med can/_/don chos yan gar ba las ni/_/blo ni rjes su dpog ma yin/_!_/blo rtags [#]mngon sum gang yin pa/_/rang chos rang blo las gzhan ci/_/rgyu mtshungs pa las skyes pa de/_/blo las tha dad gang las yin/_/gzhan
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]skyes de yang 'khrul pa can/_!_/gzugs sogs yul ni lnga po [#]dang /_/dbang po dang ni dmigs pa dag_/ma gtogs de yi 'bras bu gzhan/_/nye bar mtshon pa ma yin no/_!_/de la gnyis ni dbang po 'das/_/don lnga dag la [#]gzugs mthong
[\[136b.2\]]las/_/skyes pa gzhan du srid bral ba/_/gang yin gcig kyang rtogs pa med/_/de ltar shes med gang yin te[#]/_/rtags zhes bya ba bab chol [#]yin/_/rtags yod na yang de dang ni/_/lhan cig 'brel pa mthong med par/_/ci ltar rtogs 'gyur
[\[136b.3\]]rtags dag ni/_/ma mthong ba yi gsal byed min/_!_/rtags de nyid las [#]sngar de ni/_/grub pa nyid du brjod na ni/_/de la yang ni dpe gzhan zhig_/bsgrub bya yin phyir thug med 'gyur/_!_/de phyir blo las don grub kyi/_/don las ji ltar yang de min/_/_
[\[136b.4\]]de ma grub par don rang nyid/_/rab tu grub pa med phyir ro/_!_/mngon sum blo dang de las ni/_/brjod dang g.yo 'gul sogs mthong nas/_/gzhan sems rjes dpag mi 'gyur te/_/bdag la 'brel pa mthong med phyir/_!_/yid kyi blo la don gyi rtags/_/_
[\[136b.5\]]rab tu grub pa yod min phyir/_!_/khyod kyi blo ni blo gzhan gyis/_/ci ltar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/gsal min bdag tu mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/gsal bya gsal byed gang las yin/_!_/yul ni ci ltar gsal ba [#]yin/_/gsal la ngo bo 'pho phyir ro/_/_
[\[136b.6\]]gsal de'ang de yi ngo bo nyid/_/rang nyid rab tu gsal ba yin/_!_/de ltar blo la blo 'dod na/_/blo ni rang nyid rig par grub/_/de lta min na yul yang ni/_/blo dang lhan cig chos mtshungs nyid/_!_/de'i [#]phyir nged kyi blo rang nyid/_/gsal ba'i ngo bos rab
[\[136b.7\]]gsal zhing /_/gzhan der ngo bo 'pho ba yis/_/gsal ba na ni rab gsal nyid/_!_/'dra ba yin yang de yis ni/_/blo gzhan rab tu gsal mi 'dod/_/rang nyid rab tu gsal phyir don/_/de yi ngo bos rab gsal yin/_!_/dper sgron gnyis bzhin mar
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]me dang /_/bum pa dag kyang der brten nas/_/gsal bya gsal byed ngo bo yis/_/tha snyad rab tu rgyas par byed/_!_/yul dang dbang po tsam gyis ni/_/mthong zhes bya bar nges ma yin/_/des na gang las 'dir 'gyur ba/_/gzhan de'ang
[\[137a.2\]]mthong bar gdon mi za/_!_/dran pa las kyang bdag rig grub[#]/_/shes pa gzhan gyis rig na ni/_!_/ring sogs 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/_/yun ring gnas pa med phyir ro/_/gnas na go rims med pas na/_/blo la cig car snang ba'i phyir/_/yi ge rim med ring mi
[\[137a.3\]]'gyur/_/phan tshun 'dre ba med pa yi/_/yig cha rim ldan ci ltar na/_/rim med pa ni skyed par byed/_!_/snga ma mtha' yi bar gnas na/_/'og tu sgra ni [#]'phel bar 'gyur/_/rim min 'dzin phyir tha mar ni/_/rim ldan blo yang med par 'gyur/_/de 'og
[\[137a.4\]]yul ni gnas med phyir/_/blo ni rang nyid gnas ma yin/_/rang nyid gnas na phyis kyang de/_/mi 'jig khyad par med phyir ro/_/yi ge rim med cig car ni/_/skyes pa la yang skyon 'di yod/_/lan cig brtsal skyes phyir rtsol ba/_/phyi ma phyi ma don med
[\[137a.5\]]'gyur/_/yi ge rnams ni gsal ba la'ang /_/skyon 'di rjes su gnas pa nyid/_/du ma yis ni de 'dzin na/_/tha ma'i blo gang de myong la/_/de yang ring por 'dzin min pa/_/des na ring blo dran mi 'gyur/_/blo rnams so so [#]tha dad du/_/myong na de sgra thos pa ni/_/_
[\[137a.6\]]chod pa med par snang mi 'gyur/_!_/sbyor bar byed pa'ang gsal ba yin/_/gal te chod pa mthong yang 'di/_/rnam chad med par 'khrul 'gyur na/_/thung ngu gnyis ni brjod na yang /_/rnam chad med par 'khrul par 'gyur/_!_/dbang pos rnam bcad [#]mthong na yang /_/_
[\[137a.7\]]dbang po las chad med sgro 'dogs/_/mi rung dbang po'i blo rnams kun/_/phyin ci log tu thal phyir ro/_!_/yi ge'i bdag nyid kun mtha' yang /_/mig 'dzums tshad du gnas pa yin/_/de yang rim gyis rdul phran ni/_/du ma dag dang 'brel pas rdzogs/_!_/rdul
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gcig bsgres dus chud pa yi/_/mthar thug dus kyang skad cig 'dod/_!_/blo yang skad cig de yi phyir/_/yi ge rim gyis rtogs par 'gyur/_/de phyir yi ge gzugs sogs la/_/blo gzhan gyis ni chod na yang /_/chod pa med par snang ba can/_/thams cad log
[\[137b.2\]]pa'i don can 'gyur/_/dbang po'i 'khrul pa las gzhan du/_/dngos po rnams ni sbyor byed pa/_/tha dad mtshon med 'khrul pa can/_/dran yin de ni rnam rtog can/_/brjod dang rjes 'brel [#]de la ni/_/gsal bar snang nyid ga la zhig_/dbang pos bzung la
[\[137b.3\]]sgra sbyor ba/_/yod pa min zhes bshad [#]zin to/_!_/dbang pos chod pa mthong na [#]yang /_/gal te rtog pas sbyor byed na/_/don dang de yi myong ba ni/_/rgyun mi 'chad par snang ba dag_/rigs dam gnod pa can med na/_/chod pa zhes bya de gang las/_/_
[\[137b.4\]]gal te blo nus nges pa'i phyir/_/zhe [#]na de ni gang las 'dod/_/cig car blo mthong med phyir na/_/de nyid 'di ltar dpyad bya yin/_/de rnams rigs mthun pa nyid la/_/nus pa nges par gyur pa yin/_/'di ltar rnam par rtog pa rnams/_/rim
[\[137b.5\]]gyis 'byung bar yang dag rtogs/_!_/'dis ni gang zhig mthong don la/_/ngo shes byed pa rtog [#]pa dag_/gsal [#]bar snang bas mngon sum du/_/rtog pa de yang bsal ba yin/_/skra dang sgong dang [#]mar me sogs/_/tha dad rtogs pa dag la yang /_/gsal
[\[137b.6\]]snang yod phyir de 'dra'i blo/_/ci ltar mngon sum yin par 'gyur/_/de phyir ngo shes pa las ni/_/yig sogs gcig tu nges pa med/_!_/sngon myong dran las [#]de yi chos/_/sgro 'dogs med par de nyid ni/_/'di zhes bya bar shes pa med/_/de yang ji ltar
[\[137b.7\]]dbang skyes yin/_/don dang shes pa [#]myong ba dag_/cig car 'byung bar 'dod min zhing /_/don dang shes pa'i snang ba dag_/so sor rtogs pa'ang yod ma yin/_/don du snang ba'i rnam shes dang /_/phyi rol gyi ni don 'ba' zhig_/blo rnams gcig gis gzung
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]min te/_/tha dad med par thal phyir ro/_/legs par rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/_/myong ba legs par rtogs med pa'i/_/don dang don shes gang de dag_/phyi nas ji ltar so sor [#]dran/_/don dang don gyi yid dag gi_/_
[\[138a.2\]]myong ba rim [#]bzhin skye ba la'ang /_/snang ba sna tshogs pa nyid kyi/_/brtsad [#]pa'i skyon 'di gdon par [#]dka'/_/'di ltar sngon po la sogs pa'i/_/rnam gcig nyid dam myong ba gcig_/rtogs kyi sngon por snang ba ni/_/myong la [#]myong ba gzhan ma yin/_!_/_
[\[138a.3\]]shes pa gzhan gyis [#]rjes myong bar/_/'gyur ba de la'ang dran pa mthong /_/de ni gang gis myong ba yin/_/gal te de yang gzhan gyis na/_!_/shes rig 'phreng ba rjes 'brel can/_/'di skyed [#]de ni gang zhig yin/_/gal te snga blo de nyid na/_/yul
[\[138a.4\]]gzhan la ni 'pho mi 'gyur/_!_/gzung ba'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa/_/nye bar skyed byed blo de dag_/mi 'dzin par ni shes phyi ma/_/ci ltar gzhan ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_!_/bdag la shes bskyed rang bzhin du[#]/_/nges pa'i nang gi yan lag ni/_/de dag la [# ]
[\[138a.5\]]gzhan phyi yi ni/_/yan lag gang gis gegs byed 'gyur/_!_/phyi rol don ni nye bas kyang /_/de la gegs byed nus ma yin/_/gzhan du yul ni nye ba na/_/'gas kyang blo myong mi 'gyur ro/_!_/don de min pa'i gnas skabs [#]'ga'/_yod min des na
[\[138a.6\]]rtsa ba ni/_/med na blo yi dran pa yang /_/med phyir 'dod pa a re mdzes/_!_/'das sogs rnam rtog gang dag la/_/don nye ba [#]ni yod min la/_/'pho ba'i rgyu ni med pa'i phyir/_/don la spyod [#]pa mi srid 'gyur/_/gal te bdag la shes bskyed pa'i/_/_
[\[138a.7\]]nus pa rim gyis zad pa na/_/yul gzhan la ni 'pho 'gyur na/_!_/don blo de ni [#]gang las yin/_/sngar gyi blo ni nus zad na/_/don la 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/_/blo sngon [#]med par blo ma yin/_/don gzhan chags zhes [#]nus nyams na/_/shes pa skye ba
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]ma gtogs phyir/_/cig car rigs mi mthun skye yang /_/shin tu gsal ba'i sems gcig gis/_/nus pa nyams par byas pa'i phyir/_/kun gzhi las gzhan 'byung ba min/_/de lta min na yid 'jug ni/_/mtshungs la [#]yid gzhan
[\[138b.2\]]ltos mi 'gyur/_/ye [#]shes rim bzhin skye bas kyang /_/ltos pa rab tu [#]grub pa yin/_!_/yid gcig yin phyir gzhan la ni/_/chags pa gzhan la mi 'gro'i [#]phyir/_/shes gzhan mi skye zhe na min/_/la lar cig car 'byung phyir ro/_/'jug
[\[138b.3\]]pa mtshungs la [#]mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/thams cad tshe gzhan rtogs mi 'gyur/_/bdag yid ldan pa tsam las ni/_/skye na'ang cig car skye bar 'gyur/_/gcig las bya ba gcig yin na'ang /_/ci ltar mar me du mas mthong /_!_/rim gyis kyang nus med 'gyur
[\[138b.4\]]te/_/phyis kyang bye brag med phyir ro/_/'dis [#]lus skyes bu bshad pa yin/_!_/gal te 'du byed las des na/_/de phyis gang las blo nyid las/_/zhe na yin mod 'dod pa [#]nyid/_!_/gzung la [#]gzung nyid skyed byed la[#]/_/gzhan min skyed byed nyin mtshan
[\[138b.5\]]nyid/_/snang ba gzung ba ma yin med/_/cha med pa la [#]phra sogs med/_!_/gzung ba'i nus pa nyams 'gyur gyi/_/skyed byed bdag nyid gzhan min na/_/gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can la ni/_/gzung las skyed [#]byed gzhan med de/_/gzugs sogs de lta min par
[\[138b.6\]]ni/_/blo la dngos su phan 'dogs med/_!_/gzung ba'i [#]mtshan nyid las 'di yi/_/de dngos nges pa gzhan ci yod/_/blo la'ang de yod de yi phyir/_/de yang de nyid du rnam gnas/_/'dzin pa yi ni nyer len dang /_/myong ba sems kyi gzung mtshan nyid/_!_/gzugs
[\[138b.7\]]sogs dang ni sems de ltar/_/gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dpyod pa 'di/_/ma dag blo can la yin gyi/_/rnal 'byor rtogs pa bsam mi khyab/_/de la phra sogs ngo bo yis/_/gzung ba gzung [#]min nyid 'gyur na/_/gzugs sogs blo la sngar med gang /_/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]phyis skyes pa ni ci zhig yod/_!_/de phyir rang blo 'dzin 'gyur [#]na/_/de ma thag pa'i rgyu yi sems/_/gang yin de nyid 'dzin 'gyur ba[#]/_/des na don gzhan rtogs mi 'gyur/_!_/nus pa du ma gcig med kyang /_/dngos rnams
[\[139a.2\]]ngo bo nyid kyi 'bras/_/gcig dang [#]du ma byed ces brjod/_!_/gal te gcig las du ma min/_/ma yin 'ga' zhig gcig las gcig_/'bras bu tshogs pa dag las byung [#]/_/gcig kyang tshogs pa gnyis 'gyur phyir/_/de ni du ma byed ces
[\[139a.3\]]brjod/_!_/gal te blo gzhan don dang ni/_/rnam shes snga ma 'dzin 'gyur na/_/snga phyir [#]snang ba can nyid phyir/_/dpyod pa la sogs don gcig la/_/rtag tu rim gyis mthong ba yi/_/brjod nyid [#]rim min nyid 'gyur zhing /_/gcig kyang gnyis
[\[139a.4\]]gnyis snang bar 'gyur/_/bdag dang de rig snang ba'i phyir/_/gal te yul gzhan 'pho ba na/_/tha ma nyams su myong min na/_/gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba bzhin/_/thams cad myong med thal bar 'gyur/_!_/gal te bdag myong mngon sum yin/_/_
[\[139a.5\]]gzhan gyis myong 'gyur [#]ma yin na/_/gang gis de skad brjod 'gyur ba/_/bdag gis myong de gang las grub/_!_/gsal rgyu ma grub par 'gyur gyi/_/gsal bar 'dod pa'i gsal ba min/_/gal te gsal bar [#]ma grub kyang /_/gsal na 'gro 'di gsal
[\[139a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/tshad ma rnam 'grel [#]gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las mngon sum gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_/gzhan la bstan par bya nyid phyir/_/bdag mthong min yang gzhan dag gis/_/mthong ba sgrub byed ces kha cig_/de spang phyir
[\[139a.7\]]bdag mthong ba'i tshig_!_/yongs brtags yongs su len pa'i phyir/_/rjes su dpag pa'i yul la tshig_/tshad ma nyid du 'dod ma yin/_/der ni rjes dpag 'jug mi 'gyur/_/lung la gnod phyir gzhan la ni/_/sgrub byed brjod phyir de yi tshe/_/de ni
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]tshad min de bas na/_/des grub ma lus grub ma yin/_!_/gal te lung de ldan la grub/_/ce na gang gi lung gang yin/_!_/tshad mas gnod par gyur pa yi/_/lung de ji ltar grub pa yin/_!_/de dang 'gal ba[#] khas len pa[#]/_/de nyid kyis ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/_
[\[139b.2\]]de las gzhan pa khas len na/_/de dor yan lag tshad ma min/_!_/rang rtogs gang las byung gyur pa[#]/_/sgrub byed des ni cis ma [#]brjod/_/rig pa gang gis lung 'dzin pa/_/de ni 'dis kyang cis mi 'dzin/_/sngar ni sgrub byed gang dag gis/_/tha mal
[\[139b.3\]]par gyur rtogs pa dang /_/dbang po 'byung ba'i sgrub de dag_/de'i [#]don nus shes la [#]nus yin/_!_/gang yang 'brel pa rnam chad can/_/spyis kyang spyod yul ma yin pa'i/_/don de dag la bsgrub [#]bya dang /_/sgrub byed dpyod pa cung zad med/_/skyes bu'i bsam
[\[139b.4\]]pa'i dbang gis ni/_/de nyid de nyid min 'jog na/_/gtan tshigs der snang med 'gyur te/_/de ni dngos rten [#]min phyir ro/_/don yod shes la ltos bcas yin/_/med pa shes pas sgrub byed min/_!_/yod kyang dngos dang 'brel med pa'i/_/rtogs
[\[139b.5\]]pa rtogs pa med dang mtshungs/_!_/rang bzhin dang ni 'bras bu 'am/_!_/snang ba mthong ba med nyid rtags/_!_/'brel de dngos la grub yin na/_/rang la ci yi phyir ma grub/_/gzhan gyis kyang gzhan las rtogs par[#]/_/mi rigs gzhan gyis brtags pa yis[#]/_/thal ba sgrub pa
[\[139b.6\]]gnyis 'brel phyir/_/gcig med na gzhan dgag [#]phyir yin/_/don smos de ni sgra dag dang /_/rtog [#]pas sgro btags bdag nyid can/_/rtags nyid min par sgrub don te[#]/_/don las don ni grub phyir ro/_/rtog dang lung dag byed pa po'i/_/'dod pa tsam dang rjes 'brel
[\[139b.7\]]dang /_/dngos las gzhan du srid pa'i phyir/_/btags [#]pa dag ni 'khrul pa yin/_!_/don gyis don rtogs phyir don la/_/phyogs dang gtan tshigs brjod nus med/_/des na de dag rang nyid las/_/sgrub par byed par [#]gnas ma yin/_!_/phyogs kyi tshig de smra
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ba po'i/_/bsam pa ston par byed pa na[#]/_/tshad yin de las the tshom dag_/skye phyir dngos su sgrub byed min/_/bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis/_/brgyud pa yis kyang nus pa med/_/gtan tshigs brjod pa rang nyid la/_/nus pa
[\[140a.2\]]med kyang nus ston byed/_!_/gtan tshigs don gyi yul nyid kyis[#]/_/nus med de ni brjod par bshad/_!_/gal te de la'ang nus yod de/_/gtan tshigs tshig ni 'jug phyir na/_/de ni the tshom gyis shes par/_/'dod pas skabs la brten pa yin/_/_
[\[140a.3\]]mi mthun phyogs khas len na yang /_/de mtshungs phyir na thug med 'gyur/_/nang gi yan lag nus pa ni/_/tshul gsum dag la yang dag gnas/_/de la dran pa bskyed pa ni/_/de nyid tshig la yang dag gnas/_/gal te yul bstan med par ni/_/_
[\[140a.4\]]gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa'i phyir/_/yul bstan pa dag nyid las ni/_/nus pa sgrub [#]par 'dod ce na/_!_/khyab sngon can la de med kyang /_/sgra ni byas yin 'di 'dra kun/_/mi rtag ces ni brjod pas kyang /_/don gyis de ni 'jig blor 'gyur/_/phyogs
[\[140a.5\]]bstan pa ni med na yang /_/'grub pa la ni gegs med phyir/_/gsum [#]las tshul gang rung ba nyid/_/ma bstan ma tshang yin par brjod/_!_/bsgrub bya brjod par dam bcas [#]na'ang /_/smra de la skyon 'thad min te/_/sgrub byed dbang du byas nyid kyis/_/gtan
[\[140a.6\]]tshigs ltar snang thal min phyir/_khyad par med par brjod na yang /_/rigs gcig the tshom skye 'gyur te[#]/_/gzhan du bsgrub bya brjod pa kun/_/dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur/_/gal te grub brjod sgrub byed phyir/_/gzhan dag la yang skyon med na/_/da
[\[140a.7\]]ni bsgrub bya bstan pa dag_/ci ltar sgrub byed yan lag yin/_!_/ltar snang bcas sogs bkod pa dang /_/gzhan ni 'brel med bzhad gad de/_/'di ltar de ni rigs pa nyid/_/ma yin no zhes bshad zin to/_!_/sgrub brjod rtogs pa'i don can nyid/_/yin yang rmongs
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]med phyir mtshan nyid/_/ngo bo tshig phrad bdag nyid 'dod/_/tshig gis de yi mtshan nyid bzhi/_/ma grub sgrub byed min don brjod/_/rgol bas khas blangs pa bzung ngo /_/ma brjod na yang 'dod pas khyab/_/bdag gi don bzhin bsgrub byar 'dod/_/gzhan 'dod
[\[140b.2\]]thams cad bzlog na yang /_/'grel par [#]bdag nyid sgra bshad pa/_/dogs pa'i gnas ni bzlog pa ste/_/'di ni de don byas pa yin/_/de ni ltos nas chos dag dang /_/chos can khyad par yin par brjod/_/ma brjod na yang 'dod pa ni/_/skabs las rtogs
[\[140b.3\]]par 'gyur ba yin/_/de dper rjes 'gro med pa yi/_/skyon yang ji skad bdag gzhan na/_/de ma grub ces bshad bzhin te/_/der ni 'dod la gnod byed yin/_!_/gal te gang la rtsod pa yin[#]/_/sgrub bkod de bsgrub bya min na/_/bsgrub bya ci [#]yin gzhan
[\[140b.4\]]du na/_/mi 'dod pa'am 'bras med 'gyur/_!_/'dis ni gnyis bcas sbyor ba la/_/rjes 'gro med dang 'gal ba dag_/bstan pa yin no ci ste yang /_/bsgrub par bya ba spyir 'dod na/_/de nyid don gzhan med pa'i phyir/_/lus mi 'gyur na grub ma yin[#]/_/_
[\[140b.5\]]brjod byas stong pa brjod rnams kyi/_/'di de mi shes kyis bslad yin/_!_/sgra dang bum pa'i khyad par gyis/_/rtog [#]na 'jig la'ang mtshungs she na/_/ma yin 'jig pa sgrub [#]pa yis/_/sgra ni de ltar grub [#]phyir ro/_/de bzhin don gzhan yod gyur na/_/bum pa'ang
[\[140b.6\]]de dang ldan par 'gyur/_!_/mi rtag sgra yi khyad par can/_/rjes 'gro med na ma 'brel ba/_/bzlog phyir ma yin mi ldan dang /_/gzhan ldan rnam gcod rnam pa gnyis/_/mi ldan gcod phyir gzhan dang ni/_/rjes 'gro med par 'gyur ma yin/_!_/de spyi bsgrub par
[\[140b.7\]]bya yin pas/_grub pa sgrub pa nyid ma yin/_!_/chos can khyad par can de ni/_/rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon ldan min/_/'dis ni chos can chos dag gis/_/chos dang chos can khyad par can/_/'gog pa dag ni bsal yin te/_/chos can de ltar mi bsgrub phyir/_/_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]chos can la ni tshogs pa dag_/bsal ba 'gal ba ma yin te/_/gang phyir de ltar sgrub 'dod min/_/'dir chos 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya yin/_/chos can gcig la bstan bcos las/_/chos rnams du ma rnam gzhag kyang /_/bdag nyid
[\[141a.2\]]'dod pa bsgrub bya zhes/_/bdag nyid kyi ni [#]sgra smos so/_!_/gal te bstan bcos khas blangs phyir/_/thams cad bzung bas de gcig la/_/rab tu gnod na'ang [#]gtan tshigs dang /_/dam bca' ba dag skyon 'gyur na/_/sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa na/_/dri sa'i
[\[141a.3\]]yon tan bzlog pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs 'gal 'gyur skabs min phyir/_/min na de ni gzhan la'ang mtshungs/_/ci ste chos can 'dir skabs yin/_/de la bstan bcos don gnod nyid/_!_/chos can chos sogs sgrub byed kyis/_/ci ste rgol 'dod yin
[\[141a.4\]]brjod na/_!_/gnas skabs 'ga' yis 'dod 'gyur zhing /_/de rtogs pa yang de dag gis/_/nan gyis khyod 'di 'dod ces pa/_/gsal bar dbang phyug spyod pa yin/_/'bras bu'i rtags can min brjod de/_/'khrul pa yis ni gnod par 'gyur/_!_/med na
[\[141a.5\]]mi 'byung min don la/_/gnod kyang gzhan la ci zhig gnod/_!_/rjes dpag rang gi spyod yul la/_/lung la ltos pa med par bshad/_/des grub de ni legs par grub/_/de tshe bstan bcos ltos ma yin/_!_/de tshe rtsod dor 'gyur zhe na/_/de tshe khas blangs med phyir
[\[141a.6\]]min/_/'di ni khas len thabs yin te/_/de tshe yod kyang yan lag min/_!_/de ltar yul gnyis rnam dag na/_/de ni bstan bcos yongs 'dzin par/_/'dod pa'i dus yin de yi tshe/_/bstan bcos kyis ni gnod par 'gyur/_/des grub don la de dang ni/_/_
[\[141a.7\]]'gal bar sems pa mi rung phyir/_!_/gnas gsum par ni [#]'pho ba na/_/bstan bcos len par rigs ldan yin/_!_/der yang bsgrub bya'i chos dang ni/_/med na mi 'byung la gnod nyid/_/spang bar bya yi [#]gzhan min te/_/thug pa med par thal phyir ro/_!_/dpyad [# ]
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]pa kun la bstan bcos dag_/gzung zhes lugs 'di gang gis byas/_/de [#]ni grub mtha' med rnams kyis/_/du bas me ni rtogs mi 'gyur/_/skye bo ring por [#]skyes gyur zhing [#]/_/yon tan nyes pa ma mthong la/_/grub mtha' mi zad [#]gdon 'di ni/_/kye ma su yis
[\[141b.2\]]bsgos pa yin/_!_/gal te dpe la bstan bcos kun/_/sgrub par byed pa gcig nyid la/_/bstan pa sgrub byed 'gyur zhe na/_!_/'di ni 'jig rten 'das lugs yin/_!_/'brel med chos ni ma grub pas/_/ma grub par ni [#]ji ltar 'gyur/_/de grub [#]yin na de
[\[141b.3\]]sgrub brjod/_/gtan tshigs skyon ldan ji ltar yin/_!_/chos can chos [#]ni ma lus pa/_/dper blangs med pa kho nar ni/_/skye bos tshig dang dung sogs las/_/sems ldan me sogs rjes dpog byed/_!_/mi 'khrul pas na rang bzhin dang /_/rgyu dag sgrub par
[\[141b.4\]]byed pa'i don/_/'ga' yi smra ba la gnod pas/_/ngo bo nyid las ldog ma yin/_/de ni 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya yi[#]/_/don dang med na mi 'byung bar/_/rtogs pa gzhan dag gtan tshigs nges/_/ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur ma yin/_!_/gtan tshigs brjod dam ma
[\[141b.5\]]brjod kyang /_/'gal na rgol bas 'dir ci byas/_/nges [#]brjod nyes pas bstan bcos la/_/gnod byed du ni de skyes min/_/gnod byed brjod phyir skyon zhe na/_/gal te ma brjod na de ci/_/gnod pa min nam mi rigs byed/_/min te cis na [#]skyon can yin/_/_
[\[141b.6\]]gtan tshigs ltar snang gzhan dag la[#]/_/rang 'dod nyid ni sgrub byed [#]phyir/_/don med brjod pas skyon 'gyur na/_/de sgrub phyir na [#]'dir ma yin/_!_/gal te bstan bcos la lar 'ga'/_/rigs min pas na rigs [#]smra ba/_/gzhan pa dag kyang 'gog byed ces/_/_
[\[141b.7\]]bya ba rgyal rigs lugs yin no/_/don kun mtshungs par byas nas ni/_/sgrub byed brjod par nus ma yin/_/des na kun tu bsgrub bya dang /_/sgrub byed rnam gzhag 'di nyams 'gyur/_!_/chos can gcig la 'gal ba dag_/mi rung phyir na 'gal nges la/_/gnod
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]'gyur 'dir [#]ni de 'dra ba'i/_/'gal ba yod pa ma yin no/_!_/de dag gnod bya gnod byed ni/_/min yang bstan bcos don slad phyir/_/'brel [#]ba med kyang gnod ce na/_!_/thams cad thams cad kyis gnod 'gyur/_!_/'brel yod des na
[\[142a.2\]]de nyid la/_/gnod 'gyur zhe na ma yin te/_/rtags kun rang gi bsgrub bya la/_/skyon dang yon tan dpyad phyir ro/_!_/med na bsgrub bya mi 'byung ba'i/_/'brel pa de ni 'dir rtogs med/_/'dir ni bstan bcos gnod 'ba' zhig_/skyon yin de gzhan byas la'ang
[\[142a.3\]]mtshungs/_!_/gal te bstan bcos khas blangs phyir/_/bstan bcos mthong ba ma lus bsgrub[#]/_/dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra/_/dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur/_!_/gal te sgrub byed nyid brjod pa/_/ma yin 'dod pa smos phyir na[#]/_/bsgrub bya rig pas
[\[142a.4\]]thob pa [#]ni/_/tshig las ldog [#]pa ma yin no/_/mi 'dod bsgrub bya min zhe na/_/rgol ba mi 'dod chos gzhan yang /_/bsgrub min [#]de tshe bsgrub bya ba/_/min la gnod pas ci zhig 'gal/_!_/phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can yin[#]/_/rang nyid sgra yang don med 'gyur/_!_/_
[\[142a.5\]]bstan bcos 'dod 'jug don zhe na/_/'o na dogs 'di gang [#]las yin/_!_/de ni tshad mas bkag med na/_/'dzin pa gang gis bzlog par nus/_/gal te tshad mas bkag na yang /_/tshig las gang gis 'jug par 'gyur/_/de dag sngar [#]yang grub mtha' ni/_/_
[\[142a.6\]]rang gi 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dzin/_/de ni phyis kyang ji [#]zhig ltar/_/gzhan 'dzin pa ni cis mi thob/_/'dod gnod [#]med dang bsgrub bya min/_/thug pa med par bstan pas na/_/log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/'dir ni rang nyid sgra mdzad do/_!_/gzhung lugs
[\[142a.7\]]kyis byas khyad par dag_/yongs su spangs nas rab grags pa'i/_/chos can dag ni gzung don du/_/gzhan ni rang nyid sgra brjod zer/_!_/dpyad pa nyid kyi skabs kyis ni/_/rab grags rten ni grub gyur [#]te/_/rang 'dod brtags pa'i khyad par can/_/dngos po rnams
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]rtsod med phyir ro/_!_/ci ste grub par bstan pa yis/_/chos can bsgrub bya min brjod na/_/rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa/_/zhes bya 'di nyid kyis de rtogs/_!_/grub dang sgrub pa'i ngo bor ni/_/bstan pa dag ni yod yin na/_/bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa zhes/_/bya ba 'di ni
[\[142b.2\]]'bras ldan 'gyur/_/rjes su dpag pa spyi yi ni/_/yul can nyid du bshad pa yin/_/'dir ni de skad ma bstan kyang /_/phyogs la 'gal ba cung zad med/_/gal te chos can bsgrub byar byas/_/de las cir 'gyur de mi nus/_/ci phyir brtags [#]rjes 'gro med
[\[142b.3\]]phyir/_/'di de dag gi skyon min nam/_/yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa/_/phyogs skyon 'dod min de lta na'ang [#]/_/gtan tshigs la sogs nyes pa yang /_/phyogs kyi skyon du thal 'gyur te/_/thams cad phyogs la gnod phyir ro/_!_/de phyir de tsam dang 'brel ba/_/_
[\[142b.4\]]phyogs kyi skyon 'dod gzhan min te/_/mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba bzhin/_!_/rgyu sogs mtshan nyid bsal bya la/_/ltos pa med par ma khyab dang /_/ldog pa dag ni spang ba'i phyir/_/phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/_/rang nyid tshig phrad ngo bo'i sgra/_/ma
[\[142b.5\]]bsal ba dang bcas pa dag_/ldog pa sel bar byed pa yin/_!_/'dod sgras ma khyab sel bar byed/_/bsgrub byar khas blangs phyogs mtshan nyid/_/de rnams la ni phyogs nyid med/_/bsal ba gnod dang lhag ma la/_/mtshan nyid 'jug pa med phyir ro/_/_
[\[142b.6\]]rang nyid 'dod pa brjod pa yis/_/nges bzung don ni rtogs na yang /_!_/byed pa'i mtha' dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/dus gzhan gcad [#]phyir bshad pa yin/_!_/'dod rkyen 'dir ni yan lag min/_/'dod par gyur pa'i tshig dag la/_/yan lag nyid yin de yis ni/_/_
[\[142b.7\]]gtan tshigs ma grub la sogs 'gog_!_/rjod byed min phyir yang mi rigs/_/des na rang nyid bdag nyid 'dod/_/bstan bcos kun la ltos med par/_/de 'dod pa ni bsgrub [#]bya nyid/_/des na mi 'dod dang 'brel pa'i/_/'dod pa la yang gnod pa na/_/ji ltar sgrub la gnod
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]med phyir/_/phyogs dang gtan tshigs skyon med nyid/_!_/khas blangs de yang tshad ma ni/_/dag gis bkag med yin par 'dod/_/gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir/_/bsal ba [#]gtan tshigs rten [#]ma yin/_/rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba yis/_/gnod
[\[143a.2\]]pa de ni rnam bzhir bshad/_/de la khas blangs 'bras rtags te/_/'gro la grags pa rang bzhin rtags/_!_/yang dag nges ldan brjod 'dod pa/_/bdag gzhan yid ches mtshungs pa yi/_/phyir na rang gi tshig dang ni/_/bstan bcos gcig tu bshad pa yin/_/ji ltar
[\[143a.3\]]bdag ni tshad min na/_/tshig ni 'jug par mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin bstan bcos mi brten [#]na/_/der grags don la dpyod pa yang /_/mtshungs par bstan phyir bstan bcos de'i/_/skabs rten nyid la gnod byed ces/_/don 'di bstan pa'i ched du 'di/_/rang gi tshig
[\[143a.4\]]dang lhan cig bshad/_/des na 'di la dpe dag kyang /_/mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa yin/_/tshad ma rnams ni yod min na/_/bstan bcos tshig mi rung phyir ro/_/rang tshig 'gal la [#]gsal ba'i dpe/_/lung la [#]phyogs tsam bstan pa yin/_!_/de la ma 'ongs pa na
[\[143a.5\]]chos/_/bde ba mi 'grub ces bya yin/_!_/de la rten min dngos po la/_/bstan bcos dang 'gal brjod na yang /_/gnod pa ma yin gnyis po dag_/nus pa mtshungs phyir gegs byed 'gyur/_/dper na rang gi tshig bzhin te/_/de yang de tshe rang tshig bdag[# ]!_/de dag
[\[143a.6\]]gang la tshad ma yod/_/de ni gzhan la gnod byed 'gyur/_/de lta min na rigs bral gyi/_/dam bca' nus pa mtshungs pa yi[#]/_/dam bca' ji bzhin don can gyi/_/rjes dpag la ni ji ltar gnod/_/lung rnams tshad ma yin pa ni/_/sngar nyid [#]rnam par bzlog pa yin/_/_
[\[143a.7\]]de yi phyir na khas blangs nas/_/dpyod pa dag la skyon 'di 'dod[#]/_!_/des na gnod phyir rjes dpag las/_/khas blangs phyi rol gyur min yang /_/yul gyi khyad par bstan pa yi/_/phyir na tha dad byas pa yin/_/de lta [#]min na thal ches pa'am/_/logs shig byas pa _
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]don med 'gyur/_!_/rang gi tshig kyang tha dad pa/_/tshig tsam brjod la gegs [#]byed yin/_!_/de yis bstan bcos tshad mar ni/_/khas blangs phyir na dngos kun la/_/gnod byed ce na gal te de[#]/_/mi 'dod gnod byed yin nam ci/_/rang tshig 'gal [#]na rang tshig dang /_/bstan
[\[143b.2\]]bcos 'gal tha dad med 'gyur/_/skyes bu'i 'dod pas byas na 'di/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad ma nyid/_!_/des na rab grags don dag la/_/bstan bcos dor na'ang [#]nyes pa med/_/lkog gyur dag la bstan bcos ni/_/mi 'dod dpyod [#]pa nyid mi 'jug_!_/'di la
[\[143b.3\]]brtag pa phal cher ni/_/'gal ba brjod yin 'di lta ste/_/chags sogs chos min rtsa ba dang /_/khrus kyis chos [#]dag 'gyur ba'o/_!_/mthong dang ma mthong ba dag la/_/rigs pas grub dang rang tshig gis/_/gnod med bstan bcos gang yin de/_/gzung bar bya phyir dpyod
[\[143b.4\]]'jug 'gyur/_!_/skyes bu'i 'dod dang rjes 'brel ba/_/'dod sgra'i brjod bya nyid don la/_/bkag med phyir na gnod med dag_/skye bo rnams 'dod yid ches yin/_!_/tha snyad las ni skyes pa yi/_/chos de grags pa'i sgra yis brjod/_/mngon sum sogs kyi gzhal bya
[\[143b.5\]]yang /_/'jal byed sgra sgro btags nas brjod/_!_/de la brten nas 'byung ba can/_/'dod pas 'jug phyir dgag [#]med pa/_/byas dang ma byas pa rnams su/_/sna tshogs rang bzhin nyid kyis rung /_!_/don tsam dang ni rjes 'brel can/_/byung [#]ba 'am ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/_
[\[143b.6\]]sgra yi rung ba nyid de yis/_/mi mthun pa dag gnod par 'gyur/_/grags pa med kyang dngos po la/_/rung nyid de yi stobs nyid las/_/de la sgra kun 'brel des na/_/de la de ni grub pa yin/_/gzhan du 'dir ni gnod pa yi/_/gtan tshigs thun mong nyid [#]mi 'gyur/_!_/_
[\[143b.7\]]de 'gog rjes dpag [#]las 'gyur te/_/sgra don la dbang 'jug med phyir/_/gang la yod rjes 'gro med de[#]/_/rtags rnams thun mong min nyid ces/_/de ltar gtan tshigs dper brjod pa/_/'bras bu dang ni ldan par 'dod/_!_/sgra ni brda la brten pa can/_/de yang 'dod
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]tsam brten pa yin/_/sgra yis grub pa mi 'grub [#]min/_/de ltar sgra byung grags pa gsungs/_!_/rjes su dpag pas bsgrub [#]rnams la/_/'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa can/_/med par ston yin de lta bu'i/_/grags pa'i rjes dpog yin phyir ro/_/_
[\[144a.2\]]yang na 'jig rten brjod pa la/_/rjes dpag med par brjod pa yin/_/des na [#]rjes su dpag pa las/_/grags pa tha dad yul can nyid/_/des na dngos rnams yod med pa'i/_/rjes su 'jug can rjes dpag las/_/tha dad de dbang mi 'jug pa/_/de 'dod las skyes
[\[144a.3\]]yin zhes bstan/_!_/ri bong can zlar mi 'dod pa/_/de grags gang zhig 'dod par 'gyur/_/de phyir de la dpe med can/_/de ni thun mong ma yin 'dod/_!_/dpe 'di nyid dbang byas nas ni/_/de skad bshad min mtshan nyid phyir/_/de bzhin da [#]trig shing min zhes/_/brjod
[\[144a.4\]]pa la yang gnod phyir ro/_/'dir yang ga pur dngul sogs la/_/'jig rten na ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/brda las 'jug par 'gyur ba la[#]/_/thun mong min pa nyid kyang ci/_/gal te la lar de grub na/_/de ni dngos stobs las grub yin/_/grags grub khas len ri bong
[\[144a.5\]]can/_/ma yin pa la'ang bzlog med phyir/_/dngos po la ni grub pa de/_/ri bong can la'ang bzlog pa med[#]/_/dngos de med na ri can la/_/bzlog kyang nyes pa yod ma yin/_!_/de'i [#]phyir dngos des med brda can/_/sgra las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi[#]/_/rung ba don
[\[144a.6\]]rnams nyid yin te/_/'dod la gegs byed med phyir ro/_!_/gal te la lar de grub na/_/de ni dngos stobs las grub yin/_/grags pas grub par khas len na/_/ri bong can la'ang bzlog med phyir/_!_/rung ba nyid de 'gog pa la/_/brda 'gog med las skyes pa yi/_/_
[\[144a.7\]]grags pa zhes bya'i rjes su dpag_/rung ba yul can gyis gnod byed/_!_/'dis ni brda rjes 'jug pa yi/_/sgra rnams la [#]ni don nges pa/_/yod min ces [#]brjod de dag rnams/_/der 'gog pa ni 'gal ba yin/_!_/des ni rgyu mtshan can sgra yi[#]/_/don nam sgra rnams
[\[144b\]]
